tika-s0103t:3_1: Apubbapadavaṇṇanāti atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena heṭṭhā aggahitatāya apubbassa abhinavassa padassa vaṇṇanā atthavibhāvanā.
tika-s0103t:3_5: Chāyūdakasampanne vanasaṇḍe viharatīti anupiyasāmantā katassa vihārassa abhāvato.
tika-s0103t:3_8: tena avassaṃ bhāvini bhūte viya upacārā hontīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:4_9: mahānubhāvatanti evamādikaṃ taṃtaṃattapaccakkhaguṇavisesaṃ nissāya yebhuyyena aññatitthiyāpi bhagavantaṃ disvā ādaragāravabahumānaṃ dassentiyeva,
tika-s0103t:5_1: Uddissāti satthukārabhāvena uddissāti ayamettha adhippāyoti taṃ dassento “bhagavā me”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:5_4: tadā evassa bhagavatā saddhiṃ koci sambandho natthi asakyaputtiyabhāvato sāsanato paribāhirattā.
tika-s0103t:5_6: sā panāyaṃ ṭhapetvā sāsanayuttikovide aññesaṃ na sammadeva visayoti bhagavā sabbasādhāraṇavasenassa attanā
tika-s0103t:5_7: sambandhābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “api nū”ti ādiṃ vatvā sunakkhattaṃ “ko santo kaṃ paccācikkhasī”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:5_11: tadubhayañcettha natthīti dassento bhagavā sunakkhattaṃ “ko santo kaṃ paccācikkhasī”ti avoca,
tika-s0103t:5_14: Tvaṃ pana neva yācako “ahaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ uddissa viharissāmī”ti evaṃ mama santikaṃ anupagatattā.
tika-s0103t:5_15: Na yācitako “ehi tvaṃ sunakkhatta mamaṃ uddissa viharāhī”ti evaṃ mayā apatthitattā.
tika-s0103t:6_0: Ko samānoti yācakayācitakesu ko nāma honto.
tika-s0103t:6_1: Kanti yācakayācitakesu eva kaṃ nāma hontaṃ maṃ paccācikkhasi.
tika-s0103t:6_6: tato pana bhagavati āghātuppādanena saheva parihīno ahosi.
tika-s0103t:6_7: Aparādho nāma suppaṭipattiyā virajjhanahetubhūto kilesuppādoti āha “yattako te aparādho,
tika-s0103t:6_14: “paccācikkhāmidānāhaṃ bhante bhagavanta”ntiādīni vadantena tucchapurisa tayā yāvañcidaṃ aparaddhaṃ,
tika-s0103t:7_2: So hi manussānaṃ cittādhiṭṭhānamattena ijjhanato tesaṃ sambhāvitadhammo viya ṭhito tathā vutto,
tika-s0103t:7_12: yāti icceva atthoti dassetuṃ gacchatīti attho vutto.
tika-s0103t:7_13: Tatrāti padhānabhāvena vuttassa atthassa bhummavasena paṭiniddesoti tasmiṃ dhamme sammā dukkhakkhayāya
tika-s0103t:8_3: Lokassa agganti lokuppattisamaye “idaṃ nāma lokassa agga”nti evaṃ jānitabbaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:9_1: Ettakaṃ vippalapitvāti “na dānāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ uddissa viharissāmī”ti,
tika-s0103t:9_2: “na hi pana me bhante bhagavā uttarimanussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karotī”ti,
tika-s0103t:9_3: “na hi pana me bhante bhagavā aggaññaṃ paññapetī”ti ca ettakaṃ vippalapitvā.
tika-s0103t:9_4: Idaṃ kira so bhagavā satthukiccaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0103t:9_5: aggaññapaññāpanañca kātuṃ na sakkotīti pakāsento kathesi.
tika-s0103t:10_3: te dassento sunakkhatto na saddaheyyāti diṭṭhadhammikasseva gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:10_4: Anekakāraṇenāti “itipi so bhagavā araha”ntiādinā anekavidhena vaṇṇakāraṇena.
tika-s0103t:10_5: Evaṃ me avaṇṇo na bhavissatīti ajjhāsayena attano bālatāya vaṇṇārahānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā.
tika-s0103t:10_6: Evaṃ bhagavā makkhibhāve ādīnavaṃ dassetvā puna tassa kathane kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “iti kho te”tiādimāhāti taṃ dassetuṃ “tato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:10_7: Evañhi sunakkhattassa appakopi vacanokāso na bhavissatīti.
tika-s0103t:10_11: Evamevāti apakkamanto ca na yathā tathā apakkami,
tika-s0103t:10_12: yathā pana kāyassa bhedā apāye nibbatteyya,
tika-s0103t:12_1: Dvīhi padehīti dvīhi vākyehi āraddhaṃ byatirekavasena tadubhayatthaniddesavasena uparidesanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0103t:13_0: Ekaṃ samayanti ca bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “ekasmiṃ samaye”ti ca.
tika-s0103t:13_1: Thūlū nāma janapadoti janapadīnaṃ rājakumārānaṃ vasena tathāladdhanāmo.
tika-s0103t:13_2: Kukkuravataṃ samādānavasena etasmiṃ atthīti kukkuravatikoti āha “samādinnakukkuravato”ti.
tika-s0103t:13_6: vāmapādaṃ uddharitvā muttassa vissajjana”nti evamādikaṃ aññampi sunakhehi kātabbakiriyaṃ.
tika-s0103t:13_9: So pana yasmā catūhi sarīrāvayavehi saṅghaṭṭitagamano hoti,
tika-s0103t:13_16: hatthena pana tattha upanāmanaṃ nivāretuṃ avadhāraṇaṃ katanti āha “hatthena aparāmasitvā”ti,
tika-s0103t:13_19: Vatāti patthanatthe nipāto “aho vatāhaṃ lābhī assa”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0103t:13_20: “Samaṇena nāma evarūpena bhavitabbaṃ aho vatāhaṃ ediso bhaveyya”nti evaṃ tassa patthanā ahosi.
tika-s0103t:14_3: buddhasāvake “arahanto khīṇāsavā na hontī”ti evaṃ tassa diṭṭhi uppannā.
tika-s0103t:14_4: Yathāha mahāsīhanādasutte “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesā”ti.
tika-s0103t:17_2: Nirāhārova ahosi bhagavato vacanaṃ aññathā kātukāmo,
tika-s0103t:17_3: tathābhūtopi sattame divase upaṭṭhākena upanītaṃ bhakkhasaṃ disvā “dhī”ti upaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto bhojanataṇhāya
tika-s0103t:17_4: ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayo taṃ kucchipūraṃ bhuñjitvā bhagavatā vuttaniyāmeneva kālamakāsi.
tika-s0103t:17_7: cinteyyāti yadi eso acelo “dhī”ti paccupaṭṭhapetvā “ajjapi ahaṃ na bhuñjeyya”nti cinteyya,
tika-s0103t:17_8: tathācintane satipi devatāviggahena taṃ divasaṃ…pe… kareyya. Kasmā?
tika-s0103t:18_0: Gatagataṭṭhānaṃ aṅgaṇameva hotīti tehi taṃ kaḍḍhitvā gacchantehi gatagatappadeso uttarakasāmantā vivaṭaṅgaṇameva hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0103t:18_2: Susānaṃyeva gantvāti “bīraṇatthambakaṃ atikkamissāmā”ti gacchantāpi anekavāraṃ taṃ anusaṃyāyitvā punapi taṃyeva susānaṃ upagantvā.
tika-s0103t:19_2: “Tameva vā sarīraṃ kathāpesīti taṃ sarīraṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhitapetena kathāpesī”ti keci.
tika-s0103t:19_3: Korakhattiyaṃ vā asurayonito ānetvā kathāpetu aññaṃ vā petaṃ,
tika-s0103t:19_5: “Acinteyyo hi buddhavisayo”ti pana vacanato tadeva sarīraṃ sunakkhattena pahatamattaṃ buddhānubhāvena uṭṭhāya tamatthaṃ ñāpesīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:21_8: sunakkhattena saddhiṃ kathāvibhāvanañcāti cha pāṭihāriyānī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0103t:21_9: taṃ yadi sunakkhattassa cittavibhāvanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:21_10: evaṃ sati “sattā”ti vattabbaṃ tassa bhāviavaṇṇavibhāvanāya saddhiṃ.
tika-s0103t:21_12: taṃ “sattamaṃ divasaṃ kālaṃ karissatī”ti iminā saṅgahitanti visuṃ na vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t:23_2: So kira acelakabhāvato pubbe maṭṭakito hutvā vicari vivaradanto ca,
tika-s0103t:23_4: Yaṃ kiñci tassa dento “sādhurūpo ayaṃ samaṇo”ti sambhāvento aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃyeva denti.
tika-s0103t:23_8: gahaṭṭhā ca taṃ bahū aḍḍhā vibhavasampannā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanti.
tika-s0103t:24_5: Pañhaṃ puṭṭhassa ca sampādanaṃ nāma sammadeva kathananti tadabhāvaṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:24_6: Kopavasena tassa akkhīni kampanabhāvaṃ āpajjiṃsūti āha “kampanakkhīnipi parivattetvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:24_8: so pana cittassa pakuppanavasena pavattatīti āha “kuppanākāra”nti.
tika-s0103t:24_10: so pana ārammaṇe dussanavasena pavattīti āha “dussanākāra”nti.
tika-s0103t:24_13: Mā vata noti ettha māti paṭikkhepo,
tika-s0103t:24_14: noti mayhanti atthoti āha “aho vata me na bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:24_15: Maṃ vata noti ettha pana noti saṃsayeti āha “ahosi vata nu mamā”ti.
tika-s0103t:25_3: Yasanimittakatāya lābhassa yasaparihāniyāva lābhaparihāni vuttā hotīti pāḷiyaṃ “yasā nihīno”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:27_1: “Ahaṃ sabbaṃ jānāmī”ti evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vadati paṭijānātīti ñāṇavādo,
tika-s0103t:27_3: Atikkamma gacchatoti upaḍḍhabhāgena paricchinnaṃ padesaṃ atikkamitvā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ gacchato.
tika-s0103t:27_4: Kiṃ panāyaṃ acelo pāthikaputto attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātīti?
tika-s0103t:27_8: “Evāhaṃ loke pāsaṃso bhavissāmī”ti kohaññe katvā sukkhagajjitaṃ gajji.
tika-s0103t:28_2: Vuttañhetaṃ “hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttike eva satte sevanti bhajanti payirupāsantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:29_2: tasmā “taṃ vācaṃ appahāyā”ti vatvā yathā tassā appahānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:29_8: diṭṭhi pana tato mahāsāvajjatamā tadubhayassa mūlabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:29_9: tasmā tesaṃ mahāsāvajjatāya imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetvā ayaṃ anukkamo ṭhapitoti veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:29_12: “Nāhaṃ buddho”ti vadantoti sāṭheyyena vinā ujukameva “ahaṃ buddho na homī”ti vadanto.
tika-s0103t:29_16: dutiye pana visaraṇatthoti āha “sattadhā vā pana phaleyyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:32_1: Ajitassa licchavisenāpatissa mahāniraye nibbattitvā tato āgantvā acelassa pāthikaputtassa santike parodanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:32_3: Bhagavā pana sannipatitaparisāyaṃ pasādajananatthaṃ tadanurūpaṃ pāṭihāriyamakāsiyeva.
tika-s0103t:34_5: Tenevāti imassa vasena sannipatitāya evaṃ mahatiyā parisāya bandhanamokkhaṃ kātuṃ labbhati,
tika-s0103t:35_6: tena ca chambhitattena sakalasarīre lomānaṃ haṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-s0103t:35_7: so pana tesaṃ bhittiyaṃ nāgadantānaṃ viya uddhaṃmukhatāti āha “lomānaṃ uddhaggabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0103t:35_8: Antantena āvijjhitvāti attano nisīdanatthaṃ nigūḷhaṭṭhānaṃ upaparikkhanto paribbājakārāmaṃ pariyantena anusaṃyāyitvā,
tika-s0103t:35_9: kassacideva sunakkhattassa vā sunakkhattasadisassa vā sabbaññupaṭiññaṃ appahāya satthu sammukhībhāve sattadhā tassa muddhāphalanaṃ dhammatā.
tika-s0103t:36_1: Saṃsappatīti tattheva pāsāṇaphalake bāladārako viya uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto avasīdanavasena ito cito ca saṃsappati.
tika-s0103t:36_3: Tattheva sañcaratīti tasmiṃyeva pāsāṇe ānisadupaṭṭhino sañcalanaṃ nisajjavaseneva sañcarati,
tika-s0103t:37_0: 23. Vinaṭṭharūpoti sambhāvanāya vināsena, lābhassa vināsena ca vinaṭṭhasabhāvo.
tika-s0103t:40_2: Ayañhi maṇḍisena paribbājakena saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇi,
tika-s0103t:40_3: tato puretaraṃ bhagavato guṇānaṃ ajānanakāle ayaṃ pavatti.
tika-s0103t:41_7: saddo kiñcāpi pasadakuruṅgādīsu kesucideva catuppadesu niruḷho,
tika-s0103t:41_8: idha pana sabbasādhāraṇavasenāti dassento “migaraññoti sabbacatuppadānaṃ rañño”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:41_12: paṭipakkhassa ca hananato “sīho”ti laddhanāmassa migādhipassa ghosaṃ,
tika-s0103t:41_13: so pana tena yasmā kutocipi abhītabhāvena pavattīyati,
tika-s0103t:41_15: Tattha tattha tāsu tāsu disāsu gantvā caritabbatāya bhakkhitabbatāya gocaro ghāsoti āha “gocarāyāti āhāratthāyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:41_16: Varaṃ varanti migasaṅghe migasamūhe mudumaṃsatāya varaṃ varaṃ mahiṃsavanavarāhādiṃ vadhitvāti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:41_20: Sūrabhāvenāpi hi “kiṃ ime pāṇake dubbale hantvā”ti appathāmesu pāṇesu kāruññaṃ upatiṭṭhati.
tika-s0103t:42_1: Vighāsoti parassa bhakkhitasesatāya virūpo ghāso vighāso,
tika-s0103t:43_4: tassa kira saddo ativiya virūpo amanāpo.
tika-s0103t:43_8: Te apadāyanti sodhenti sattasantānaṃ etehīti sugatāpadānāni,
tika-s0103t:43_15: kathaṃ panesa pāthikaputto tattha tāsu sikkhāsu jīvati,
tika-s0103t:43_16: ko tassa tāhi sambandhoti āha “etassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:43_17: Sambuddhānaṃ demāti dentīti buddhasaññāya dentīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:43_21: Bahuvacanaṃ eva garusmiṃ ekasmimpi bahuvacanappayogato ekavacanaṃ viya vuttaṃ vacanavipallāsena.
tika-s0103t:44_2: taṃ pana apekkhanaṃ tathā maññanamevāti āha “maññitvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:44_3: Pubbe vuttaṃ samekkhanampi maññanaṃ evāti vuttaṃ “amaññīti puna amaññitthā”ti,
tika-s0103t:45_1: Te te pāṇe byāpādento ghasatīti byagghoti iminā nibbacanena “byaggho”ti migarājassapi siyā nāmanti āha “byagghoti maññatīti sīhohamasmīti maññatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:45_2: Yadipi yathāvuttanibbacanavasena sīhopi “byaggho”ti vattabbataṃ arahati, byaggha-
tika-s0103t:45_3: saddo pana migarāje eva niruḷhoti dassento “sīhena vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:46_0: 31. Sīhena vicaritavane saṃvaḍḍhattā vuttaṃ “mahāvane suññavane vivaḍḍho”ti.
tika-s0103t:47_0: 34. Kilesabandhanāti taṇhābandhanato. Taṇhābandhanañhi thiraṃ daḷhabandhanaṃ dummocanīyaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-s0103t:52_1: Mahāviduggaṃ nāma cattāro oghā mahantaṃ jalaviduggaṃ viya anupacitakusalasambhārehi duggamaṭṭhena.
tika-s0103t:54_4: so pana lokassa uppattikkamo pavatti paveṇī cāti āha “lokuppatticariyavaṃsa”nti.
tika-s0103t:54_5: Sammāsambodhito uttaritaraṃ nāma kiñci natthi pajānitabbesu,
tika-s0103t:54_6: taṃ pana koṭiṃ katvā dassento “yāva sabbaññutaññāṇā pajānāmī”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:54_9: “suṭṭhu pajānāmi sammā pajānāmī”ti paggaṇhanto mānavasena na parāmasāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:54_10: “Paccattaññevā”ti padaṃ “nibbuti viditā”ti padadvayenāpi yojetabbaṃ “paccattaṃyeva uppāditā nibbuti ca paccattaṃyeva viditā”ti,
tika-s0103t:54_11: sayambhuñāṇena nibbattitā nibbuti sayameva viditāti attho.
tika-s0103t:54_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “paccatta”nti padaṃ vividhavibhattikaṃ hutvā āvuttinayena āvattatīti dassetuṃ “attanāyeva attanī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:55_1: Taṃ dassentoti bhagavāpi “aññatitthiyo tattha sārasaññī”ti taṃ dassento.
tika-s0103t:55_12: Tattha hi vitthārato vuttavidhiṃ idha atidisati,
tika-s0103t:55_13: pāḷi pana tattha ceva idha ca ekasadisā vāti.
tika-s0103t:56_1: Khiḍḍā padosikā mūlabhūtā ettha santīti khiḍḍāpadosikaṃ,
tika-s0103t:57_2: tassa avijjamānatā nāma atthavasenevāti āha “asaṃvijjamānaṭṭhenā”ti. Tucchā,
tika-s0103t:57_5: Vacanassa antosāraṃ nāma aviparīto atthoti tadabhāvenāha “antosāravirahitenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:57_14: Na asubhanti asubhampi “asubha”nti tasmiṃ samaye na sañjānāti,
tika-s0103t:58_1: Yasmā so paribbājako avissaṭṭhamicchāgāhitāya sammā appaṭipajjitukāmo sammāpaṭipannaṃ viya maṃ samaṇo gotamo,
tika-s0103t:58_2: bhikkhavo ca sañjānantūti adhippāyena “tathā dhammaṃ desetu”ntiādimāha,
tika-s0103t:59_0: Vāsanāyāti kilesakkhayāvahāya paṭipattiyā vāsanāya. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
tika-s0103t:61_1: Udumbarikāyāti sambandhe sāmivacananti āha “udumbarikāya deviyā santake paribbājakārāme”ti.
tika-s0103t:61_4: Ayañhettha attho udumbarikāya rañño deviyā nibbattito ārāmo udumbarikā,
tika-s0103t:61_9: Sandhānoti bhinnānampi tesaṃ sandhāpanena “sandhāno”ti evaṃ laddhanāmo.
tika-s0103t:61_12: Ariyena ñāṇenāti kilesehi ārakattā ariyena lokuttarena ñāṇena.
tika-s0103t:62_4: saddo savisesaṃ divasabhāgaṃ dīpetīti āha “divasassa divā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:62_5: Yasmā samāpannassa cittaṃ nānārammaṇato paṭisaṃhataṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:62_6: jhānasamaṅgī ca pavivekūpagamanena saṅgaṇikābhāvato ekākiyāya nilīno viya hoti,
tika-s0103t:62_8: Mano bhavanti manaso vivaṭṭanissitaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ āvahantīti manobhāvaniyāti āha “manavaḍḍhakāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0103t:63_4: Yehi ca guṇavisesehi samannāgatā bhagavato sāvakā upāsakā rājagahe paṭivasanti,
tika-s0103t:63_5: ayañca tehi samannāgatoti imaṃ visesaṃ dīpetuṃ “tesaṃ abbhantaro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:64_10: Saṅgantvā samāgantvā rāsī hutvā parehi nisinnaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0103t:64_11: Araññāni ca tāni vanapatthāni cāti araññavanapatthāni.
tika-s0103t:64_16: Vuttañhetaṃ “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”nti “vanapatthanti vanasaṇḍānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:64_19: vanapatthanti pariyantānametaṃ vanapatthanti na manussūpacārānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0103t:64_30: “Rahassa karaṇassa yuttānī”ti imināpi tesaṃ ṭhānānaṃ araññalakkhaṇayuttataṃ,
tika-s0103t:65_2: sahayoge ca karaṇavacananti āha “kena kāraṇena kena puggalena saddhi”nti.
tika-s0103t:66_3: parena vā vuttauttare paccuttaradānavasena siyāti āha “uttarapaccuttaranayenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:66_4: Yo hi parassa vacanaṃ tipukkhalena nayena rūpeti,
tika-s0103t:66_6: tassa tādisaṃ vacanasabhāvaṃ ñāṇaveyyattiyaṃ vibhāveti pākaṭaṃ karotīti.
tika-s0103t:66_7: Suññāgāresu naṭṭhāti suññāgāresu nivāsesu naṭṭhā vinaṭṭhā abhāvaṃ gatā.
tika-s0103t:66_8: Nāssa paññā nasseyya tehi tehi katapucchanapaṭipucchananimittaṃ nānāpaṭibhānuppattiyā visāramāpannaṃ pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ asamatthatāya.
tika-s0103t:66_10: taṃ parassa orodhanaṃ vādajālena vinandhanaṃ viya hotīti āha “vinandheyyāmā”ti.
tika-s0103t:67_0: Balaṃ dīpentoti abhūtameva attano ñāṇabalaṃ pakāsento.
tika-s0103t:67_2: Aññajātisambhede sati assatarassa assassa jātabhāvo viya sīhassapi sīhathāmābhāvo siyāti āha “asambhinnakesarasīha”nti.
tika-s0103t:68_2: taṃ micchāti dassento “sumāgadhā nāma pokkharaṇī”ti vatvā tassā pokkharaṇibhāvassa suttantare āgatataṃ dassetuṃ “yassā tīre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:68_4: Byadhikaraṇānampi hi padānaṃ bāhiratthasamāso hotiyeva yathā “urasilomo”ti.
tika-s0103t:68_10: sāsane ca bhikkhū attakilamathānuyogaṃ vajjetvā bhāvanānuyogena paramassāsappatte viharante passati,
tika-s0103t:68_11: tasmā “kathaṃ nu kho samaṇo gotamo kāyakilamathena vināva sāvake vinetī”ti sañjātasandeho “ko nāma so”tiādinā bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0103t:68_14: Adhiko seṭṭho āsayo nissayo ajjhāsayoti āha “uttamanissayabhūta”nti.
tika-s0103t:68_17: Tathā hesa sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi teneva ākārena adhigato.
tika-s0103t:68_20: Tathā hi taṃ bhagavā “addasa purāṇaṃ maggaṃ purāṇamañjasa”nti avoca.
tika-s0103t:68_22: “Pūretvā”ti vā idaṃ “ajjhāsayaṃ ādibrahmacariya”nti ettha pāṭhasesoti vadanti.
tika-s0103t:68_23: “Ajjhāsayaṃ ādibrahmacariyaṃ paṭijānanti assāsappattā”ti evaṃ vā ettha yojanā.
tika-s0103t:70_0: 55. Pakatā hutvā vicchinnā vippakatāti āha “aniṭṭhitāva hutvā ṭhitā”ti.
tika-s0103t:71_1: Vīriyena pāpajigucchanavādoti lūkhapaṭipattisādhanena vīriyena attataṇhāvinodanavasena pāpakassa jigucchanavādo.
tika-s0103t:71_12: Upari vuccamānesu nānākāresu acelakādivatesu ekajjhaṃ samādinnānaṃ parisodhanamevettha pāripūraṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:71_13: na sabbesaṃ anavasesato samādānaṃ tassa asambhavatoti āha “paripuṇṇāti parisuddhā”ti.
tika-s0103t:72_0: 57. “Ekaṃ pañhampi na kathetī”ti paṭhamaṃ attanā pucchitapañhassa akathitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:73_0: Tapanissitakoti attakilamathānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ tapaṃ nissāya samādāya vattanako.
tika-s0103t:75_1: “Sammā ādiyatī”ti vatvā sammā ādiyanañcassa daḷhaggāho evāti āha “daḷhaṃ gaṇhātī”ti.
tika-s0103t:75_2: “Sāsanāvacarenāpi dīpetabba”nti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “ekacco hī”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:75_5: na yathāvuttatapasamādānadhutaṅgadharatānaṃ satipi aniyyānikatte sadisatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:76_0: “Duvidhassāpīti ‘attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo’ti ca evaṃ upakkilesabhedena vuttassa duvidhassāpi tapassino”ti keci.
tika-s0103t:76_1: Yasmā pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sāsanikavasenāpi attho dīpito,
tika-s0103t:76_3: sāsanikassa cāti evaṃ duvidhassāpi tapassinoti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:76_4: Tathā ceva hi uparipi atthavaṇṇanaṃ vakkhatīti.
tika-s0103t:76_5: Ettāvatāti yadidaṃ “ko añño mayā sadiso”ti evaṃ atimānassa,
tika-s0103t:76_6: aniṭṭhitakiccasseva ca “alamettāvatā”ti evaṃ atimānassa ca uppādanaṃ, ettāvatā.
tika-s0103t:77_3: Paraṃ saṃhāretīti paraṃ saṃharaṃ nihīnaṃ karoti.
tika-s0103t:78_5: Kevalaṃ dhutaṅgasuddhiko hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ananuyuñjanto tāya eva dhutaṅgasuddhikatāya attukkaṃsanādivasena
tika-s0103t:79_2: Suṭṭhu katvā paṭisaṅkharitvā laddhāti ādaragāravayogena sakkaccaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā dānavasena upanayavasena laddhā.
tika-s0103t:80_3: Taṃ panettha vibhajjanaṃ dvidhā icchitanti āha “dvebhāgaṃ āpajjatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:80_8: Ādīnavamattampīti gadhitādibhāvena paribhoge ādīnavamattampi na passati.
tika-s0103t:80_10: Paccavekkhaṇaparibhogamattampīti paccavekkhaṇamattena paribhogampi ekavāraṃ paccavekkhitvāpi paribhuñjanampi na karoti.
tika-s0103t:81_2: Sabbassa bhuñjanato ayokūṭasadisā dantā eva dantakūṭaṃ.
tika-s0103t:82_1: Tapaṃ karotīti bhāvanāmanasikāralakkhaṇaṃ tapaṃ carati caranto viya hoti.
tika-s0103t:84_0: Kiñci vajjanti kiñci kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā dosaṃ.
tika-s0103t:85_3: Evaṃbhūto ca taṃsamaṅgī hotīti “samannāgato hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:86_9: adhikañca atikkamitvā nihīnaṃ katvā maññanasīlatāya atimānī.
tika-s0103t:86_10: Asantaguṇasambhāvanatthikatāsaṅkhātā pāpā lāmakā icchā etassāti pāpiccho.
tika-s0103t:86_13: moghamañña”nti evaṃ attanā attābhiniviṭṭhatāya satā diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhi,
tika-s0103t:86_15: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sayaṃ diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhī”ti vatthuvasena attho vutto.
tika-s0103t:86_16: Ā bāḷhaṃ viya dhīyatīti ādhānanti āha “daḷhaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapita”nti.
tika-s0103t:88_1: Idha nigrodha tapassīti yathānukkantaṃ purimapāḷiṃ nigamanavasena ekadesena dasseti.
tika-s0103t:88_4: tena ca saṃsārasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃ gahitaladdhiṃ.
tika-s0103t:88_5: Rakkhitaṃ tapanti tāya laddhiyā samādiyitvā rakkhitaṃ acelakavatāditapaṃ.
tika-s0103t:88_6: “Sabbameva saṃkiliṭṭha”nti iminā yaṃ vakkhati parisuddhapāḷivaṇṇanāyaṃ “lūkhatapassino ceva dhutaṅgadharassa ca vasena yojanā veditabbā”ti,
tika-s0103t:88_7: tassa parikappitarūpassa lūkhassa tapassinoti ayamettha adhippāyoti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:88_8: “Parisuddhapāḷidassanattha”nti ca iminā titthiyānaṃ vasena pāḷi yevettha labbhati,
tika-s0103t:88_12: Tasmiṃ ṭhāneti hetuatthe bhummanti tassa hetuatthena karaṇavacanena atthaṃ dassento “evaṃ so tenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:88_14: apariyositasaṅkappo ca hutvā upari bhāvanānuyogavasena sammāvāyāmaṃ karonto.
tika-s0103t:89_2: Aggabhāvaṃ vā sārabhāvaṃ vāti tapojigucchāya aggabhāvaṃ vā sārabhāvaṃ vā ajānanto.
tika-s0103t:91_7: Lobhacittena bhāvitaṃ sambhāvitanti katvā bhāvitaṃ nāma pañca kāmaguṇā.
tika-s0103t:91_8: Ayañca tesu tesaṃyeva samudācāro maggoṭṭhāpakaṃ viyāti āha “tesaṃ saññāyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:92_5: Cakkavattināpi pabbajitassa abhivādanādi karīyatevāti pabbajjā seṭṭhā guṇavisesayogato,
tika-s0103t:92_8: Gihibhāvo pana nihīno tadubhayābhāvatoti āha “hīnāya gihibhāvatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:93_0: 71. Tacappattāti tacaṃ pattā, tacasadisā hotīti attho.
tika-s0103t:95_1: tasmā mayaṃ anassāma vinaṭṭhāti attho. A-
tika-s0103t:95_4: Kuto parisuddhapāḷīti kuto eva amhesu parisuddhapāḷiāgatapaṭipatti.
tika-s0103t:98_6: Oghanittharaṇatthāyāti caturoghanittharaṇatthāya dhammaṃ deseti sabbaso orapārātiṇṇamāvahattā desanāya.
tika-s0103t:98_7: Sabbakilesaparinibbānatthāya dhammaṃ deseti kilesānaṃ lesenapi desanāya aparāmaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:100_1: Idaṃ sabbampīti sattavassato paṭṭhāya yāva “sattāha”nti padaṃ,
tika-s0103t:100_3: Asaṭho pana amāyāvī ujujātiko tikkhapañño ugghaṭitaññūti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:100_4: So hi taṃmuhutteneva arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkhissatīti.
tika-s0103t:100_5: Vaṅkavaṅkoti kāyavaṅkādīhipi vaṅkehi vaṅko jimho kuṭilo.
tika-s0103t:100_6: “Saṭhaṃ panāhaṃ anusāsituṃ na sakkomī”ti na idaṃ bhagavā kilāsubhāveneva vadati,
tika-s0103t:101_1: Pakatiyā ācariyoti yo eva tumhākaṃ ito pubbe pakatiyā ācariyo ahosi,
tika-s0103t:101_2: so eva idānipi pubbāciṇṇavasena ācariyo hotu,
tika-s0103t:101_3: na mayaṃ tumhe antevāsike kātukāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:101_5: dhammatanti meva pana tumhe ñāpetukāmamhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:101_7: Akusalāti koṭṭhāsaṃ pattāti akusalāti taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsataṃyeva upagatā.
tika-s0103t:101_15: Sikhāppattā paññāya pāripūrivepullatā maggaphalavaseneva icchitabbāti āha “maggapaññā…pe…
tika-s0103t:102_2: atha kho tathābhāvakathanamevāti dassetuṃ “māro kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:102_3: Athāti mārena tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānappattito pacchā aññāsīti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:102_4: Kasmā pana bhagavā pageva na aññāsīti?
tika-s0103t:102_6: Māraṃ paṭibāhitvāti mārena tesu kataṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vidhametvā,
tika-s0103t:102_7: na tesaṃ sati payojane buddhānaṃ dukkaraṃ.
tika-s0103t:103_6: Cittaṃ nuppannanti “jānāma tāvassa dhamma”nti ājānanatthaṃ “brahmacariyaṃ carissāmā”ti ekasmiṃ divase ekavārampi tesaṃ cittaṃ nuppannaṃ.
tika-s0103t:103_7: Sattāho pana vuccamāno etesaṃ kiṃ karissatīti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:103_15: paramparāya ca devamanussānaṃ suṇantānaṃ vāsanāya paccayo evāti.
tika-s0103t:105_8: tassā āsannappadese māpitattā nagarampi “mātulā” tveva paññāyittha.
tika-s0103t:106_2: rājā daḷhanemi nāma ahosī”tiādinā atītavaṃsadīpikā kathā ādito paṭṭhāya āgatā,
tika-s0103t:106_3: “aḍḍhateyyavassasatāyukānaṃ manussānaṃ vassasatāyukā puttā bhavissantī”tiādinā pana savisesaṃ anāgatatthapaṭisaṃyuttā
tika-s0103t:107_2: Buddhesu kato appakopi aparādho appako kāro viya garutaravipākoti āha “buddhehi saddhiṃ…pe…
tika-s0103t:108_0: Attadīpāti ettha kāmaṃ yo paro na hoti,
tika-s0103t:108_2: hitasukhesibhāvena pana attanibbisesattā dhammo idha “attā”ti adhippeto.
tika-s0103t:108_6: Idha pana kāmoghādīhi anajjhottharaṇīyattā dīpo viyāti dīpo,
tika-s0103t:108_9: Dīpabhāvo cettha paṭisaraṇatāti āha “idaṃ tasseva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0103t:108_11: Idañhi na aññaṃ saraṇaṃ katvā viharaṇasseva paṭikkhepavacanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:108_12: atha kho aññassa saraṇasabhāvasseva paṭikkhepavacanaṃ tappaṭikkhepe ca tena itarassāpi paṭikkhepasiddhito.
tika-s0103t:108_17: tasmā adhippāyiko ettha attā bhaveyyāti pucchati “ko panettha attā nāmā”ti.
tika-s0103t:108_19: Dutiyavāropi paṭhamavārasseva pariyāyabhāvena desitoti dassetuṃ “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:109_2: Saketi kathaṃ panāyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sakoti āha “pettike visaye”ti.
tika-s0103t:109_3: Pitito sammāsambuddhato āgatattā “ayaṃ tumhākaṃ gocaro”ti tena uddiṭṭhattā pettike visayeti.
tika-s0103t:110_3: Na myāyanti me ayaṃ sakuṇagghi nālaṃ abhavissa.
tika-s0103t:111_0: Mahantaṃ leḍḍunti naṅgalena bhinnaṭṭhāne sukkhatāya tikhiṇasiṅgaayoghanasadisaṃ mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ.
tika-s0103t:111_1: Abhiruhitvāti tassa adhobhāgena attanā pavisitvā nilīnayoggappadesaṃ sallakkhetvā tassupari caṅkamanto assaramāno aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0103t:111_3: Sannayhāti vātaggahaṇavasena ubho pakkhe samaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0103t:111_8: Paccatāḷesīti pati atāḷesi sārambhavasena vegena gantvā paharaṇato vidhārentī patāḷesi.
tika-s0103t:112_8: Tattha purime atthavikappe vipākadhammadhammā eva gahitā,
tika-s0103t:112_12: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “vipākadhammā sīlādi viya samādāya vattitabbā”ti.
tika-s0103t:112_13: Samādānanti pana attano santāne sammā ādānaṃ paccayavasena pavatti yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:112_14: Vipākadhammā hi paccayavisesehi sattasantāne sammadeva āhitā āyuādisampattivisesabhūtā uparūparikusalavisesuppattiyā upanissayā hontīti vadanti.
tika-s0103t:112_15: Puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti ettha puññanti uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha “puññaphalaṃ vaḍḍhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:112_16: Puññaphalanti ca ekadesasarūpekasesena vuttaṃ “puññañca puññaphalañca puññaphala”nti āha “uparūpari puññampi puññavipākopi veditabbo”ti.
tika-s0103t:113_1: tasmā aññampi evarūpaṃ hetūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:113_4: Na hi sinehasampayuttaṃ nāma kusalaṃ atthi.
tika-s0103t:113_10: Tadaññepi pana dānasīlādidhammā vaṭṭassa upanissayabhūtā vaṭṭagāmikusalaṃ vivaṭṭassa upanissayabhūtā vivaṭṭagāmikusalanti veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:115_3: dhammāna”ntiādinā suttadesanāya āraddhaṭṭhāne vaṭṭavivaṭṭagāmibhāvena sādhāraṇe kusalaggahaṇe.
tika-s0103t:115_6: Dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṅkhepato evaṃ dīpetvā ārabhīti dassetuṃ “bhikkhave”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:115_7: paṭhamaṃ tathā adīpentopi bhagavā atthato dīpeti viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:116_6: Atibalavadoseti rañño balavati anatthe upaṭṭhite sati.
tika-s0103t:118_1: So uttarato assakaṇṇapabbatena paricchinnaṃ hutvā attānaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaekasamuddapariyanto.
tika-s0103t:119_0: 83. Evaṃ katvāti kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā. Sukataṃ kammanti dasakusalakammapathameva vadati.
tika-s0103t:120_3: Niddoseti cakkavattivattassa paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ dosānaṃ apagamane niddose.
tika-s0103t:120_5: Bhāvini bhūte viya hi upacāro yathā “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”ti.
tika-s0103t:120_6: Adhigatacakkavattibhāvāpi hi te tattha vattantevāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:122_1: Aññathā vattituṃ adento so dhammo adhiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti tadadhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:122_5: Garuṃ karontoti pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaraṇavasena garuṃ karonto.
tika-s0103t:122_9: Evaṃ pūjayato apacāyato evañca yathāvuttasakkārādisambhavoti taṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ apadisitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:122_10: “Dhammādhipatibhūto āgatabhāvenā”ti iminā yathāvuttadhammassa jeṭṭhakabhāvena purimapurimataraattabhāvesu sakkacca samupacitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:122_11: “Dhammavaseneva sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇenā”ti etena ṭhānanisajjādīsu yathāvuttadhammaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:122_13: Paraṃ rakkhanto aññaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādianatthato rakkhanto teneva paratthasādhanena khantiādiguṇena attānaṃ tato eva rakkhati.
tika-s0103t:124_0: Navavidhā mānamadāti “seyyohamasmī”tiādi nayappavattiyā navavidhā mānasaṅkhātā madā.
tika-s0103t:124_1: Māno eva hettha pamajjanākārena pavattiyā mānamado.
tika-s0103t:124_15: na maggakkhaṇe viya ekajjhaṃ paṭisaṅkhānamukhena pajahanato.
tika-s0103t:124_16: Ekamattānanti vā vivekavasena ekaṃ ekākinaṃ attānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:124_17: Kāle kāleti tesaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamitabbe kāle kāle.
tika-s0103t:125_4: dvādasavidha”nti ca heṭṭhā vuttagaṇanāya ca samānaṃ kātabbaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ katvā dassetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:127_4: Tattha “katādhikārassa tāva heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvādasahipi saṃvaccharehi pūrati,
tika-s0103t:129_1: Attano matiyāti paramparāgataṃ purāṇaṃ tantiṃ paveṇiṃ laṅghitvā attano icchitākārena.
tika-s0103t:130_4: Tattha tattha rājakicce raññā amā saha vattantīti amaccā,
tika-s0103t:130_6: Paramparāgatā hutvā rañño parisāya bhavāti pārisajjā.
tika-s0103t:130_8: Tasmiṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapitā hutvā rañño āyaṃ,
tika-s0103t:130_10: Jātikulasutācārādivasena puthuttaṃ gatattā mahatī mattā etesanti mahāmattā,
tika-s0103t:130_11: te pana mahānubhāvā amaccā evāti āha “mahāamaccā”ti.
tika-s0103t:130_14: Mantaṃ paññaṃ asitā hutvā jīvantīti mantassājīvino,
tika-s0103t:132_1: Balavalobhattāti “imasmiṃ loke idāni daliddamanussā nāma bahū,
tika-s0103t:132_2: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ dhane anuppadiyamāne mayhaṃ kosassa parikkhayo hotī”ti evaṃ uppannabalavalobhattā.
tika-s0103t:132_5: taṃ panettha uddhagāmīti āha “uddhaṃ aggaṃ assā”ti.
tika-s0103t:133_1: Suṭṭhu nisiddhanti yathāyaṃ iminā attabhāvena adinnaṃ ādātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0103t:133_3: Mūlahatanti jīvitā voropanena mūle eva hataṃ.
tika-s0103t:137_0: Tassa bhāvoti yena mettākaruṇāpubbaṅgamena cittena puggalo “matteyyo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:137_6: Vippaṭipattiyaṃ pana vattabbameva natthīti āha “tassā abhāvo ceva tappaṭipakkhatā ca amatteyyatā”ti.
tika-s0103t:137_7: Kule jeṭṭhānanti attano kule vuddhānaṃ mahāpitucūḷapitujeṭṭhakabhātikādīnaṃ.
tika-s0103t:141_0: Gehe mātugāmaṃ viyāti attano gehe dāsibhariyābhūtamātugāmaṃ viya.
tika-s0103t:142_7: sā panassa tikkhatā sarīre avahantepi sinehavatthuṃ laṅghitvāpi pavattiyā veditabbāti āha “piyamānassapī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:143_7: kiṃ gatikoti antogadhaṃ codanaṃ sandhāyāha “antarakappo ca nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:144_2: Gumbalatādīhi gahanaṃ ṭhānanti gumbalatādīhi sañchannatāya gahanabhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:146_3: na rājabhayādinā ukkamanavasena punarāvattiyāpi tassa labbhanato.
tika-s0103t:146_5: Viramaṇampi atthato pajahanameva pariccajanabhāvatoti āha “pajaheyyāmāti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:146_7: pitu ca sīlavantatāya tadavayavabhūte gabbhe vaḍḍhi “sīlagabbhe vaḍḍhitā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0103t:146_8: etena utuāhārassa viya tadaññassāpi bāhirassa paccayassa vasena sattasantānassa visesādhānaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:146_12: Nanu ca taṃ visesādhānaṃ jāyamānaṃ rūpasantatiyā eva bhaveyyāti?
tika-s0103t:146_14: rūpasantatiyā pana tathā āhitavisesāya arūpasantatipi laddhūpakārā eva hoti tappaṭibaddhavuttibhāvato.
tika-s0103t:146_15: Yathā kabaḷīkārāhārena upatthambhite rūpakāye sabbopi attabhāvo anuggahito eva nāma hoti,
tika-s0103t:146_16: yathā pana rañño cakkavattino puññavisesaṃ upanissāya tassa itthiratanādīnaṃ anaññasādhāraṇā te te visesā sambhavanti tabbhāve bhāvato,
tika-s0103t:146_18: evameva tasmiṃ kāle mātāpitūnaṃ yathāvuttapuññavisesaṃ upanissāya tesaṃ puttānaṃ jāyamānānaṃ dīghāyukatā
tika-s0103t:146_19: khettavisuddhiyāva hotīti veditabbā saṃvegadhammachandādisamupabrūhitāya tadā tesaṃ kusalacetanāya tathā
tika-s0103t:146_22: tatthāti yathāvuttaṃ kusaladhammaṃ samādāya vattamāne sattanikāye.
tika-s0103t:146_24: “Attanova sīlasampattiyā”ti vuttaṃ sasantatipariyāpannassa dhammassa tattha visesappaccayabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:146_25: Khettavisuddhipi pana idhāpi paṭikkhipituṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0103t:147_2: saddena kule jeṭṭhāpacāyikāpariyosānānaṃ dasannaṃ pāpakoṭṭhāsānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:149_1: Evaṃ uppajjanakataṇhāti evaṃ vacībhedaṃ pāpanavasena pavattā bhuñjitukāmatā.
tika-s0103t:149_5: Nirantarapūritoti nirantaraṃ viya puṇṇo tatrupagānaṃ sattānaṃ bahubhāvato.
tika-s0103t:151_4: Sattānaṃ vaḍḍhamānāyukakāle buddhā na nibbattanti saṃsāre saṃvegassa dubbibhāvanīyattā.
tika-s0103t:152_2: yūpanti ettha sattā anekabhūmikūṭāgārovarakādivantatāyāti yūpo, pāsādo.
tika-s0103t:152_5: mahatā ca kittisaddena samannāgatattā catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi mahājanassa rañjanato mahāpanādo nāma rājā jāto.
tika-s0103t:153_0: Panādo nāma so rājāti “atīte panādo nāma so rājā assosī”ti attabhāvantaratāya attānaṃ paraṃ viya niddisati.
tika-s0103t:153_1: Āyasmā hi bhaddajitthero attanā ajjhāvutthapubbaṃ suvaṇṇapāsādaṃ dassetvā evamāha.
tika-s0103t:153_2: Yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayoti yassa rañño ayaṃ yūpo pāsādo suvaṇṇayo suvaṇṇamayo.
tika-s0103t:153_5: Ubbhamāhu sahassadhāti ubbhaṃ uccabhāvaṃ assa pāsādassa sahassadhā sahassakaṇḍappamāṇaṃ āhu,
tika-s0103t:154_4: Dhajālūti tattha tattha niyūhasikharādīsu patiṭṭhapitehi sattidhajavīraṅgadhajādīhi dhajehi sampanno.
tika-s0103t:154_8: Chasahassāni sattadhāti chamattāni gandhabbasahassāni sattadhā tassa pāsādassa sattasu ṭhānesu rañño abhiramāpanatthaṃ nacciṃsūti attho.
tika-s0103t:154_9: Te evaṃ naccantāpi kira rājānaṃ hāsetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
tika-s0103t:154_10: Atha sakko devarājā devanaṭaṃ pesetvā samajjaṃ kāresi,
tika-s0103t:156_0: Dānavasena datvāti taṃ pāsādaṃ attano pariggahabhāvaviyojanena dānamukhe niyojetvā.
tika-s0103t:156_1: Vissajjetvāti citteneva pariccajanavasena datvā puna dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ santakabhāvakaraṇena nirapekkhapariccāgavasena vissajjetvā.
tika-s0103t:156_2: Ettakenāti “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave”ti ādiṃ katvā yāva “pabbajissatī”ti padaṃ ettakena desanāmaggena.
tika-s0103t:158_1: Idaṃ bhikkhuno āyusminti āyusmiṃ sādhetabbe idaṃ bhikkhuno icchitabbaṃ cirajīvitāya hetubhāvatoti.
tika-s0103t:159_1: kāyassa phuṭattā sarīre vaṇṇadhātu vippasannā hoti,
tika-s0103t:159_2: kalyāṇo ca kittisaddo abbhuggacchatīti āha “sīlavato hī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:161_2: Hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattiyā sabbadisāsu pharaṇaappamāṇavasena sabbadisāsu vipphārikatā.
tika-s0103t:162_0: “Arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ bala”nti vuttaṃ tassa akuppadhammatāya kenaci anabhibhavanīyabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:163_2: Lokapariyāpanneheva hi dhammehi tesaṃ balassa duppasahatā,
tika-s0103t:164_1: Yāva āsavakkhayā pavaḍḍhati vivaṭṭagāmikusaladhammānaṃ samādānahetūti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:166_6: kathañcassā pāsādo ahosīti etasmiṃ antolīne anuyoge.
tika-s0103t:166_7: Ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā anupubbikathā ādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepeneva anupubbikathā.
tika-s0103t:166_8: Padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ ekaṃ upāsikaṃ aggupaṭṭhāyikaṭṭhāne ṭhapentiṃ disvāna tattha sañjātagāravabahumānā
tika-s0103t:167_1: Upayoganti tattha tattha appetabbaṭṭhāne appanāvasena viniyogaṃ agamaṃsu.
tika-s0103t:167_4: Suddhapāsādova na sobhatīti kevalo ekapāsādo eva vihāro na sobhati.
tika-s0103t:167_6: Majjhe gabbho samantato anupariyāyatoti evaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vaḍḍhetvā katasenāsanāni duvaḍḍhagehāni.
tika-s0103t:169_1: Anupasampannabhāvato āpattiyā āpannāya abhāvato na āpattiparivāsaṃ vasanti.
tika-s0103t:170_1: Anuvattamānā caṅkamiṃsu ananucaṅkamane yathādhippetassa atthassa pucchanādīnaṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0103t:170_6: Brāhmaṇakulāti kenaci pārijuññena anupaddutā eva brāhmaṇakulā.
tika-s0103t:170_8: Ime brāhmaṇā uccā hutvā “imaṃ vasalaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajiṃsū”tiādinā jātiādīni ghaṭṭentā akkosanti.
tika-s0103t:170_11: Antarantarā vicchijja pavattiyamānā paribhāsā paripuṇṇā nāma na hoti khaṇḍabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:172_0: Itare tayo vaṇṇāti khattiyādayo vaṇṇā hīnā.
tika-s0103t:172_1: Nanu khattiyāva seṭṭhā vaṇṇā yathā buddhā etarahi khattiyakule eva uppannāti?
tika-s0103t:172_11: Brahmuno mukhato jātā vedavacanato jātāti mukhato jātā.
tika-s0103t:172_12: Tato eva brahmuno mahābrahmuno vedavacanato vijātāti brahmajā.
tika-s0103t:172_18: te pana gharabandhanena baddhā nihīnatarāti āha “gahapatike”ti.
tika-s0103t:172_23: Ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhi “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato jātā,
tika-s0103t:173_6: Laddhibhindanatthāyāti “brāhmaṇā brahmuno puttā orasā mukhato jātā”ti evaṃ pavattāya laddhiyā viniveṭhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0103t:173_7: Puttappaṭilābhatthāyāti “evaṃ mayaṃ pettikaṃ iṇaṃ sodhessāmā”ti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā puttappaṭilābhāya.
tika-s0103t:173_10: Itthīnañhi kumāribhāvappattito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayato oraṃ asati vibandhe aṭṭhame aṭṭhame sattāhe gabbhāsayasaññite
tika-s0103t:173_11: tatiye āvatte katipayā lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā aggahitapupphā eva bhijjanti,
tika-s0103t:173_16: Saccavacanaṃ siyāti “brahmuno puttā”tiādivacanaṃ saccaṃ yadi siyā,
tika-s0103t:175_1: Mukhacchedakavādanti “brāhmaṇā mahābrahmuno mukhato jātā”ti vādassa chedakavādaṃ.
tika-s0103t:176_1: Sukkoti na kiliṭṭho anupatāpakoti vuttaṃ “sukhoti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:177_3: kadāci sukkā dhammā”ti evaṃ ekasmiṃ santāne,
tika-s0103t:177_7: Yasmā ca te brāhmaṇā na ceva te dhamme atikkantā,
tika-s0103t:177_16: Te ca brāhmaṇā na evarūpā na edisā,
tika-s0103t:177_17: yādiso arahā ekadesenāpi tena tesaṃ sadisatābhāvato,
tika-s0103t:177_18: tasmā tena kāraṇena nesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ “brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo”ti vādaṃ viññū yathābhūtavādino buddhādayo ariyā nānujānanti.
tika-s0103t:178_0: Ārakattādīhīti ettha kilesānaṃ ārakattā pahīnabhāvato dūrattā arahaṃ,
tika-s0103t:178_8: Āsavānaṃ khīṇattāti catunnampi āsavānaṃ anavasesato pahīnattā.
tika-s0103t:179_3: yadariyā āvasiṃsu vā āvasanti vā āvasissanti vā.
tika-s0103t:179_6: bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno panuṇṇapaccekasacco samavayasaṭhesano
tika-s0103t:179_7: anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapañño. Ime kho,
tika-s0103t:180_3: taṃ etassa atthīti atisayavacanicchāvasena arahā “vusitavā”ti vutto.
tika-s0103t:180_4: Karaṇīyaṃ nāma pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanā dukkhassantaṃ kātukāmehi ekantato kattabbattā,
tika-s0103t:180_5: taṃ pana yasmā catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ catūsu saccesu kātabbaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0103t:180_16: tato sā eva sutte samudayasaccabhāvena vuttā,
tika-s0103t:180_18: Sammadaññā vimuttoti sammā aññāya jānanabhūtāya aggamaggapaññāya sammā yathābhūtaṃ yaṃ yathā jānitabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t:182_2: Tato eva tasmiṃ adhikaṃ nivisanato abhiniviṭṭhā.
tika-s0103t:183_2: etaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ tassa bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.
tika-s0103t:183_6: Musāvādaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhīti āgataphalassa ariyasāvakassa purato musā vattuṃ na visahi,
tika-s0103t:183_9: Sineruṃ kira parivāretvā ṭhito bhūmippadeso sattaratanamayo,
tika-s0103t:183_13: Kiṃ tvaṃ etthāti kiṃ kāraṇā tvaṃ ettha.
tika-s0103t:183_15: Ṭhātuṃ asakkontoti ariyasāvakassa purato ṭhātuṃ asakkonto.
tika-s0103t:183_17: yaṃ māropi nāma mahānubhāvo ujukaṃ paṭipparituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0103t:184_3: Bhagavato desanādhammaṃ nissāya ariyāya jātiyā jāto “bhagavantaṃ nissāya ariyabhūmiyaṃ jāto”ti vutto.
tika-s0103t:184_4: “Ure vasitvā”ti idaṃ dhammaghosassa urato samuṭṭhānatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:184_7: Kāraṇakāraṇepi hi kāraṇe viya vohāro hoti “tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddha”nti.
tika-s0103t:184_8: Keci pana “vimokkhamukhassa vasena jātattā mukhato jāto”ti vadanti,
tika-s0103t:184_11: mukhajoti tīsu sambandhesu mukhajena sambandhena bhagavato puttabhāvo vibhāvito.
tika-s0103t:184_13: Ariyadhammappattito laddhaviseso hutvā pavatto taduttarakāliko khandhasantāno “ariyadhammato jāto”ti veditabbo,
tika-s0103t:184_15: upanissāya ca jāto sabbopi dhammappabandho “ariyadhammato jāto”ti gahetabbo.
tika-s0103t:184_16: Tesaṃ pana ariyadhammānaṃ apariyositakiccatāya ariyabhāvena abhinibbattimattaṃ upādāya “ariyadhammato jātattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:184_22: Tathāgatassa anaññasādhāraṇasīlādidhammakkhandhassa samūhanivesavasena dhammakāyatāya na kiñci vattabbaṃ atthi,
tika-s0103t:184_23: satthuṭṭhāniyassa pana dhammakāyataṃ dassetuṃ “kasmā tathāgato dhammakāyoti vutto”ti sayameva pucchaṃ
tika-s0103t:184_25: Hadayena cintetvāti “imaṃ dhammaṃ imassa desessāmī”ti tassa upagatassa veneyyajanassa bodhanatthaṃ cittena cintetvā.
tika-s0103t:184_26: Vācāya abhinīharīti saddhammadesanāvācāya karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena veneyyasantānābhimukhaṃ tadajjhāsayānurūpaṃ hitamatthaṃ nīhari upanesi.
tika-s0103t:184_30: Idhādhippetadhammo seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtoti āha “dhammakāyattā eva brahmakāyo”ti.
tika-s0103t:184_31: Sabbaso adhammaṃ pajahitvā anavasesato dhammo eva bhūtoti dhammabhūto.
tika-s0103t:184_32: Tathārūpo ca yasmā sabhāvato dhammo evāti vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “dhammasabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0103t:185_6: “brāhmaṇā brahmuno puttā orasā mukhato jātā brahmajā”ti ca evaṃ pavattāya micchādiṭṭhiyā viniveṭhano
tika-s0103t:185_7: jātibrāhmaṇānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvassa chedanato seṭṭhacchedanavādo nāma hotīti dassetunti attho.
tika-s0103t:186_3: Maneneva nibbattāti bāhirapaccayena vinā kevalaṃ upacārajhānamanasāva nibbattā.
tika-s0103t:186_6: tasmā jhānaphalakappo tassā phalavisesoti āha “brahmaloke viyā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:186_7: “Sayaṃpabhā”ti padānaṃ tattha sūriyālokādīhi vinā andhakāraṃ vidhamantā sayameva pabhāsantīti sayaṃpabhā,
tika-s0103t:186_9: tadaññakāmāvacarasattānaṃ viya sarīrassa vicaraṇaṭṭhānassa asubhatābhāvato subhaṃ,
tika-s0103t:188_3: sā pana tasmiṃ udake patiṭṭhitā ahosīti āha “patiṭṭhahī”ti.
tika-s0103t:188_5: Makkhikaṇḍakarahitanti makkhikāhi ca tāsaṃ aṇḍakehi ca rahitaṃ.
tika-s0103t:189_1: Evaṃ ciraparicitalolatāvasena sabbapaṭhamaṃ tathā akāsīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:189_4: rasato pana kimevidaṃ bhavissatī”ti saṃsayajāto vadati.
tika-s0103t:191_3: Paccakkhabhūtānampi candimasūriyānaṃ pavattiyaṃ lokiyānaṃ sammoho hoti,
tika-s0103t:191_4: taṃ vidhamituṃ “ko pana tesa”ntiādinā aṭṭha pañhāvissajjanāni gahitāni.
tika-s0103t:191_7: “Ko uparī”ti eteneva ko heṭṭhāti ayamattho vuttoyeva.
tika-s0103t:191_8: Tathā “ko sīghaṃ gacchatī”ti iminā ko saṇikaṃ gacchatīti ayampi attho vuttoyeva.
tika-s0103t:191_12: Chandaṃ ñatvā vāti ruciṃ ñatvā viya.
tika-s0103t:193_0: Ujukanti āyāmato, vitthārato, ubbedhato ca. Parimaṇḍalatoti parikkhepato.
tika-s0103t:194_0: Ujukaṃ saṇikaṃ gacchati amāvāsiyaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ gacchanto divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ ohīyanto puṇṇamāsiyaṃ upaḍḍhamaggameva ohīyanato.
tika-s0103t:194_1: Tiriyaṃ sīghaṃ gacchati ekasmimpi māse kadāci dakkhiṇato,
tika-s0103t:194_8: Sūriyassa ujukaṃ gamanassa sīghatā candassa gamanaṃ upādāya veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:194_10: uttaradisato ca dakkhiṇadisāya gamanaṃ dandhaṃ chahi chahi māsehi ijjhanato.
tika-s0103t:194_12: Kāḷapakkhauposathatoti kāḷapakkhe uposathe candena saheva gantvā tato paraṃ.
tika-s0103t:194_18: “Cando anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā”ti idaṃ uparibhāgato patitasūriyālokatāya heṭṭhato pavattāya sūriyassa dūrabhāvena
tika-s0103t:194_19: divase divase anukkamena parihāyamānāya attano chāyāya vasena anukkamena candamaṇḍalappadesassa vaḍḍhamānassa
tika-s0103t:194_26: Anukkamena hāyitvāti ettha “anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā”ti ettha vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:194_27: Tattha pana chāyāya hāyamānatāya maṇḍalaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ viya dissati,
tika-s0103t:194_28: idha chāyāya vaḍḍhamānatāya maṇḍalaṃ hāyamānaṃ viya dissati.
tika-s0103t:195_0: Yāya vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakā devaputtā sūriyābhitāpasantattā attano vimānato na nikkhamanti,
tika-s0103t:195_2: tadā kira sūriyassa vimānaṃ pakatimaggato adho otaritvā vicarati,
tika-s0103t:195_3: tassa oruyha caraṇeneva candavimānampi adho oruyha carati taggatikattā,
tika-s0103t:195_4: tasmā sā vīthi udakābhāvena ajānurūpatāya “ajavīthī”ti samaññaṃ gatā.
tika-s0103t:195_5: Yāya pana vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakā devaputtā sūriyābhitāpābhāvato abhiṇhaṃ attano vimānato
tika-s0103t:195_6: bahi nikkhamitvā kīḷāpasutā ito cito ca vicaranti,
tika-s0103t:195_7: tadā kira sūriyavimānaṃ pakatimaggato uddhaṃ āruhitvā vicarati,
tika-s0103t:195_8: tassa uddhaṃ āruyha caraṇeneva candavimānampi uddhaṃ āruyha carati taggatikattā,
tika-s0103t:195_9: taggatikatā ca samānagatinā vātamaṇḍalena vimānassa phellitabbattā,
tika-s0103t:195_10: tasmā sā vīthi udakabahubhāvena nāgānurūpatāya “nāgavīthī”ti samaññaṃ gatā.
tika-s0103t:195_14: yathāruci ca vimānato nikkhamitvā sukhena vicaranti,
tika-s0103t:195_15: tena kālena kālaṃ vassanato loke utusamatā hoti,
tika-s0103t:195_16: tāya utusamatāya hetubhūtāya sā candimasūriyānaṃ gati gavānurūpatāya “govīthī”ti samaññaṃ gatā.
tika-s0103t:196_0: Evaṃ “kati nesaṃ vīthiyo”ti pañhaṃ vissajjetvā “kathaṃ vicarantī”ti pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ “candimasūriyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:196_1: Tattha sineruto bahi nikkhamantīti sinerusamīpena taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gacchantā tato gamanavīthito
tika-s0103t:196_3: Anto vicarantīti evaṃ cha māse khaṇe khaṇe sineruto apasakkanavasena tato nikkhamitvā cakkavāḷasamīpaṃ pattā,
tika-s0103t:196_4: tatopi cha māse khaṇe khaṇe apasakkanavasena nikkhamitvā sinerusamīpaṃ pāpuṇantā anto vicaranti.
tika-s0103t:196_5: Idāni tamevatthaṃ saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ “tehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:196_7: cakkavāḷassa ca yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ, tassa,
tika-s0103t:197_3: Tadā hi sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ uggacchantaṃ hutvāpi imasmiṃ dīpe ṭhitassa upaḍḍhameva dissati,
tika-s0103t:198_3: Ubhayānipi tāni devatānaṃ vasanakavimānānīti veditabbāni. Rā-
tika-s0103t:198_6: Dibbanti sattā kīḷanti jotanti etthāti divā.
tika-s0103t:198_7: Sattānaṃ āyuṃ minanto viya siyati antaṃ karotīti māso.
tika-s0103t:198_8: Taṃ taṃ kiriyaṃ arati vattetīti utu.
tika-s0103t:198_10: dhammappavattiñca saṅgamma vadanto viya sarati vattetīti saṃvaccharo.
tika-s0103t:199_8: Atimānappaccayāti dubbaṇṇavambhanavasena atikkamma attano vaṇṇaṃ paṭicca mānapaccayā,
tika-s0103t:199_10: Sātisayo raso etissā atthīti rasāti laddhamānāya,
tika-s0103t:203_2: nīvāro viya sañjāto hutvā nippajjanakoti attho.
tika-s0103t:203_9: Yasmiṃ ṭhāne sāyaṃ pakko sāli gahito,
tika-s0103t:203_10: tadeva ṭhānaṃ dutiyadivase pāto pakkena sālinā paripuṇṇaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti āha “sāyaṃ gahitaṭṭhānaṃ pāto pakkaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:203_11: Alāyitanti lāyitaṭṭhānampi tesaṃ kammappaccayā alāyitameva hutvā anūnaṃ paripuṇṇameva paññāyati,
tika-s0103t:205_1: “Manussakāle”ti idaṃ pubbe manussabhūtānaṃyeva tattha idāni nikantivasena uppatti hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:205_2: devatānampi purimajātiyaṃ itthibhāve ṭhitānaṃ tattha virāgādipurisattappaccaye asati tadā itthiliṅgameva pātubhavati.
tika-s0103t:205_13: na sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ sakkā’ti evaṃ itthibhāvavirajjanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:205_14: ‘yathāvuttaādīnavavirahato uttamapakatibhāvato sampadamidaṃ purisattaṃ nāma seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ,
tika-s0103t:205_15: ettha ṭhatvā sakkā etā sampattiyo sampāpuṇitu’nti evaṃ purisattabhāve sambhāvanāpubbakaṃ patthanāṭhapanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:205_20: samparāyikañca suvipulaṃ anatthaṃ acintetvā purisassa kāmesu micchācaraṇaṃ kevalaṃ itthiyaṃ āsāpatti phalenevāti āsāāpatti itthibhāvāvahāpi hotiyeva.
tika-s0103t:205_21: Tanninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena tannikantiyā nimittabhāvāpattitoti vuttaṃ “puriso itthattabhāvaṃ labhanto kāmesumicchācāraṃ nissāya labhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:208_1: Gomayapiṇḍamattampi nālatthāti sammadeva vivāhakammaṃ nālatthāti adhippāyena vadanti.
tika-s0103t:208_2: Pātabyatanti tasmiṃ asaddhamme kilesakāmena pivitabbataṃ kiñci pivitabbavatthuṃ pivantā viya ativiya tosetvā paribhuñjitabbataṃ āpajjiṃsu,
tika-s0103t:211_2: ayaṃ bhūmibhāgo asukassā”ti evaṃ paricchedaṃ kareyyāma.
tika-s0103t:211_3: Taṃ aggaṃ katvāti taṃ ādiṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t:215_2: Sā hi mahājanena sammatoti niddhāretvā vattabbato nirutti,
tika-s0103t:215_10: Na kevalaṃ akkharamevāti na kevalaṃ samaññākaraṇameva.
tika-s0103t:215_11: Khettasāminoti taṃ taṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ pariggahetvā ṭhitasattā.
tika-s0103t:215_12: Tīhi saṅkhehīti tividhakiriyābhisaṅkhatehi tīhi saṅkhehi khattiyādīhi tīhi vaṇṇehi pariggahitehi.
tika-s0103t:215_18: abhedopacārena pana akkharassa khattiyasaddassapi seṭṭhatāti pāḷiyaṃ “aggaññena akkharenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:215_19: Idāni abhedopacārena vinā eva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “agge vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:217_2: tameva tāva dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “vītaṅgārā”tiādi vuttanti tadatthaṃ dassento “pacitvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:217_7: ye tathā ganthe kātuṃ na jānanti.
tika-s0103t:217_13: Seṭṭhasammataṃ jātaṃ “vedadharā sottiyā subrāhmaṇāti evaṃ seṭṭhasammataṃ jātaṃ.
tika-s0103t:218_1: Methunadhammaṃ samādiyitvāti jāyāpatikabhāvena dvayaṃ dvayaṃ nivāsaṃ ajjhupagantvā.
tika-s0103t:219_5: iti garahaṇattheti āha “suddaṃ suddaṃ lahuṃ lahuṃ kucchitaṃ gacchantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:220_1: Ahūti kālavipallāsavasena vuttanti dassento “hoti kho”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:220_3: catūhi maṇḍalehi samaṇamaṇḍalassa abhinibbatti hotī”ti iminā vacanena.
tika-s0103t:220_8: evaṃ sante imāneva cattāri maṇḍalāni padhānāni,
tika-s0103t:220_20: tasmā samaṇamaṇḍalanti ca sāsanikameva samaṇagaṇaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:222_4: yena yanti puttino visokā”tiādinā pavattitassa micchādiṭṭhisahagatakammassa.
tika-s0103t:223_4: Ekakkhaṇe ubhayavipākadānaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi ekasmiṃ khaṇe cittadvayūpasañhitāya sattasantatiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0103t:223_8: Dvepihi kusalākusalakammāni katūpacitāni sabhāvato balavantāneva honti,
tika-s0103t:223_13: tasmā katūpacitabhāvena samānabalesupi kusalākusalesu paccayalābhena vipaccituṃ laddhokāsatāya kusalato akusalaṃ balavataraṃ hotīti,
tika-s0103t:223_14: tathābhūtampi taṃ yathā vipākadāne laddhokāsassa kusalassāpi avasaro hoti,
tika-s0103t:223_15: tathā laddhapaccayaṃ paṭisandhidānābhimukhaṃ kusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattāpetīti.
tika-s0103t:223_16: “Akusalaṃ balavataraṃ hotī”ti ettha “akusalaṃ ce balavataraṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:223_17: taṃ kusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti vuttanayeneva atthaṃ vatvā tesu kusalaṃ ce balavataraṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:223_20: atha naṃ taṃ kāṇampi karoti khujjampi pīṭhasappimpi kucchirogādīhi vā upaddutaṃ.
tika-s0103t:223_21: Evaṃ so pavattiyaṃ nānappakāraṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhavatīti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:223_23: vuttakāle vā kārena samānabalesu kusalākusalakammesu upaṭṭhahantesu maraṇassa āsannavelāyaṃ yadi balavatarāni kusalajavanāni javanti,
tika-s0103t:223_24: yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ akusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā kusalaṃ vuttanayena paṭisandhiṃ deti.
tika-s0103t:223_26: yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ kusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā akusalaṃ vuttanayeneva paṭisandhiṃ deti.
tika-s0103t:225_4: taṃsabhāvato ca tassā pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā,
tika-s0103t:225_8: Bhāvanaṃ anugantvāti anukkamena pavattaṃ bhāvanaṃ patvā.
tika-s0103t:225_10: Saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā vasena khīṇāsavassa seṭṭhabhāvaṃ lokassa pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0103t:225_11: na itarāya sabbaso apaññattibhāvūpagamane tassa adassanatoti vuttaṃ “parinibbātīti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:227_2: Suttantaṃ vinivattetvāti pubbe lokiyadhammasandassanavasena pavattaṃ aggaññasuttaṃ “sattannaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ
tika-s0103t:227_3: dhammānaṃ bhāvanamanvāyā”tiādinā tato vinivattetvā nīharitvā tena asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t:229_1: Pāvārenti sañchādenti sarīraṃ etenāti pāvāro, vatthaṃ.
tika-s0103t:229_4: so etassa bahuvidho anekakoṭippabhedo bhaṇḍabhūto atthīti dussapāvāriko.
tika-s0103t:229_5: So kira pubbe daharakāle dussapāvārabhaṇḍameva bahuṃ pariggahetvā vāṇijjaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0103t:229_6: tena naṃ seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhitampi “pāvāriko” tveva sañjānanti.
tika-s0103t:229_10: tena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā therena vuttavacanaṃ sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0103t:229_11: “Kasmā evaṃ avocā”ti tathāvacane kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā “somanassapavedanattha”nti kasmā payojanaṃ vissajjitaṃ,
tika-s0103t:229_14: Yā hissa therassa tadā bhagavati somanassuppatti,
tika-s0103t:229_17: sā eva ca yasmā niddhāritarūpā pavedanavasena bhagavato sammukhā tathāvacanaṃ payojeti,
tika-s0103t:231_0: Samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “aho santo vatāyaṃ ariyavihāro”ti samāpattisukhapaccavekkhaṇamukhena attano guṇe anussarituṃ āraddho,
tika-s0103t:231_1: ārabhitvā ca nesaṃ taṃ taṃ sāmaññavisesavibhāgavasena anussari.
tika-s0103t:231_2: Tathā hi “samādhī”ti sāmaññato gahitasseva “paṭhamaṃ jhāna”ntiādinā visesavibhāgo,
tika-s0103t:231_4: “Lokiyābhiññāsu dibbacakkhuñāṇasseva gahaṇaṃ therassa itarehi sātisayanti dassetu”nti vadanti,
tika-s0103t:231_6: lakkhaṇahāravasena vā itaresaṃ pettha gahitatā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:232_1: Tathā dhammappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
tika-s0103t:232_3: Paṭibhānappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthāna karaṇasamatthaṃ paṭibhāne pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
tika-s0103t:232_7: Sāvakavisaye paramukkaṃsagataṃ ñāṇaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya sabbañeyyadhammesu.
tika-s0103t:232_8: Tassāpi hi visuṃ parikammaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0103t:232_9: sāvakapāramiyā pana sammadeva paripūritattā aggamaggasamadhigamenevassa samadhigamo hoti.
tika-s0103t:232_10: Sabbaññutaññāṇasseva sammāsambuddhānaṃ yāva nisinnapallaṅkā anussaratoti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:233_0: Bhagavato sīlaṃ nissāya guṇe anussaritumāraddhoti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:233_1: Yasmā guṇānaṃ bahubhāvato nesaṃ ekajjhaṃ āpāthāgamanaṃ natthi,
tika-s0103t:233_2: sati ca tasmiṃ anirūpitarūpeneva anussaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t:233_3: tasmā thero savisaye ṭhatvā te anupadaṃ sarūpato anussari,
tika-s0103t:233_8: Yasmā cettha thero ekekavasena bhagavato guṇe anussaritvā tato paraṃ catukkapañcakādivasena anussari,
tika-s0103t:233_9: tasmā “cattāro iddhipāde”ti vatvā tato paraṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanāsāmaññena indriyesu vattabbesu tāni aggahetvā “cattāro magge”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:234_1: Cha sāraṇīya dhammā parinibbānasutte āgatā eva.
tika-s0103t:234_3: “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādinā saṃ. ni. 5.1081, mahāva. 15, paṭi. ma.
tika-s0103t:234_4: 2.30) catūsu ariyasaccesu tiparivattavasena āgatā dvādasa dhammacakkākārā.
tika-s0103t:235_3: Imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatti,
tika-s0103t:235_6: Imehi chahi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato natthi chandassa hāni,
tika-s0103t:235_12: Imehi dvādasahi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato natthi davā,
tika-s0103t:236_1: Natthi ravāti sahasā kiriyā natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0103t:236_8: Keci pana “natthi dhammadesanāya hānī”ti apaṭhitvā “natthi chandassa hāni,
tika-s0103t:237_0: Jarāmaraṇādīsu ekādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu paccekaṃ catusaccayojanāvasena pavattāni catucattālīsa
tika-s0103t:238_0: “Yato kho bhikkhave ariyasāvako evaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0103t:239_0: Jarāmaraṇasamudayoti cettha jāti adhippetā. Sesapadesu bhavādayo veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:241_7: tampi khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhamma”nti ñāṇanti evaṃ jarāmaraṇādīsu ekādasasu
tika-s0103t:241_8: paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu paccekaṃ satta satta katvā sattasattati ñāṇavatthūni veditabbāni.
tika-s0103t:241_9: Tattha yampīti chabbidhampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vipassanārammaṇabhāvena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:241_10: Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti chapi ñāṇāni saṅkhipitvā vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:241_12: vipassanādassanato vipassanā paṭivipassanādassanamattamevāti na taṃ “aṅga”nti vadanti,
tika-s0103t:241_13: pāḷiyaṃ pana sabbattha ñāṇavasena aṅgānaṃ vuttattā “nirodhadhammanti ñāṇa”nti iti-
tika-s0103t:241_14: saddena pakāsetvā vuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ sattamaṃ ñāṇanti ayamattho dissati.
tika-s0103t:241_16: tampi ñāṇanti sambandho hoti ñāṇaggahaṇena etasmiṃ ñāṇabhāvadassanassa anadhippetattā,
tika-s0103t:241_20: vajirañāṇanti ettha keci tāva āhu “bhagavā devasikaṃ dvādasakoṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0103t:242_2: arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ dve vitakkā bahulaṃ samudācaranti –
tika-s0103t:243_0: Khemavitakko hi bhagavato mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ pūretvā ṭhito,
tika-s0103t:243_5: Pañca rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo catasso arūpasamāpattiyo appamaññāsamāpattiyā saddhiṃ dasa,
tika-s0103t:243_7: arahattaphalasamāpatti cāti dvādasetā samāpattiyo bhagavā paccekaṃ divase divase koṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ purebhattaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0103t:244_0: Apare pana “yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhidivase pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādamukhena paṭilomanayena
tika-s0103t:244_1: jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anupadadhammavipassanaṃ ārabhantena yathā nāma puriso suviduggaṃ
tika-s0103t:244_2: mahāgahanaṃ mahāvanaṃ chindanto antarantarā nisānasilāyaṃ pharasuṃ sunisitaṃ karoti,
tika-s0103t:244_3: evameva nisānasilāsadisiyo samāpattiyo antarantarā samāpajjitvā ñāṇassa tikkhavisadasūrabhāvaṃ sampādetuṃ
tika-s0103t:244_4: anulomapaṭilomato paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgavasena sammasanto divase divase lakkhakoṭilakkhakoṭiphalasamāpattiyo
tika-s0103t:244_8: Nanu bhagavato samāpattisamāpajjane parikamme payojanaṃ natthīti?
tika-s0103t:244_10: Tathā hi vedanāpaṭippaṇāmanādīsu savisesaṃ parikammapubbaṅgamena samāpattiyo samāpajji.
tika-s0103t:245_4: Upanissaye ṭhatvāti ñāṇūpanissaye ṭhatvā yādiso pubbūpanissayo pubbayogo,
tika-s0103t:245_6: Mahantato saddahati paṭipakkhavigamena ñāṇassa viya saddhāyapi tikkhavisadabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0103t:245_8: Asīti mahātherā paramatthadīpaniyaṃ theragāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ nāmato uddhaṭā.
tika-s0103t:245_11: Sāriputtattheratopi eko paccekabuddho tikkhavisadañāṇo abhinīhāramahantatāya sambhatañāṇasambhārattā.
tika-s0103t:245_12: Satipi paccekabodhiyā avisesesu bahūsu ekajjhaṃ sannipatitesu pubbayogavasena lokiye visaye siyā kassaci
tika-s0103t:245_14: “Sabbaññubuddhova buddhaguṇe mahantato saddahatī”ti idaṃ heṭṭhā āgatadesanāsotavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:245_15: Buddhā hi buddhaguṇe mahattaṃ paccakkhatova passanti,
tika-s0103t:246_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “seyyathāpi nāmā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:246_1: Gambhīro uttānoti gambhīro vā uttāno vāti jānanatthaṃ.
tika-s0103t:246_3: Buddhaguṇesu appamattavisayampi lokiyamahājanassa ñāṇaṃ apavattitarūpeneva pavattati anavattitasabhāvattāti vuttaṃ “ekabyāma…pe…
tika-s0103t:246_5: Tattha ñātaudakaṃ viyāti pamāṇato ñātaudakaṃ viya.
tika-s0103t:246_6: Ariyānaṃ pana tattha attano visaye pavattanakañāṇaṃ pavattitarūpeneva pavattati attano paṭivedhānurūpaṃ,
tika-s0103t:246_9: mahānubhāvañca hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ sotāpannañāṇassa dasabyāmaudakaṃ opammabhāvena dassetvā tato
tika-s0103t:246_10: paresaṃ dasuttaradiguṇadasaguṇaasītiguṇavisiṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ opammaṃ katvā dassitaṃ.
tika-s0103t:246_12: therena ca te paricchijja ñātāti āpajjatīti?
tika-s0103t:246_14: Tattha so purisoti so caturāsītibyāmasahassappamāṇena yottena caturāsītibyāmasahassaṭṭhāne mahāsamudde udakaṃ minitvā ṭhito puriso.
tika-s0103t:246_17: Tañhi siddhaṃ dhammaṃ anugantvā pavattanato “dhammanvayo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:246_20: nidassane diṭṭhanayena anumeyyaṃ gaṇhātīti “nayaggāho”ti ca vuccati.
tika-s0103t:246_22: Svāyaṃ dhammanvayo na yassa kassaci hoti,
tika-s0103t:246_23: atha kho tathārūpassa aggasāvakassevāti āha “sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:246_24: Yadi thero buddhaguṇe ekadesato paccakkhe katvā tadaññe nayaggāhena gaṇhi,
tika-s0103t:246_25: nanu evaṃ sante buddhaguṇā parimitaparicchinnā āpannāti?
tika-s0103t:247_2: Kathaṃ panāyamattho evaṃ daṭṭhabboti evaṃ adhippāyabhedakaṃ upamāya saññāpetuṃ “yathā kathaṃ viyā”tiādi
tika-s0103t:247_3: vuttaṃ “upamāyamidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānantī”ti ito nava ito navāti ito majjhaṭṭhānato
tika-s0103t:247_4: yāva dakkhiṇatīrā nava ito majjhaṭṭhānato yāva uttaratīrā nava.
tika-s0103t:248_0: Yamakayugaḷamahānadīmahogho viyāti dvinnaṃ ekato samāgatattā yugaḷabhūtānaṃ mahānadīnaṃ mahogho viya.
tika-s0103t:249_0: Anucchavikaṃ katvāti yoyaṃ mama pasādo buddhaguṇe ārabbha ogāḷho hutvā uppanno,
tika-s0103t:249_2: Paṭiggahetuṃ sampaṭicchituṃ añño koci na sakkhissati yāthāvato anavabujjhanato.
tika-s0103t:249_10: “Pasanno”ti iminā pasādassa vattamānatā dīpitāti “uppannasaddho”ti imināpi saddhāya paccuppannatā pakāsitāti āha “evaṃ saddahāmīti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:249_13: so eva atisayavacanicchāvasena “bhiyyobhiññataro”ti vuttoti āha “bhiyyataro abhiññāto”ti.
tika-s0103t:249_18: svāyamassa atisayo abhiññāya bhiyyobhāvakatoti āha “bhiyyatarābhiñño vā”ti.
tika-s0103t:249_27: nanu heṭṭhimānipi bhagavato maggañāṇāni savāsanameva yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanavasena pavattāni.
tika-s0103t:249_30: taṃ pana aparipuṇṇaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanassa vippakatabhāvatoti āha “arahattamaggañāṇe vā”ti.
tika-s0103t:249_31: Aggamaggavasena cettha ariyānaṃ bodhittayapāripūrīti dassetuṃ “arahattamaggeneva hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:249_33: Gahitā hontīti arahattamaggena gahitena adhigatena gahitā adhigatā honti.
tika-s0103t:250_10: Vijjāṭṭhānesu kataparicayānaṃ ācariyānaṃ taṃ tamatthaṃ viññāpentī paveṇī ācariyaparamparā.
tika-s0103t:250_11: Kevalaṃ attano matiyā “itikira evaṃkirā”ti parikappanā itikira.
tika-s0103t:250_12: Piṭakassa ganthassa sampadānato sayaṃ sampadānabhāvena gahaṇaṃ piṭakasampadānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:250_15: Āgamādhigamehi vinā takkamaggaṃ nissāya takkanaṃ takko.
tika-s0103t:250_17: Yasmā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā bhagavato ayaṃ therassa codanā,
tika-s0103t:251_1: Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato tattha anuyogaṃ sodheti nāma.
tika-s0103t:251_7: so eva tattha anuyogaṃ detīti yujjati.
tika-s0103t:251_11: Sabbe teti sabbe te atīte niruddhe sammāsambuddhe,
tika-s0103t:251_13: ye te ahesuṃ atītaṃ addhānaṃ tava abhinīhārato oraṃ sammāsambuddhā,
tika-s0103t:251_14: tesaṃ tāva sāvakañāṇagocare dhamme paricchindanto mārādayo viya buddhānaṃ lokiyacittacāraṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi.
tika-s0103t:251_15: Ye pana te abbhatītā tato parato chinnavaṭumā chinnapapañcā pariyādiṇṇavaṭṭā sabbadukkhavītivattā sammāsambuddhā,
tika-s0103t:251_16: tesaṃ sabbesampi sāvakañāṇassa avisayabhūte dhamme kathaṃ jānissasīti.
tika-s0103t:252_2: tena atītesu tāva khandhānaṃ bhūtapubbattā tattha siyā ñāṇassa savisaye gati,
tika-s0103t:252_3: anāgatesu pana sabbaso asañjātesu kathanti imamatthaṃ joteti.
tika-s0103t:252_6: nanu atītānāgate sattāhe eva pavattaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa visayo,
tika-s0103t:253_0: Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti sikkhāpadeneva tādisassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhittattā,
tika-s0103t:253_2: Kathaṃ pana thero dvayasambhave paṭikkhepameva akāsi,
tika-s0103t:254_1: Anumānañāṇaṃ viya saṃsayapiṭṭhikaṃ ahutvā “idamida”nti yathāsabhāvato ñeyyaṃ dhāreti nicchinotīti dhammo,
tika-s0103t:254_4: Paccakkhasiddhañhi atthaṃ anugantvā anumānañāṇassa pavatti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa anumānanti veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:254_5: Vidite vedakampi ñāṇaṃ atthato viditameva hotīti “anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:254_12: eteneva thero yaṃ yaṃ anumeyyamatthaṃ ñātukāmo hoti,
tika-s0103t:254_20: Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā thero attānaṃ dassetīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0103t:254_26: Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti ṭhānuppattikā,
tika-s0103t:254_33: So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha “dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0103t:255_3: Uppannāya paññāya nīvaraṇehi na kiñci kātuṃ sakkāti āha “anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na dentī”ti.
tika-s0103t:255_5: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittāti catubbidhāyapi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sammadeva ṭhapitacittā.
tika-s0103t:255_6: Yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvāti aviparītasabhāvena yathā paṭipakkhā samucchijjanti,
tika-s0103t:256_1: bojjhaṅgā ca missakā adhippetāti tato aññathā vattuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:256_3: “Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā”tiādito vuttattā satipaṭṭhāne vipassanāti gahetvā “satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā”ti vuttattā,
tika-s0103t:256_5: tesu ca sabbaso adhigatesu lokanāthena sabbaññutaññāṇampi adhigatameva hotīti “bojjhaṅge maggo,
tika-s0103t:256_6: sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyyā”ti mahāsivatthero āha,
tika-s0103t:257_3: Pākāro viya sīlaṃ tadupagatānaṃ parito ārakkhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:257_5: Vuttañhetaṃ “pariyāyapathoti kho bhikkhu hiriyā etaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0103t:257_7: Paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati nibbānanagarapaviṭṭhapavisanakānaṃ sattānaṃ sallakkhaṇato.
tika-s0103t:258_3: “Pañcanavutipāsaṇḍe”ti idaṃ yasmā thero paribbājako hutvā tato pubbeva nibbānapariyesanaṃ caramāno te te pāsaṇḍino upasaṅkamitvā nibbānaṃ pucchi,
tika-s0103t:258_6: Te pana pāsaṇḍā heṭṭhā vuttā eva.
tika-s0103t:258_8: Parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ hatthagataṃ akāsi adhigacchi.
tika-s0103t:258_9: Uttaruttaranti heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa uttaraṇato atikkamanato uttaruttaraṃ,
tika-s0103t:258_16: Savipakkhaṃ katvāti pahātabbapahāyakabhāvadassanavasena yathākkamaṃ ubhayaṃ savipakkhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t:258_18: imassa ayaṃ pahāyako”ti evaṃ kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā desanāvasena nīharitvā sukkaṃ,
tika-s0103t:258_20: iminā ayaṃ pahātabbo”ti evaṃ sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:259_0: Tasmiṃ desite dhammeti tasmiṃ vuttanayena bhagavā tumhehi desite dhamme ekaccaṃ dhammaṃ nāma sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā.
tika-s0103t:259_8: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāneti “dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ agama”nti imasmiṃ padese,
tika-s0103t:259_10: “Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne buddhaguṇesu niṭṭhaṅgato”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:259_11: nanu sāvakapāramiñāṇasamadhigatakāle eva thero buddhaguṇesu niṭṭhaṅgatoti?
tika-s0103t:259_13: idāni pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ jātanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:259_15: Arahatte niṭṭhaṅgatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva anuyogaparihārā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:259_16: Yadipi dhammasenāpati “sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ mayā samadhigata”nti ito pubbepi jānātiyeva,
tika-s0103t:259_17: idāni pana asaṅkhyeyyāparimeyyabhede buddhaguṇe nayaggāhavasena pariggahetvā kiccasiddhiyā tasmiṃ ñāṇe
tika-s0103t:260_1: te nayaggāhato yāthāvato jānanto sāvakapāramiñāṇe tathājānanavasena niṭṭhaṅgatattā sāvakapāramiñāṇameva tassa aparāparuppattivasena,
tika-s0103t:260_2: tena tena bhāvetabbakiccabahutāvasena ca “dhammesū”ti puthuvacanena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:260_3: Anantāparimeyyānaṃ anaññavisayānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ nayato pariggaṇhanena therassa sātisayo bhagavati pasādo uppajjatīti āha “bhiyyosomattāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:260_4: “Suṭṭhu akkhāto”ti vatvā taṃ evassa suṭṭhu akkhātataṃ dassetuṃ “niyyāniko maggo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:260_11: Rāgadosamohanimmadanasamatthoti idhāpi “pasannosmi bhagavatīti dassetī”ti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0103t:260_16: saṅghasuppaṭipatti ca dhammesu niṭṭhaṅgamanena sāvakapāramiñāṇe niṭṭhaṅgatattā mayhaṃ suṭṭhu vibhūtā
tika-s0103t:260_17: supākaṭā jātāti dassento thero “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo,
tika-s0103t:262_5: Yasmā tassāpi guṇassa kiñci uttaritaraṃ natthi eva,
tika-s0103t:262_6: tasmā vuttaṃ “sā tumhākaṃ desanā anuttarāti vadatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:262_15: nanu chekaṭṭhenapi kusalaṃ icchitabbaṃ “kusalo tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgāna”ntiādīsūti ?
tika-s0103t:262_17: so pana chekaṭṭho kosallasambhūtaṭṭheneva saṅgahitoti visuṃ na gahito.
tika-s0103t:262_19: kacci bhoto anāmaya”nti jātake āgatattā “jātakapariyāyaṃ patvā ārogyaṭṭhena kusalaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:262_22: ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vā sāvajjā vā anavajjā vā”tiādīsu suttapadesesu “kusalā”ti vuttadhammā eva
tika-s0103t:262_23: “anavajjā”ti vuttāti āha “suttantapariyāyaṃ patvā anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:262_24: Abhidhamme “kosalla”nti paññā āgatāti yonisomanasikārahetukassa kusalassa kosallasammūtaṭṭho,
tika-s0103t:262_26: “kusalassa katattā upacitattā”ti vatvā iṭṭhavipākaniddisanato sukhavipākaṭṭho ca abhidhammanayasiddhoti āha “abhidhamma…pe…
tika-s0103t:262_28: Bāhitikasutte bhagavato kāyasamācārādike vaṇṇentena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “yo kho mahārāja kāyasamācāro
tika-s0103t:262_29: anavajjo”ti kusalo kāyasamācāro rañño pasenadissa vutto.
tika-s0103t:262_30: Na hi bhagavato sukhavipākakammaṃ atthīti sabbasāvajjarahitā kāyasamācārādayo “kusalā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0103t:262_32: te ca samathavipassanā maggasampayuttā ekantena sukhavipākā evāti avajjarahitatāmattaṃ upādāya anavajjattho kusala-
tika-s0103t:262_35: Evañca katvā “phalasatipaṭṭhānaṃ pana idha anadhippeta”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti savipākasseva gahaṇanti katvā.
tika-s0103t:265_0: Sāsanassa pariyosānadassanatthanti sāsanaṃ nāma nippariyāyato sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā.
tika-s0103t:266_0: Puna etadānuttariyaṃ bhanteti yathāraddhāya desanāya nigamanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:266_1: Vuttasseva atthassa puna vacanañhi nigamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:266_2: Taṃ desananti taṃ kusalesu dhammesu desanāppakāraṃ,
tika-s0103t:266_5: sakalaṃ vā sampuṇṇaṃ anavasesaṃ abhijānāti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānāti,
tika-s0103t:266_6: asesaṃ abhijānanato eva uttari upari abhiññeyyaṃ natthi.
tika-s0103t:266_8: Añño paramatthavasena dhammo vā paññattivasena puggalo vā ayaṃ nāma yaṃ bhagavā na jānātīti idaṃ natthi
tika-s0103t:266_9: na upalabbhati sabbasseva sammadeva tumhehi abhiññātattā.
tika-s0103t:270_3: Pavisatīti paccayavasena tattha nibbattento pavisanto viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:270_5: tathābhūto ca tattha vasanto viya hotīti āha “vasatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:270_6: Pakatilokiyamanussānaṃ paṭhamā gabbhāvakkantīti pacuramanussānaṃ gabbhāvakkanti desanāvasena idha paṭhamā.
tika-s0103t:272_0: Khipituṃ na sakkontīti tathā vātānaṃ anuppajjanameva vadati.
tika-s0103t:274_3: tāni eva aññamaññassa asaṃkiṇṇarūpena ṭhitattā ādesanavidhā,
tika-s0103t:274_9: nimittappattassa lābhālābhādiādisanavidhidassanassa pavattattā “idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:274_10: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “evampi te mano”tiādinā parassa cittādisanameva āgataṃ,
tika-s0103t:274_12: Tathā hi “idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti vuttasseva atthassa vibhāvanavasena vatthu āgataṃ.
tika-s0103t:274_18: itaresampi vā savanavasena parassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathentānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā.
tika-s0103t:275_7: evaṃ vakkhāmīti vitakkayato vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma uppajjatī”ti āgatattā jāgarantānaṃ pakatiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ
tika-s0103t:275_12: sutvā ādisatīti sutte vutta”nti ānandācariyo avoca.
tika-s0103t:275_14: accāsannappadese ṭhitassa ca maṃsasotassāpi āpāthaṃ gacchatīti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0103t:275_17: Evaṃ ayampi ādesanavidhā cetopariyañāṇavaseneva āgatāti veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:275_18: Keci pana “tassa vasenāti tassa saddassa vasenā”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0103t:275_23: Eteneva yadeke “yaṃ vitakkayatoti yamatthaṃ vitakkayato”ti vatvā “tassa vasenāti tassa atthassa vasenā”ti vaṇṇenti,
tika-s0103t:276_9: adhigatamaggo ca aññaṃ tadatthāya paṭipajjantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ iminā nīhārena paṭipajjanto addhā jhānaṃ labhissati,
tika-s0103t:276_10: maggaṃ adhigamissatī”ti abhiññāya vinā anumānavasena jānāti,
tika-s0103t:277_0: Kiṃ panidaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ parassa cittaṃ paricchijja jānantaṃ iddhicittabhāvato avisesato sabbesampi cittaṃ jānātīti?
tika-s0103t:277_2: Na ariyānanti yena cittena te ariyā nāma jātā,
tika-s0103t:277_4: Yathā hi puthujjano sabbesampi ariyānaṃ lokuttaracittaṃ na jānāti appaṭividdhattā,
tika-s0103t:277_5: evaṃ ariyopi heṭṭhimo uparimassa lokuttaracittaṃ na jānāti appaṭividdhattā eva.
tika-s0103t:277_6: Yathā pana uparimo heṭṭhimaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ na samāpajjati,
tika-s0103t:277_7: kiṃ evaṃ so tassa lokuttaracittaṃ na jānātīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “uparimo pana heṭṭhimassa jānātī”ti,
tika-s0103t:277_9: “Uparimo heṭṭhimaṃ na samāpajjatī”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “tesañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:279_3: Ātappanti vīriyaṃ ātappati kosajjaṃ sabbampi saṃkilesapakkhanti.
tika-s0103t:279_8: Īdisānaṃ padānaṃ bahulaṃkattuvisayatāya icchitabbattā ātappapadassa viya itaresampi kattusādhanatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0103t:279_15: dassanasamāpatti nāma karajakāye paṭikkūlākārassa sammadeva dassanavasena pavattasamāpattibhāvato.
tika-s0103t:279_17: dassanamaggaphalabhāvato ca paṭhamasāmaññaphalaṃ pariyāyena vinā dassanasamāpatti.
tika-s0103t:280_0: Atikkamma chavimaṃsalohitaṃ aṭṭhiṃ paccavekkhatīti tāni apaccavekkhitvā aṭṭhimeva paccavekkhati.
tika-s0103t:280_1: Aṭṭhiārammaṇā dibbacakkhupādakajjhānasamāpattīti vuttanayena aṭṭhiārammaṇā dibbacakkhuadhiṭṭhānā paṭhamajjhānasamāpatti.
tika-s0103t:280_2: Yo hi bhikkhu ālokakasiṇe catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatadibbacakkhuñāṇo hutvā
tika-s0103t:280_3: saviññāṇake kāye aṭṭhiṃ pariggahetvā tattha paṭikkūlamanasikāravasena paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-s0103t:280_8: Tattha vā kataparicayassa sukheneva vuttanayā aṭṭhipaccavekkhaṇā samijjhatīti.
tika-s0103t:280_13: Sātisayaṃ catusaccadassanāgamanato pariyāyena vinā mukhyā dutiyā dassanasamāpatti.
tika-s0103t:280_14: Yāva tatiyamaggā vattatīti āha “khīṇāsavassa vasena catutthā dassanasamāpatti kathitā”ti.
tika-s0103t:281_2: tena yathāvuttasamāpattidvayato vuccamānaṃyeva imassa visesaṃ joteti.
tika-s0103t:281_4: tadetaṃ viññāṇaṃ purimato anantarapaccayaṃ labhitvā pacchimassa anantarapaccayo hutvā pavattatīti ayaṃ assa sotāgatatāya sotasadisatā,
tika-s0103t:281_5: tasmā pajānitabbabhāvena vuttaṃ ekameva cettha viññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:281_11: Viññāṇassa khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantassa kāmaṃ natthi kassaci patiṭṭhitatā,
tika-s0103t:283_7: Kammabhavaṃ ākaḍḍhantanti kammaviññāṇaṃ attanā sampayuttakammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhinibbattanena tadabhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhantaṃ.
tika-s0103t:283_8: Teneva paṭisandhinibbattanasāmatthiyena paraloke patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma attano phalassa tattha patiṭṭhāpanena.
tika-s0103t:283_9: Keci pana “abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ parato vipākaṃ dātuṃ asamatthaṃ idhaloke patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma,
tika-s0103t:283_10: dātuṃ samatthaṃ pana paraloke patiṭṭhitaṃ nāmā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0103t:283_14: Na hi tassa idhaloke patiṭṭhitabhāvena vinā paraloke patiṭṭhitabhāvo sambhavati.
tika-s0103t:284_0: Catutthāya dassanasamāpattiyā tatiyadassanasamāpattiyaṃ vuttappaṭikkhepena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:285_0: Purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pubbe samathavasena atthassa vuttattā idāni vipassanāvasena dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:285_2: Atthantaratthatāya dassiyamānāya padaṃ calitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0103t:285_3: Aparo nayoti ettha paṭhamajjhānassa paṭhamadassanasamāpattibhāve apubbaṃ natthi.
tika-s0103t:285_4: Dutiyajjhānaṃ dutiyāti ettha pana “aṭṭhikavaṇṇakasiṇavasena paṭiladdhadutiyajjhānaṃ dutiyā dassanasamāpattī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0103t:285_6: Dassanasamāpattibhāvo pana yo bhikkhu ālokakasiṇe catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatadibbacakkhuko
tika-s0103t:285_7: hutvā saviññāṇake aṭṭhiṃ pariggahetvā tattha vaṇṇakasiṇavasena heṭṭhimāni tīṇi jhānāni nibbatteti, tassa.
tika-s0103t:285_8: Tatiyajjhānaṃ tatiyā dassanasamāpatti adhiṭṭhānabhūtassa dibbacakkhuñāṇassa vasena.
tika-s0103t:285_9: Catutthajjhānaṃ catutthāti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatadibbacakkhuñāṇassa
tika-s0103t:285_11: Idhāpi sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ cetaso paricchindanena tatiyā dassanasamāpatti,
tika-s0103t:285_12: arahato cittassa paricchindanena catutthā dassanasamāpatti veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:288_4: maggena samucchedavimokkhena vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādo,
tika-s0103t:288_6: rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakamahādhammarakkhitattheravādo,
tika-s0103t:288_7: “samāpattiyā vikkhambhanavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttova maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttattā
tika-s0103t:288_8: ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakacūḷābhayattheravādo cāti imesaṃ tiṇṇampi theravādānaṃ ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0103t:288_14: Na hi arahattappatto anāgāmī nāma hoti.
tika-s0103t:288_16: Aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvāti aṭṭha samāpattiyo sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā.
tika-s0103t:288_17: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti vipassanāpaññāya saṅkhāragataṃ,
tika-s0103t:288_18: maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-s0103t:288_21: dassanakāraṇā pana parikkhīṇā “disvā parikkhīṇā”ti vuttā dassanāyattaparikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0103t:288_22: Evañhi dassanaṃ āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyābhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:289_0: Paññāya visesato muttoti paññāvimutto anavasesato āsavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0103t:289_3: Evañhi arūpajjhānekadesābhāvepi aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepo na hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:289_4: Arūpāvacarajjhānesu hi ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti,
tika-s0103t:290_9: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
tika-s0103t:290_11: Nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena sacchikato hoti,
tika-s0103t:290_12: tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhīti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:290_13: na tu vimuttoti ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0103t:291_0: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti attho.
tika-s0103t:291_2: tena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0103t:291_4: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti āha “esopi kāyasakkhī viya chabbidho hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:291_7: na ito uddhaṃ dukkha”nti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0103t:291_9: pajānanto ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhe “dukkhasacca”nti pajānāti.
tika-s0103t:291_10: Taṇhaṃ pana idaṃ dukkhaṃ ito samudeti,
tika-s0103t:291_12: Yasmā idaṃ dukkhañca samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti vūpasamanti appavattiṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0103t:291_14: Ariyo pana aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:291_15: tena taṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0103t:291_18: Tathāgatappaveditāti tathāgatena bodhimaṇḍe paṭividdhā viditā pākaṭā katā.
tika-s0103t:291_22: tesu tena paññā suṭṭhu carāpitāti attho.
tika-s0103t:292_1: etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:292_4: No ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassāti yathā diṭṭhippattassa āsavā parikkhīṇā,
tika-s0103t:292_6: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesappahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
tika-s0103t:292_7: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti?
tika-s0103t:292_9: Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena,
tika-s0103t:293_0: Ārammaṇaṃ yāthāvato dhāreti avadhāretīti dhammo, paññā.
tika-s0103t:296_2: Satta bojjhaṅgā padhānāti vuttā vivekanissitādibhāvena padahitabbato bhāvetabbato.
tika-s0103t:298_1: Dukkhena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassāti pubbabhāge āgamanakāle kicchena dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena
tika-s0103t:298_3: Dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassāti vikkhambhitesu kilesesu vipassanāparivāse ciraṃ vasitvā taṃ lokuttarasamādhisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0103t:298_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti yā esā evaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0103t:298_8: vipassanāparivāsapaññāya ca dandhattā maggakāle ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi paññā āgamanavasena “dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāmā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0103t:298_9: Upari tīsu padesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:300_24: Sabbaṅgasampannāpi vācā akāle bhāsitā abhājane bhāsitā viya na atthāvahāti āha “yuttapattakālenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:300_25: Ayañca caturaṅgasamannāgatā subhāsitavācā saccasambodhāvahāditāya sattānaṃ mahiddhikā mahānisaṃsāti dassetuṃ “evaṃ bhāsitā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:301_0: Sīlācāreti sīle ca ācāre ca parisuddhasīle ceva parisuddhamanosamācāre ca.
tika-s0103t:301_5: “Nanu ca heṭṭhā saccaṃ kathitamevā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ?
tika-s0103t:301_6: Heṭṭhā hi vacīsamācāraṃ kathentena saccaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-s0103t:301_7: paṭipakkhapaṭikkhepavasena idha sīlaṃ kathentena taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ saccaṃ sarūpeneva kathitaṃ.
tika-s0103t:301_9: tathāpi saccaṃ vatvā anantarameva saccassa kathanaṃ punaruttaṃ hotīti parassa codanāvasaro mā hotū”ti
tika-s0103t:301_10: tattha parihāraṃ dātukāmo “idha kasmā puna vutta”nti āha.
tika-s0103t:301_11: Heṭṭhā vācāsaccaṃ kathitaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ subhāsitavācaṃ dassentena.
tika-s0103t:301_13: dassetuṃ idha vuttaṃ “evaṃ sīlaṃ suparisuddhaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:301_16: yesaṃ natthi sampajānamusāvāde lajjā”tiādi nayappavattaṃ rāhulovādasuttaṃ dassetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:302_0: Guttā satikavāṭena pidahitā dvārā etenāti guttadvāroti āha “chasu indriyesū”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:302_6: tena “āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0103t:302_10: Sā pana nittanditā kāyālasiyavigamane pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ “kāyālasiyavirahito”ti.
tika-s0103t:302_11: “Āraddhavīriyo”ti iminā duvidhopi vīriyārambho gahitoti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “kāyikavīriyenāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:302_13: sā pana kilesehipi evaṃ hotīti tato visesetuṃ “gaṇasaṅgaṇika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:303_1: sā panassa paṭibhānasampadā vacanacāturiyasahitāva icchitāti āha “vākkaraṇa…pe…
tika-s0103t:303_5: Pucchitānantarameva sīghaṃ byākātuṃ asamatthatāya no muttapaṭibhānaṃ assāti no muttapaṭibhāno.
tika-s0103t:303_6: Idha pana vikiṇṇavāco muttapaṭibhāno adhippetoti adhippāyena “sīlasamācārasmiñhi ṭhitabhikkhu muttapaṭibhāno na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:303_8: Dhāraṇasamatthāyāti sātisayaṃ sativīriyasahitatāya yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ dhāretuṃ samatthāya.
tika-s0103t:303_9: Munanato anuminanato mutīti anumāna paññāya nāmaṃ.
tika-s0103t:303_10: Tīhi padehīti “gatimā dhitimā mutimā”ti tīhi padehi.
tika-s0103t:303_16: Idhāti “dhitimā mutimā”ti ettha buddhavacanagaṇhanapaññā kathitā karaṇapubbāparakosallapaññādīpanato.
tika-s0103t:303_17: Kilesakāmopi vatthukāmo viya yathāpavatto assādīyatīti vuttaṃ “vatthukāmakilesakāmesu agiddho”ti.
tika-s0103t:305_1: Attano upāyamanasikārenāti attani sambhūtena pathamanasikārena bhāvanāmanasikārena.
tika-s0103t:308_1: Piṇḍagaṇanāyāti “ekaṃ dve”tiādinā agaṇetvā saṅkalanapaduppādanādinā piṇḍanavasena gaṇanāya.
tika-s0103t:308_2: Acchiddakavasenāti avicchindakagaṇanāvasena gaṇanā kamagaṇanaṃ muñcitvā “imasmiṃ rukkhe ettakāni paṇṇānī”ti
tika-s0103t:308_3: vā “imasmiṃ jalāsaye ettakāni udakāḷhakānī”ti vā evaṃ gaṇetabbassa ekajjhampi piṇḍetvā gaṇanā.
tika-s0103t:308_4: Kamagaṇanā hi antarantarā vicchijja pavattiyā pacchindikā.
tika-s0103t:308_5: Sā panesā gaṇanā savanantaraṃ anapekkhitvā manasāva gaṇetabbato “manogaṇanā”tipi vuccatīti āha “manogaṇanāyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:308_9: Paññāpāramiyā pūritabhāvaṃ dassento itarāsaṃ pūraṇena vinā tassā pūraṇaṃ natthīti “dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ pūritattā”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:308_12: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anussaratī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:308_14: na āyuno vassādigaṇanāya paricchindanaṃ tassa avisayabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:309_2: Idāni tassā desanāya majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya vibhāgābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “atītabuddhāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
