tika-s0103t:310_5: Anariyiddhiyañhi attano cittadosena ekacce upārambhaṃ dadanti,
tika-s0103t:310_8: Niddosehi khīṇāsavehi pavattetabbato niddosā dosehi saha appavattanato.
tika-s0103t:311_5: Mettāya vā pharatīti mettaṃ hitesitaṃ upasaṃharanto sabbatthakameva taṃ tattha pharati.
tika-s0103t:311_8: Appaṭikkūle satte ñātimittādike yāthāvato dhammasabhāvacintanena aniccasaññāya visabhāgabhūte “kesādi
tika-s0103t:312_0: Taṃ desananti taṃ dvīsu iddhividhāsu desanappakāraṃ desanāvidhiṃ.
tika-s0103t:312_1: Asesaṃ sakalanti asesaṃ niravasesaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānāti.
tika-s0103t:312_2: Asesaṃ abhijānato tato uttari abhiññeyyaṃ natthi.
tika-s0103t:312_4: Añño paramatthavasena dhammo vā paññattivasena puggalo vā ayaṃ nāma yaṃ bhagavā na jānātīti idaṃ natthi
tika-s0103t:312_5: na upalabbhati sabbasseva sammadeva tumhehi abhiññātattā.
tika-s0103t:312_11: Yaṃ taṃ bhantetiādināpi hi bhagavato guṇadassanaṃ tasseva pasādassa kāraṇavibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:314_2: tato añño evāyaṃ pakāro “yaṃ taṃ bhante”tiādinā āraddhoti āha “aparenāpi ākārenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:314_3: Buddhānaṃ sammāsambodhiyā saddahanato visesato saddhā kulaputtā nāma bodhisattā,
tika-s0103t:314_5: Te hi mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya mahābodhiyaṃ sattā āsattā laggā niyatabhāvūpagamanena kenaci asaṃhāriyabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:314_6: Yato nesaṃ na kathañci tattha saddhāya aññathattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:314_7: eteneva tesaṃ kammaphalaṃ saddhāyapi aññathattābhāvo dīpito daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t:314_9: “anuppattaṃ taṃ bhagavatā”ti saddantarasannidhānena ca visiṭṭhavisayaṃ “saddhena kulaputtenā”ti idaṃ padaṃ, tasmā.
tika-s0103t:314_22: Taṃ sabbaṃ acinteyyāparimeyyabhedaṃ buddhānaṃ guṇajātaṃ. Pāramitā,
tika-s0103t:314_24: veneyyasattāti yasmā idaṃ tayaṃ sabbesampi buddhānaṃ samānameva,
tika-s0103t:315_2: ettha “ko ekavisayoyaṃ indriyagocaro”ti evaṃdiṭṭhi hutvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:316_0: Ābhicetasikānanti abhiceto vuccati abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-s0103t:316_8: Tāni hi appetvā nisinnā jhāyino imasmiṃyeva attabhāve asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ nekkhammasukhaṃ vindanti,
tika-s0103t:316_12: Saha maggena vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ kathitaṃ “cattārome cunda sukhallikānuyogā ekantanibbidāyā”tiādinā
tika-s0103t:316_15: Nikāmalābhīti nikāmena lābhī attano icchāvasena lābhī.
tika-s0103t:316_18: Adukkhalābhīti sukheneva paccanīkadhammānaṃ samucchinnattā samāpajjituṃ samattho.
tika-s0103t:316_27: na sakkoti nāḷikayantaṃ viya yathāparicchede vuṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-s0103t:316_28: Bhagavā pana sabbaso samucchinnapāribandhakattā vasibhāvassa sammadeva samadhigatattā sabbametaṃ sammadeva sakkoti.
tika-s0103t:318_1: Dasasahassilokadhātuyāti imāya lokadhātuyā saddhiṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitāya dasasahassilokadhātuyā.
tika-s0103t:318_2: Jātikhettabhāvena hi taṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:318_10: Okkamanādīnaṃ channameva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ mahābhinīhārādikālepi tassa pakampanalabbhanato.
tika-s0103t:318_17: “Yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vacanato tato parampi āṇā pavatteyyeva.
tika-s0103t:319_0: Nuppajjantīti pana atthīti “na me ācariyo atthi,
tika-s0103t:319_1: sadiso me na vijjatī”ti imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā,
tika-s0103t:319_4: atthetarahi añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā samasamo sambodhiya”nti evaṃ puṭṭho “ahaṃ bhante noti
tika-s0103t:319_5: vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso,
tika-s0103t:319_6: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhakhettabhūtaṃ
tika-s0103t:319_7: imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:320_3: Carimabhave paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dhātuparinibbānanti dassento “tattha bodhipallaṅke”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:320_8: Parinibbānato paṭṭhāyāti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0103t:320_10: dhātuparinibbānanti imehi dvīhi paricchinne etasmiṃ antare.
tika-s0103t:322_0: “Na nivāritā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tīṇi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:322_1: Paṭipattiantaradhānena sāsanassa osakkitattā aparassa uppatti laddhāvasarā hoti.
tika-s0103t:323_0: “Pariyatti pamāṇa”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ bodhisattaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:323_2: Niyyānikadhammassa hi ṭhitiṃ dassento aniyyānikadhammaṃ nidasseti.
tika-s0103t:324_0: Mātikāya antarahitāyāti “yo pana bhikkhū”tiādi nayappavattāya sikkhāpadapāḷimātikāya antarahitāya.
tika-s0103t:324_3: Yathā vā pātimokkhe dharante eva pabbajjā upasampadā ca,
tika-s0103t:324_4: evaṃ sati eva tadubhaye pātimokkhaṃ tadubhayābhāve pātimokkhābhāvato.
tika-s0103t:324_5: Tasmā tayidaṃ tayaṃ sāsanassa ṭhitihetūti āha “pātimokkhapabbajjāupasampadāsu ṭhitāsu sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:324_6: Yasmā vā upasampadādhīnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ anupasampannassa anicchitattā,
tika-s0103t:324_9: taṃ siddhiyā siddhāsu pabbajjupasampadāsu ca sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0103t:324_10: Osakkitaṃ nāmāti pacchimakapaṭivedhasīlabhedadvayaṃ ekato katvā tato paraṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0103t:324_12: pacchimakasīlabhedato paraṃ paṭipattisāsanaṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti attho.
tika-s0103t:326_1: pariyatti pana paṭipattihetukāti paṭipattiyā asati sā appatiṭṭhā hoti paṭivedho viya,
tika-s0103t:326_2: tasmā paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ sāsanosakkanassa visesakāraṇanti dassetvā tayidaṃ sāsanosakkanaṃ dhātuparinibbānosānanti
tika-s0103t:327_4: devanāgabrahmalokesu ca vippakiritvā ṭhitānaṃ dhātūnaṃ mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhāne ekajjhaṃ sannipātanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:327_7: ekajālibhāvo cāti sabbametaṃ satthu adhiṭṭhānavasenevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:328_1: Buddhā nāma majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti tesaṃ desanāpi ekarasā evāti āha “desanāya ca visesābhāvato”ti,
tika-s0103t:328_3: “Vivādabhāvato”ti etena vivādābhāvatthaṃ dve ekato na uppajjantīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:329_0: Tatthāti milindapañhe. Ekuddesoti eko ekavidho abhinno uddeso. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:330_2: yena dutiyaṃ buddhaguṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:330_3: Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi dhammānaṃ sabhāvaviseso na sakkā nivāretunti.
tika-s0103t:330_4: “Na dhāreyyā”ti vatvā tameva adhāraṇaṃ pariyāyehi pakāsento “caleyyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:330_9: Vinameyyāti vividhā ito cito ca nameyya.
tika-s0103t:330_13: Tathābhūtā ca na katthaci tiṭṭheyyāti āha “na ṭhānaṃ upagaccheyyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:331_1: Tattha samupādikāti samaṃ uddhaṃ pajjati pavattatīti samupādikā,
tika-s0103t:332_2: Anoṇamitadaṇḍajātoti yāvadatthabhojanena oṇamituṃ asamatthatāya anoṇamitadaṇḍo viya jāto.
tika-s0103t:332_3: Sakiṃ bhuttovāti ekaṃ vaḍḍhitakaṃ bhuttamattova mareyyāti.
tika-s0103t:332_5: sakiṃ teneva calati vinassatīti adhippāyena pucchati.
tika-s0103t:332_6: Puna thero ratanaṃ nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ,
tika-s0103t:332_8: taṃ attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ diṭṭhamevaṃ dhammo ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅginaṃ dhārento,
tika-s0103t:332_9: abhimato ca viññūnaṃ gambhīrappameyyabhāvena garusabhāvattā atibhārabhūto pathavicalanassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti
tika-s0103t:332_11: eteneva tathāgatassa mātukucchiokkamanādikāle pathavikampanakāraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:332_13: ekassa vā sakaṭassa ratanaṃ tasmā sakaṭato gahetvāti attho.
tika-s0103t:335_2: mahantehi buddhakaradhammehi pāramisaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:335_4: mahantā ca sakkabhāvādayo attano attano visaye ekekāva,
tika-s0103t:335_5: evaṃ sammāsambuddhopi mahanto attano visaye eko eva.
tika-s0103t:335_8: yāvatakaṃ vā ñeyyamevaṃ “ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā eko eva hotī”ti vadanto “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti
tika-s0103t:335_9: vuttalokadhātuto aññesupi cakkavāḷesu aparassa buddhassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:336_0: “Sammukhā meta”ntiādinā pavattitaṃ attano byākaraṇaṃ aviparītatthatāya satthari pasāduppādanena sammāpaṭipajjamānassa
tika-s0103t:338_3: yassa vasena vinaye nisīdanassa dasā anuññātā.
tika-s0103t:338_5: Pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi atibyāpitadeho “nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭasarīro”ti vutto,
tika-s0103t:338_6: tato evassā pariyāyato pharaṇalakkhaṇampi vuttaṃ. Appa-
tika-s0103t:338_7: saddo “appakasirenevā”tiādīsu viya idha abhāvatthoti āha “appicchatāti nittaṇhatā”ti.
tika-s0103t:342_1: Lakkhassa saravedhaṃ avirajjhitvāna vijjhanavidhiṃ jānantīti vedhaññā.
tika-s0103t:343_9: Sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ pubbāparasambandhaṃ atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:343_16: Pariyesamāno vicara tattha gantvā sikkhāti attho.
tika-s0103t:343_32: thūpoti vā dhammassa niyyānabhāvo veditabbo aññe dhamme abhibhuyya samussitaṭṭhena,
tika-s0103t:343_34: Kehici abhinnasammatopi bhinno vinaṭṭho eva sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvatoti so bhinnathūpo,
tika-s0103t:343_35: so eva niyyānabhāvo vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:343_37: tasmiṃ bhinnathūpe appaṭisaraṇeti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:344_0: Ācariyappamāṇanti ācariyamuṭṭhi hutvā pamāṇabhūtaṃ. Nānānīhārenāti nānākārena.
tika-s0103t:346_0: “Yenassa upajjhāyo”ti vatvā yathāssa āyasmato cundassa dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko upajjhāyo ahosi,
tika-s0103t:346_4: Satthu parinibbānato puretarameva hi dhammasenāpati parinibbuto.
tika-s0103t:349_0: Kathāya mūlanti bhagavato santikā labhitabbadhammakathāya kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:349_4: Ekekasmiṃ pahāreyeva tayo tayo vāre katvā divā navavāre rattiṃ navavāre.
tika-s0103t:349_8: Ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa uddharaṇabhāvato pañhova pañhuddhāro,
tika-s0103t:351_3: tassa sāmikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sova tassā ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ jānātī”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:351_5: Cundattherena hi ānītaṃ kathāpābhataṃ bhagavā sampaṭicchanto “eva”nti āha.
tika-s0103t:352_1: pākaṭaṃ hoti byatirekamukhena ca neyyassa atthassa vibhūtabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0103t:352_3: pākaṭaṃ hoti dosesu ādīnavadassanena tappaṭipakkhesu guṇesu ānisaṃsassa vibhūtabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0103t:352_7: tena tassa vokkamanassa antarantarāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “na nirantara”ntiādi.
tika-s0103t:352_8: Dhammānudhammapaṭipattiādayoti tena satthārā vuttamuttidhammassa anudhammaṃ appaṭipajjanādayo. Ādi-
tika-s0103t:352_9: saddena pāḷiyaṃ āgatā asāmīcipaṭipadādayo ca saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0103t:352_14: “Tathā eva”nti padehi yathākkamaṃ pakārassa kāmaṃ tirokkhatā,
tika-s0103t:352_16: tathāpi yathā “tathā paṭipajjatū”ti padena paṭipajjanākāro niyametvā vihito,
tika-s0103t:352_17: tathā “evaṃ paṭipajjatū”ti imināpīti idaṃ tassa atthadassanabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:353_4: so pana yasmā tassa muttidhammassa adhigame kāraṇasammato,
tika-s0103t:356_1: Idha sāvakassa sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantikaapassayadassanatthaṃ satthu sammāsambuddhatā,
tika-s0103t:356_2: dhammassa ca svākkhātatā kittitāti “sammāpaṭipannassa kulaputtassa pasaṃsaṃ dassetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:356_3: Evañhi imissā desanāya saṃkilesabhāgiyabhāvena uṭṭhitāya vodānabhāgiyabhāvena yathānusandhinā pavatti dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0103t:356_6: Pāḷiyaṃ “assā”ti padaṃ “sāvakā saddhamme”ti dvīhi padehi yojetabbaṃ “assa sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā,
tika-s0103t:356_8: Sabbasaṅgahapadehi katanti sabbassa sāsanatthassa saṅgaṇhanapadehi ekajjhaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0103t:356_10: Pubbenāparaṃ sambandhatthabhāvena saṅgahetabbatāya vā saṅgahāni padāni katāni etassāti saṅgahapadakataṃ,
tika-s0103t:356_14: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ vā paṭipajjamānānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato paṭiharaṇaṃ nibbānapāpanaṃ paṭihāro, so eva ā-
tika-s0103t:356_24: Yāva devamanussehīti vā yāva devamanussehi yattakā devā manussā ca,
tika-s0103t:356_27: so pana anutāpaṃ karonto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “anutāpakaro hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:357_0: 172. Thiroti ṭhitadhammo kenaci asaṃhāriyo, asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo therakārakā dhammā.
tika-s0103t:359_2: Sotāpannasakadāgāminopi tādisā tathā vuccantīti “brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasamānā ariyasāvakā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:360_1: Sabbakāraṇasampannanti yattakehi kāraṇehi sampannaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0103t:360_2: tehi sabbehi kāraṇehi sampannaṃ sampattaṃ upagataṃ paripuṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:361_0: Udakena padesaññunā attano paññāveyyattiyataṃ dassetuṃ aniyyānike atthe payuttaṃ paheḷikasadisaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:361_1: bhagavatā attano sabbaññutāya niyyānike atthe yojetvā dassetuṃ “udako suda”ntiādi vuttanti taṃ dassetuṃ “so kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:363_1: Saṅgamma samāgammāti tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne labbhamānānaṃ gativasena saṅgamma ṭhānantarato pakkosanena samāgatānaṃ vasena samāgamma.
tika-s0103t:363_3: Atthena atthanti padantare āgataatthena saha tattha tattha āgatamatthaṃ.
tika-s0103t:364_1: Tassa vā bhāsiteti tassa bhikkhuno bhāsite atthe ceva byañjane ca.
tika-s0103t:364_13: Neva ussādetabboti na ukkaṃsetabbo virajjhitvā vuttattā.
tika-s0103t:365_1: Atthena upetanti aviparītena atthena upetaṃ taṃ “ayamettha attho”ti upecca paṭijānitvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-s0103t:365_2: Tathārūpo ca tassa bujjhitā nāma hotīti āha “atthassa viññātāra”nti.
tika-s0103t:365_3: Evametaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsathāti vuttanayena dhammabhāṇakaṃ amuṃ bhikkhuṃ “evaṃ lābhā no āvuso”tiādiākārena pasaṃsatha.
tika-s0103t:365_6: tattha cassa sammadeva avaṭṭhitabhāvato “buddho nāma esā”ti vutto.
tika-s0103t:365_7: “Lābhā no”tiādinā cassa bhikkhūnaṃ piyagarubhāvaṃ vibhāvento satthā taṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapesīti vutto.
tika-s0103t:367_1: Tatopi uttaritaranti yā pubbe sammāpaṭipannassa bhikkhuno pasaṃsanavasena “idha pana cunda satthā ca
tika-s0103t:367_2: hoti sammāsambuddho”tiādinā pavattitadesanāya upari “idha cunda satthā ca loke udapādī”tiādinā desanā vaḍḍhitā.
tika-s0103t:367_5: Uppajjanakā āsavāti paccayānaṃ pariyesanahetu ceva paribhogahetu ca uppajjanakā kāmāsavādayo.
tika-s0103t:367_8: ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvitaṃ kappetī”ti “idha,
tika-s0103t:367_10: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevatī”tiādinā ca sammāpaṭipattiṃ upadisanto bhagavā paṭighātāya dhammaṃ deseti nāma.
tika-s0103t:367_14: sādhukaṃ saññāpetabbo tasseva atthassa nisantiyā”ti evaṃ pariyattidhamme micchāpaṭipanne sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ
tika-s0103t:367_15: bhikkhū niyojento bhagavā bhaṇḍanahetu uppajjanakānaṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya dhammaṃ deseti nāma.
tika-s0103t:367_16: Yathā te na pavisantīti te āsavā attano cittasantānaṃ yathā na otaranti.
tika-s0103t:370_2: evarūpāya kathāya anavaṭṭhānabhāvato sabhāvopi tesaṃ anavaṭṭhitoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:370_7: Tassa vā ñeyyadhammesu jānanavasena pavattiṃ upādāya “jānatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:370_8: Hatthāmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dassanavasena pavattiṃ upādāya “passatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:370_9: Nemaṃ vuccati thambhādīhi anupaviṭṭhabhūmippedesoti āha “gambhīrabhūmiṃ anupaviṭṭho”ti.
tika-s0103t:370_10: Suṭṭhu nikhātoti bhūmiṃ nikhanitvā sammadeva ṭhapito.
tika-s0103t:370_15: saddena gahitesu anāgāmino tāva navasupi ṭhānesu khīṇāsavā viya abhabbā,
tika-s0103t:372_2: Khīṇāsavo pana gihibyañjanena arahattaṃ pattopi na tiṭṭhati vivekaṭṭhānassa abhāvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:372_3: Tassa vasenāti bhummadevattabhāve ṭhatvā arahattappattassa vasena.
tika-s0103t:372_4: Ayaṃ pañhoti “abhabbo so nava ṭhānāni ajjhācaritu”nti ayaṃ pañho āgato itarassa pabbajjāya,
tika-s0103t:372_9: Ñeyyassa hi vipulatāya ñāṇassa vipulatā veditabbā,
tika-s0103t:372_10: etena “apariccheda”nti vuccamānampi ñeyyaṃ satthu ñāṇassa vasena paricchedamevāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:372_11: Vuttañhetaṃ “ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyya”nti anāgate apaññāpananti anāgate visaye ñāṇassa apaññāpanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:372_14: nanu buddhānaṃ sabbampi ñāṇaṃ attano visayaṃ paccakkhameva katvā pavattati ekappamāṇabhāvatoti?
tika-s0103t:372_17: taṃ akkhaṃ pati vattatīti cakkhādinissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:372_18: tassa ca ārammaṇaṃ “paccakkha”nti loke niruḷhametanti taṃ nidassanaṃ katvā dassento “paccakkhaṃ viya katvā”ti avoca,
tika-s0103t:372_19: na pana bhagavato ñāṇassa appaccakkhākārena pavattanato.
tika-s0103t:375_2: kathanaṃ pana paññāpanaṃ nāma hotīti paññāpetabbanti attho vutto.
tika-s0103t:375_4: Ñāṇaṃ nāma natthīti āvajjanena vinā ñāṇuppattiyā asambhavato.
tika-s0103t:375_5: Ekākārena ca ñāṇe pavattamāne nānākārassa visayassa avabodho na siyā.
tika-s0103t:375_8: tena ca ñāṇaṃ ñeyyaṃ aññātasadisameva siyā.
tika-s0103t:375_9: Na hi “idaṃ ta”nti vivekena anavabuddho attho ñāto nāma hoti,
tika-s0103t:376_4: Sabbatthakameva ñeyyāvaraṇassa suppahīnattā appaṭihataṃ anivāritaṃ ñāṇaṃ gacchati pavattaticceva attho.
tika-s0103t:376_5: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti vacanato catumaggañāṇaṃ bodhi,
tika-s0103t:376_6: tato tassa adhigatattā uppajjanakaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ “bodhijaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:376_8: tañca kho anāgataṃ ārabbha uddissa tassa appavattiatthaṃ tathāgatassa uppajjati tassa uppannattā āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato.
tika-s0103t:376_9: Kathaṃ tathāgato anāgatamaddhānaṃ ārabbha atīrakaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paññāpetīti?
tika-s0103t:376_10: Atītassa pana addhuno mahantatāya atīrakaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ tattha paññāpetīti ko ettha virodho.
tika-s0103t:376_13: tayidaṃ kathaṃsū”ti attano aññāṇameva pākaṭaṃ karonti.
tika-s0103t:376_14: Tasmā bhagavatā sasantatipariyāpannadhammappavattiṃ sandhāya “aññavihitakaṃ ñāṇadassana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:376_15: Itaraṃ pana sandhāya vuccamāne sati tathārūpe payojane anāgatampi addhānaṃ ārabbha atīrakameva ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0103t:376_16: paññāpeyya bhagavāti anatthasaṃhitanti ayamettha atthoti āha “na idhalokatthaṃ vā paralokatthaṃ vā nissita”nti.
tika-s0103t:376_19: “Bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇasadisa”nti iminā tassā kathāya yebhuyyena abhūtatthataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0103t:376_21: So pana hetu yena nidassanena sādhīyati,
tika-s0103t:376_22: taṃ tassa kāraṇanti tena sakāraṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t:376_26: Ye hi veneyyā tassā kathāya yuttā anucchavikā,
tika-s0103t:376_27: tesaṃyeva yojane sandhāya vā kathāya patto upakārāvaho kālo,
tika-s0103t:377_1: “Tathā tatheva gadanato”ti iminā “tathāgato”ti āmeḍitalopenāyaṃ niddesoti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:377_9: taṃ sabbaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ” tveva gahitaṃ kālavisesassa anāmaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:377_12: Mutanti sanissayena ghānādiindriyena sayaṃ patvā pāpuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:377_20: taṃ pana pattaṃ vā siyā appattaṃ vā ubhayathāpi pariyesitamevāti āha “pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0103t:377_23: tena tena pakārena tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:377_24: Cittena anusañcaritanti copanaṃ apāpetvā citteneva anusaṃcaritaṃ,
tika-s0103t:377_33: Majjhattoti aññāṇavasena vā ñāṇavasena vā majjhatto.
tika-s0103t:377_40: majjhattavedanā kusalakammaṃ akusalakammanti evaṃ ādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t:378_3: Tatheva gatattāti tatheva ñātattā abhisambuddhattā. Gata-
tika-s0103t:380_1: “Asamataṃ kathetvā”ti vatvā samopi nāma koci natthi,
tika-s0103t:380_4: anuttaratā ca sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitāti dassetuṃ “sabbaññuta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:380_5: Sā sabbaññutā saddhammavaracakkavattibhāvena loke pākaṭā jātāti dassetuṃ “dhammarājabhāvaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:380_6: Tathā sabbaññubhāvena ca satthā imesu diṭṭhigatavipallāsesu evaṃ paṭipajjatīti dassento “idānī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:380_13: Tathā hi so rūpādīsu satto visattoti katvā “satto”ti ca vuccati.
tika-s0103t:380_14: Itthattanti ca paṭiladdhattā tathā paccakkhabhūto attabhāvoti veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:381_0: “Atthasaṃhitaṃ na hotī”ti iminā ubhayattha vidhuratādassanena niratthakavippalāpataṃ tassa vādassa vibhāveti,
tika-s0103t:381_1: ubhayalokatthavidhurampi samānaṃ “kiṃ nu kho vivaṭṭanissita”nti koci āsaṅkeyyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “na ca dhammasaṃhita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:381_4: vivaṭṭassa pana adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ nu khoti koci āsaṅkeyyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “na ādibrahmacariyaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:382_2: pabhavabhāvena pana sā tato visuṃ kātabbāti “taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:382_7: dukkhuppādane visesapaccayabhāvato ca sātisayo samudayaṭṭhoti sā eva suttesu tathā vuttā.
tika-s0103t:382_11: tena maggassa bhāvanatthopi atthato dassitovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:382_12: Na hi bhāvanābhisamayena vinā pariññābhisamayādayo sambhavantīti.
tika-s0103t:382_13: Saccavavatthāpanaṃ appamādapaṭipattibhāvato asammohakalyāṇakittisaddādinimittatāya yathā sātisayaṃ idhalokatthāvahaṃ,
tika-s0103t:382_14: evaṃ yāva ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā abhāvena navalokuttaradhammasampāpakaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0103t:382_15: tāva tattha tattha sampattibhave abbhudayasampatti anugatameva siyāti vuttaṃ “etaṃ idhalokaparalokatthanissita”nti.
tika-s0103t:382_16: Navalokuttaradhammanissitanti navavidhampi lokuttaradhammaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ tadadhigamūpāyabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:382_19: tasmā etaṃ saccavavatthāpanaṃ “ādipadhāna”nti vuttaṃ paṭhamataraṃ citte ādātabbato.
tika-s0103t:384_1: Taṃ mayā byākatamevāti taṃ mayā tathā byākatameva,
tika-s0103t:384_2: byākātabbaṃ nāma mayā abyākataṃ natthīti byākaraṇāvekallena attano dhammasudhammatāya buddhasubuddhataṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0103t:384_4: Purimuppannā diṭṭhiyo aparāparuppannānaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ avassayā hontīti “diṭṭhiyova diṭṭhinissayā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:384_7: Idameva dassanaṃ saccanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ amoghaṃ aviparītaṃ.
tika-s0103t:384_8: Aññesaṃ vacanaṃ moghanti “asassato attā ca loko cā”ti evamādikaṃ aññesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vacanaṃ moghaṃ tucchaṃ,
tika-s0103t:385_3: atthi nūti ayamettha atthoti āha “atthi kho idaṃ āvuso vuccatī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:385_4: Āvuso yaṃ tumhehi “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:385_7: tasmā vācāvatthumattato tassa yaṃ kho te evamāhaṃsu “idameva saccaṃ moghaṃ añña”nti,
tika-s0103t:385_8: taṃ tesaṃ nānujānāmīti evamettha attho ca yojanā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:385_11: Diṭṭhipaññattiyāti diṭṭhiyā paññāpane “evaṃ esā diṭṭhi uppannā”ti tassā diṭṭhiyā samudayato,
tika-s0103t:385_15: Aviparītavuttiyā samena ñāṇena samaṃ kañci neva samanupassāmi.
tika-s0103t:385_17: Yaṃ ajānantā bāhirakā diṭṭhipaññattiyeva allīnāti tañca paññattito ajānantā thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharanti.
tika-s0103t:385_18: Ettha ca yāyaṃ “diṭṭhipaññatti nāmā”ti vuttā diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatikehi evaṃ gahitatāya vibhāvanā,
tika-s0103t:385_19: tattha ca bhagavato uttaritaro nāma koci natthi,
tika-s0103t:385_21: “Adhipaññattī”ti vuttā pana vibhāviyamānā lokassa nibbidāhetubhāvena bahulīkārāti tassā vasena bhagavā
tika-s0103t:385_22: anuttarabhāvaṃ pavedento ‘neva attanā samasamaṃ samanupassāmī’ti sīhanādaṃ nadī”ti keci.
tika-s0103t:385_24: ubhayametaṃ atthato eka”nti “idha pana paññattiyāti etthāpi paññatti ceva adhipaññatti ca adhippetā,
tika-s0103t:385_26: ubhayassapi vasenettha bhagavā sīhanādaṃ nadīti viññāyati.
tika-s0103t:385_27: Ubhayaṃ petaṃ atthato ekanti ca paññattibhāvasāmaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:385_30: Khandhapaññattīti khandhānaṃ “khandhā”ti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā.
tika-s0103t:385_31: “Ācikkhati dasseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapetī”ti āgataṭṭhāne hi paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā paññatti nāma,
tika-s0103t:385_32: “supaññattaṃ mañcapīṭha”nti āgataṭṭhāne ṭhapanā nikkhipanā paññatti nāma,
tika-s0103t:387_2: Yasmā tena pajahanena sabbe diṭṭhinissayā sammadeva atikkantā honti vītikkantā,
tika-s0103t:387_5: atha kho veneyyasantāne patiṭṭhāpitāti dassetuṃ “desitā”ti vatvā “paññattā”ti vuttanti āha “desitāti kathitā.
tika-s0103t:387_7: Idāni satipaṭṭhānadesanāya diṭṭhinissayānaṃ ekantikaṃ pahānāvahabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:387_8: Tattha satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāyāti iminā tesaṃ bhāvanāya eva nesaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:387_9: desanā pana tadupanissayabhāvato tathā vuttāti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:390_7: Kasmā āhāti yathāvuttassa suttassa samuṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0103t:390_8: ācariyo “aṭṭhuppattiyā anurūpattā”ti vatvā tamevassa aṭṭhuppattiṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “sā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:391_1: Yaṃ nibbattanti yaṃ yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbattaṃ.
tika-s0103t:391_2: Dassanatthanti tassa tassa kusalakammassa sarūpato, kiccato,
tika-s0103t:391_6: eteneva paṭipāṭiyā uddiṭṭhānaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ asamuddesakāraṇavibhāvanāya kāraṇaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti samānakāraṇānaṃ
tika-s0103t:391_8: Evamāhāti “bāhirakāpi isayo dhārentī”tiādinā iminā iminā pakārena āha.
tika-s0103t:393_3: “Pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantāne ṭhito”ti vacanato accantasaṃyoge vā upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:393_4: Yattha yattha hi jātiyaṃ mahāsatto puññakammaṃ kātuṃ ārabhati,
tika-s0103t:393_5: ārabhato paṭṭhāya accantameva tattha puññakammappasuto hoti.
tika-s0103t:394_4: dukkhabahulatāya ca puññakiriyāya okāso na sulabharūpo paccayasamavāyassa dullabhabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:394_6: vipulā ca na hotīti gativasenāpi khettavisesatā icchitabbā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā,
tika-s0103t:394_7: puthujjanadussīle dānaṃ datvā sahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti vacanato.
tika-s0103t:394_8: Manussagatiyā pana sukhabahulatāya puññakiriyāya okāso sulabharūpo paccayasamavāyassa ca yebhuyyena sulabhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:394_12: Yathā hi ayoghanena satthake nipphādiyamāne tassa ekantato aggimhi tāpanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:394_13: udakena vā temanaṃ chedanakiriyāsamatthatāya na visesapaccayo,
tika-s0103t:394_14: tāpetvā pana samānayogato udakatemanaṃ tassā visesapaccayo,
tika-s0103t:394_15: evameva sattasantānassa ekantadukkhasamaṅgitā dukkhabahulatā ekantasukhasamaṅgitā sukhabahulatā ca puññakiriyāsamatthatāya na visesapaccayo,
tika-s0103t:394_17: sukhumabrūhane ca laddhūpanissayā puññakiriyā samatthatāya sambhavati,
tika-s0103t:394_18: tathā sati uppajjamānā puññakiriyā mahājutikā mahāvipphārā paṭipakkhacchedanasamatthā hoti.
tika-s0103t:396_2: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
tika-s0103t:397_5: aññe ca mahānubhāvā sattā tattheva uppajjanti.
tika-s0103t:397_6: Te hi samānarūpāditāya pana saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussā tveva paññāyiṃsū”ti keci.
tika-s0103t:397_8: alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya manussā.
tika-s0103t:397_16: alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ catudīpavāsino sattavisesā manussāti vuccantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:397_18: Manu nāma paṭhamakappiko lokamariyādāya ādibhūto sattānaṃ hitāhitavidhāyako kattabbākattabbatāsu niyojanatāvasena pituṭṭhāniyo,
tika-s0103t:397_21: paramparā ca tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ ṭhitā sattā puttasadisatāya “manussā,
tika-s0103t:397_28: Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana santānassa mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kusaladhammapaṭipattiyaṃ sammadeva abhisaṅkhatattā tesaṃ sugatiyaṃ,
tika-s0103t:397_29: attano uppajjanaduggatiyañca nibbattānaṃ kusalakammaṃ garutaramevāti dassetuṃ “akāraṇaṃ vā eta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:398_1: Ṭhitena katakammaṃ na sakkā sukhena dīpetuṃ loke appaññātarūpattā.
tika-s0103t:398_2: Sukhena dīpetuṃ “asukasmiṃ dese asukasmiṃ nagare asuko nāma rājā,
tika-s0103t:398_3: brāhmaṇo hutvā imaṃ kusalakammaṃ akāsī”ti evaṃ suviññāpayabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:399_0: Taveso mahāsamuddasadisoti eso udakogho teva mahāsamuddasadiso.
tika-s0103t:400_2: Diyyanavasenāti deyyadhammassa pariyattaṃ katvā pariccajanavasena dānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:400_3: Saṃvibhāgakaraṇavasenāti tasseva attanā saddhiṃ parassa saṃvibhajanavasena saṃvibhāgo,
tika-s0103t:400_9: yassa pana dhammassa vasena so “matteyyo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:400_13: te pana kusalabhāvena vuttā kusalāti āha “evarūpesū”ti.
tika-s0103t:400_19: Nanu paññāpāramisaṅgahañāṇasambhārabhūtā kusalā dhammā nippariyāyena sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭilābhapaccayā kusalā nāma,
tika-s0103t:400_20: ime pana mahāpurisalakkhaṇanibbattakā puññasambhārabhūtā kasmā tathā vuttāti?
tika-s0103t:400_22: Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi mahāpuriso yaṃ kiñci puññaṃ karoti,
tika-s0103t:400_27: sakkaccābyāsoti cattāro abyāsā caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūritasambandhā anupubbena mahābodhiṭṭhānā sampajjanti.
tika-s0103t:401_1: saddena anekavārampi kataṃ vijātiyena antaritaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0103t:401_6: Anekakkhattuñhi pavattiyamānaṃ kusalakammaṃ santāne tathāladdhaparibhāvanaṃ piṇḍībhūtaṃ viya,
tika-s0103t:401_8: Vipākaṃ pati saṃhaccakāribhāvattā cakkavāḷaṃ atisambādhaṃ bhavaggaṃ atinīcaṃ,
tika-s0103t:401_9: sace pane taṃ rūpaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:401_11: Yasmā pana taṃ kammaṃ mettākaruṇāsatisampajaññāhi pariggahitatāya durasamussāritaṃ pamāṇakaraṇadhammanti
tika-s0103t:402_1: Atthato paṇītapaṇītānaṃ bhogānaṃ paṭilābho evāti āha “atirekaṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:402_4: Ekadesena aphusitvā sabbappadesehi phusanato sabbappadesehi phusantiyo etesaṃ pādatalānaṃ santīti “sabbāvantehi pādatalehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:402_5: Yathā nikkhipane sabbe pādatalappadesā saṃhaccakārino aninnatāya samabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:402_8: Idāni imassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇassa samadhigamena laddhabbanissandaphalavibhāvanamukhena ānubhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “sacepi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:402_11: “Cakkalakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhāna”nti idaṃ yaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ pādatalaṃ phusati,
tika-s0103t:402_12: tattha cakkalakkhaṇampi phusanavasena patiṭṭhātīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:402_13: Tassa pana tathā patiṭṭhānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya evāti suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya ānubhāvakittane “lakkhaṇantarānayanaṃ kimatthiya”nti na cintetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:402_17: Tīhipi padehi bhagavato buddhabhūtassa dhammā gahitā,
tika-s0103t:403_6: “nirabbuda”nti iminā pana gaṇabandhavasena vicaraṇacorābhāvo vuttoti dassetuṃ “gumbaṃ gumbaṃ hutvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:403_7: Avikkhambhanīyoti na vibandhanīyo kenaci appaṭibāhanīyo ṭhānato anikkaḍḍhanīyo.
tika-s0103t:403_9: etena pākaṭabhāvena virodhaṃ akaronto veripuggalo vutto.
tika-s0103t:403_11: etena pākaṭabhāvena virodhaṃ karonto veripuggalo vutto.
tika-s0103t:403_13: aññadatthu sayameva vighātabyasanaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu ceva sāvakattañca pavedesuṃ.
tika-s0103t:404_0: “Kamma”ntiādīsu kammaṃ nāma buddhabhāvaṃ uddissa katūpacito lakkhaṇasaṃvattaniyo puññasambhāro.
tika-s0103t:404_2: Kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma tasseva puññasambhārassa karaṇakāle kenaci akampanīyassa daḷhāvatthitabhāvassa
tika-s0103t:404_3: anucchaviko suppatiṭṭhitapādatāsaṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa parehi avikkhambhanīyatāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo,
tika-s0103t:404_4: svāyaṃ nimittabhāvo tasseva lakkhaṇassāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma…pe…
tika-s0103t:404_10: tasmā suṭṭhu samaṃ sabbabhāgehi patiṭṭhitā pādā etassāti suppatiṭṭhitapādo,
tika-s0103t:404_12: Suṭṭhu samaṃ bhūmiyā phusaneneva hi nesaṃ tattha daḷhāvatthitabhāvo siddho,
tika-s0103t:405_5: Vaṇṇanāgāthāti thomanāgāthā vuttamevatthaṃ gahetvā thomanāvasena pavattattā.
tika-s0103t:405_8: ye sāṭṭhakathaṃ piṭakattayaṃ potthakāruḷhaṃ katvā saddhammaṃ addhaniyaciraṭṭhitikaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0103t:405_10: Atthuddhāroti tadatthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena uddharaṇato atthuddhārabhūto,
tika-s0103t:405_11: tayidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatapadāni gahetvā gāthābandhavasena tadatthavicāraṇabhāvadassanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:406_1: tappaṭipakkhassa ca musāvādassa mahāsāvajjataṃ dassetuṃ anantarameva kusalakammapathadhamme vadantopi
tika-s0103t:406_2: tato vacīsaccaṃ nīharitvā katheti sacceti vā sannidhāneva “dhamme”ti vuccamānā kusalakammapathadhammā
tika-s0103t:406_6: Kusalakammapathagghaṇenassa vārittasīlameva gahitanti itarampi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ saṃyamasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti “saṃyameti sīlasaṃyame”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:406_7: Suci vuccati puggalo yassa dhammassa vasena,
tika-s0103t:406_10: Etasseva hi vibhāgassa dassanatthaṃ vuttampi cetaṃ puna vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:406_13: Uposathakammanti uposathadivase samādiyitvā samācaritabbaṃ puññakammaṃ uposatho sahacaraṇañāyena.
tika-s0103t:406_17: Avihiṃsāggahaṇeneva cettha appamaññāsāmaññena cattāropi brahmavihārā upacārāvatthā gahitā lakkhaṇahāranayena.
tika-s0103t:407_0: Aṃnubhīti gāthāsukhatthaṃ akāraṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:409_3: uttasanākārena ca pavattiyā duvidhanti āha “ubbegabhayañceva uttāsabhayañcā”ti.
tika-s0103t:409_5: Apanūditāti yathā corādayo viluppanabandhanādīni parassa na karonti,
tika-s0103t:409_7: evaṃ yathā ca caṇḍahatthiādayo dūrato parivajjitā honti,
tika-s0103t:409_8: aparivajjite tassa yathā ṭhāne ṭhitehi abhibhavo na hoti,
tika-s0103t:409_16: Tattha kiñci deyyadhammaṃ dento yadā tassa parivārabhāvena aññampi deyyadhammaṃ deti,
tika-s0103t:409_17: evaṃ tassa taṃ dānamayaṃ puññaṃ saparivāraṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0103t:410_1: Tattha yathā deyyadhammaṃ tassa annadānassa parivāro,
tika-s0103t:410_2: evaṃ tassa sakkaccakaraṇaṃ pīti dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:410_5: Suttaṃ vaṭṭetīti cīvarassa sibbanasuttakaṃ duvaṭṭativaṭṭādivasena vaṭṭitaṃ akāsi.
tika-s0103t:412_0: Laddhābhisekā khattiyā attano vijite visavitāya brāhmaṇādike catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi rañjetuṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0103t:412_7: Jānātūti “sadevako loko jānātū”ti iminā viya adhippāyena nibbattaṃ cakkalakkhaṇanti lakkhaṇasseva kammasarikkhatā dassitā.
tika-s0103t:412_10: tasmā cakkalakkhaṇassa mahāparivāratāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma.
tika-s0103t:413_2: taṃ panatthato gāthā evāti āha “imā tadatthaparidīpanā gāthā vuccantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:414_4: tasmā tattha paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “pure puratthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:414_5: Imissāpi jātiyaṃ atītakālavasena “purepuratthā”ti vattuṃ labbhāti tato visesanatthaṃ “purimāsu jātīsū”ti vuttanti āha “imissā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:414_6: Keci “imissā jātiyā pubbe tusitadevaloke katakammapaṭikkhepavacana”nti vadanti,
tika-s0103t:414_7: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ tattha tādisassa katakammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0103t:415_1: Evaṃ santeti satamattena puññakammena ekekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbatteyya,
tika-s0103t:415_3: Na rocayiṃsūti kevalaṃ satamattena puññakammena lakkhaṇanibbattiṃ na rocayiṃsu aṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-s0103t:415_6: Ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvāti anantāsu lokadhātūsu yattakā sattā,
tika-s0103t:415_7: tehi sabbehi paccekaṃ satakkhattuṃ katāni dānādipuññakammāni yattakāni,
tika-s0103t:415_8: tato ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ mahāsattena sataguṇaṃ kataṃ “sata”nti adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0103t:415_11: na saṅkhyāvacanoti dasseti “satagghi sataṃ devamanussā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0103t:417_1: Sarasacuti nāma jātassa sattassa yāvajīvaṃ jīvitvā pakatiyā maraṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:417_2: Ākaḍḍhajiyassa dhanudaṇḍassa viya pādānaṃ antomukhaṃ kuṭilatāya antovaṅkapādatā.
tika-s0103t:417_10: Idamettha kammasarikkhakanti idaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇampi lakkhaṇānaṃ tathāgatassa dīghāyukatāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo ettha āyatapaṇhitā,
tika-s0103t:418_1: Bhāyitabbavatthunimittaṃ uppajjamānampi bhayaṃ attasinehahetukaṃ pahīnasinehassa tadabhāvatoti āha “yathā
tika-s0103t:418_2: mayhaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ mama jīvitaṃ piya”nti.
tika-s0103t:419_1: “Sujātagatto subhujo”ti ādayo sarīrāvayavaguṇā imehi lakkhaṇehi avinābhāvinoti dassetuṃ vuttā.
tika-s0103t:419_5: Vasippattoti jhānādīsu vasībhāvañceva cetovasibhāvañca patto hutvā,
tika-s0103t:422_0: Idha kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma sattussadatālakkhaṇassa paṇītalābhitāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo.
tika-s0103t:422_1: Iminā nayena tattha tattha lakkhaṇe kammasarikkhakaṃ niddhāretvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:423_1: Uttamo aggarasadāyakoti sabbasattānaṃ uttamo lokanātho aggānaṃ paṇītānaṃ rasānaṃ dāyako.
tika-s0103t:423_5: Tadatthajotakanti vā tassa paṇītabhojanadāyakattasaṅkhātassa atthassa jotakaṃ.
tika-s0103t:426_2: Telena viya makkhetīti satadhotatelena makkheti viya.
tika-s0103t:427_4: tassa ca dukkhuppattiyaṃ tena attano ekasambhogatāti āha “samānasukhadukkhabhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:427_5: Sā ca samānasukhadukkhatā ekato nisajjādinā pākaṭā hotīti taṃ dassento “ekāsane”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:427_6: Na hi sakkā ekaparibhogo kātuṃ jātiyā hīnattā.
tika-s0103t:427_7: Tathā akariyamāne ca so kujjhati bhogena adhikattā,
tika-s0103t:427_9: Na hi so ekaparibhogaṃ icchati jātiyā hīnabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:427_10: Na akariyamāne ca kujjhati bhogena hīnabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:427_12: Sadisopi susaṅgaho ekasadisabhāveneva itarena saha ekaparibhogassa paccāsīsāya,
tika-s0103t:428_0: Susaṅgahitāva hontīti suṭṭhu saṅgahitā eva honti daḷhabhattibhāvato. Tenāha “na bhijjantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:430_3: na appamodenāti ettha paṭisedhadvayena so eva vutto.
tika-s0103t:430_4: So ca odagyasabhāvattā na dīno dhammūpasañhitattā na gabbhayuttoti āha “na dīnena na gabbhitenāti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:433_4: Nidaṃsesīti sandassesi te dhamme paccakkhe katvā pakāsesi.
tika-s0103t:433_10: hitasukhatthikehi pakārato varaṇīyato rajanīyato pavaroti evaṃ atthavisesavācīnampi “aggo”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ
tika-s0103t:434_0: Uddhaṅgamanīyāti suṇantānaṃ uparūpari visesaṃ gamentīti uddhaṅgamanīyā.
tika-s0103t:434_1: Saṅkhāya adho piṭṭhipādasamīpe eva patiṭṭhitattā adhosaṅkhā pādā etassāti adhosaṅkhapādo.
tika-s0103t:436_1: Piṭṭhipādassa upari pakatiaṅgulena caturaṅgule jaṅghāpadese nigūḷhā apaññāyamānarūpā hutvā ṭhitāti attho.
tika-s0103t:438_1: Sippanti sikkhitabbaṭṭhena “sippa”nti laddhanāmaṃ sattānaṃ jīvikāhetubhūtaṃ ājīvavidhiṃ.
tika-s0103t:438_9: Satta ratanānīti muttādīni satta ratanāni. Ca-
tika-s0103t:438_13: Buddhānaṃ parisā nāma odhiso anodhiso ca samitapāpā,
tika-s0103t:438_14: tathatthāya paṭipannā ca hotīti vuttaṃ “samaṇānaṃ koṭṭhāsabhūtā catasso parisā”ti.
tika-s0103t:439_3: Payojanavasena gehato gehaṃ gāmato gāmaṃ jaṅghāyo kilametvā pesanaṃ jaṅghapesanikā.
tika-s0103t:439_5: Anupubbauggatavaṭṭitanti gopphakaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva jāṇuppadesā maṃsūpacayassa anukkamena samantato
tika-s0103t:440_4: “Uddhaggalomā sukhumattacotthatā”ti vuttattā codakena “kiṃ pana aññena kammena aññaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbattatī”ti codito,
tika-s0103t:440_5: ācariyo “na nibbattatī”ti vatvā “yadi evaṃ idha kasmā lakkhaṇantaraṃ kathita”nti antolīnameva codanaṃ pariharanto “yaṃ pana nibbattatīti…pe…
tika-s0103t:440_7: Tattha yaṃ pana nibbattatīti yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuccamānalakkhaṇanibbattakena kammunā nibbattati.
tika-s0103t:440_8: Taṃ anubyañjanaṃ hotīti taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuccamānassa lakkhaṇassa anukūlalakkhaṇaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0103t:440_9: Tasmā tena kāraṇena idha eṇijaṅghalakkhaṇakathane “uddhaggalomā sukhumattacotthatā”ti lakkhaṇantaraṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:442_0: 216. Samitapāpaṭṭhena samaṇaṃ, na pabbajjāmattena. Bāhitapāpaṭṭhena brāhmaṇaṃ, na jātimattena.
tika-s0103t:443_0: Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī paññā etassāti mahāpañño.
tika-s0103t:443_1: Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti āha “mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:443_2: Nānattanti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatattā bhagavā “mahāpañño”tiādinā kittīyati,
tika-s0103t:443_3: tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ ayaṃ vemattatā.
tika-s0103t:444_0: Yassa kassaci visesato arūpadhammassa mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassā kiccasiddhiyā
tika-s0103t:444_19: Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ vitthāretvā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:445_3: ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāmā”ti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0103t:445_11: bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho”ti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa atītādibhedavasenāpi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0103t:445_14: dve catubhūmakā”ti evaṃ āyatanānaṃ nānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0103t:445_18: dve dhātuyo catubhūmikā”ti evaṃ nānādhātūsu ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0103t:445_20: Paccekabuddhānampi hi dvinnañca aggasāvakānaṃ upādinnakadhātūsu evaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0103t:445_25: Sabbaññubuddhānameva pana “imāya nāmadhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto,
tika-s0103t:445_40: duggandhaṃ, madhuraṃ, tittakaṃ, ambilaṃ, kaṭukaṃ, kasāvaṃ.
tika-s0103t:445_41: Kaṇṭako tikhiṇo, atikhiṇo, ujuko, kuṭilo, kaṇho, nīlo,
tika-s0103t:445_42: odāto hotī”ti dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0103t:446_3: Nānāsuññatamanupalabbhesūti nānāsabhāvesu niccasārādivirahitesu suññatabhāvesu tato eva itthipurisaattattaniyādivasena
tika-s0103t:446_6: Nānāatthesūti atthapaṭisambhidāya visayabhūtesu paccayuppannādivasena nānāvidhesu atthesu.
tika-s0103t:446_7: Dhammesūti dhammapaṭisambhidāya visayabhūtesu paccayādivasena nānāvidhesu dhammesu.
tika-s0103t:446_9: Paṭibhānesūti atthapaṭisambhidādīsu visayabhūtesu “imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī”ti tathā tathā paṭibhānato
tika-s0103t:446_14: tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha “puthujjanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkammā”ti,
tika-s0103t:447_6: Sīlaṃ paripūretīti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā ṭhapetvā indriyasaṃvaraṃ tassa visuṃ vuttattā anavasesasīlaṃ paripūreti.
tika-s0103t:447_7: Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena ārammaṇe phullitavikasitā viya pavattati,
tika-s0103t:448_0: Sabbaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti yā rūpadhamme “aniccā”ti sīghavegena pavattati,
tika-s0103t:448_1: paṭipakkhadūrabhāvena pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena vissaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ avirajjhantī
tika-s0103t:448_5: Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:448_16: Idāni sikhāppattavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetuṃ puna “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:449_0: Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhapahānena veditabboti.
tika-s0103t:449_1: “Khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā”ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento “uppannaṃ kāmavitakka”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:449_3: paṭipadā cassa na calatīti āha “ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro ariyamaggā…pe…
tika-s0103t:450_1: saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti yāthāvato dassanena saccappaṭivedho ijjhati,
tika-s0103t:450_2: na aññathāti kāraṇamukhena nibbedhikapaññaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:450_8: Bahimukhoti sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho,
tika-s0103t:451_1: Pabbajitaṃ upāsitāti ettha yādisaṃ pabbajitaṃ upāsato paññāpaṭilābho hoti,
tika-s0103t:451_10: saddo vā cittapariyāyo “yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0103t:452_2: Uppāde ca nimitte ca chekāti uppādavidhimhi ceva nimittavidhimhi ca kusalā.
tika-s0103t:452_7: tasmiṃ uppāde ca nimitte ca anuminanādivasena chekā nipuṇāti attho.
tika-s0103t:455_3: Evaṃ akkodhavasikattāti evaṃ maghamāṇavo viya na kodhavasaṃ gatattā.
tika-s0103t:455_5: Yañhi kodhassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūte ārammaṇe upanāhassa paccayabhūtaṃ kujjhanavasena abhisajjanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:455_14: Tato balavataro byāpādo laddhāsevanatāya cittassa byāpajjanato.
tika-s0103t:455_15: Tato balavatarā patitthiyanāti sātisayaṃ laddhāsevanatāya tato byāpādāvatthāyapi balavatarā patitthiyanā paccatthikabhāvena thāmappattito.
tika-s0103t:456_1: saddena paṇītabhojanīyādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo bhojanadānassapi vaṇṇasampadānimittabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:456_2: Tenāha bhagavā “bhojanaṃ bhikkhave dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0103t:456_4: vaṇṇaṃ detī”ti tathā ca vakkhati “āmisadānena vā”ti.
tika-s0103t:457_4: Pabbajjāya visadisāvatthādi bhāvato na pabbajjāti apabbajjā,
tika-s0103t:457_8: tesaṃ acchādanānañceva sesa vatthānañca kojavādi uttamapāvuraṇānañca.
tika-s0103t:459_2: Rajje patiṭṭhitena sakkā kātuṃ bahubhatikasseva ijjhanato.
tika-s0103t:459_3: Kattā nāma natthīti vajjaṃ paṭicchādentīti ānetvā sambandho,
tika-s0103t:459_7: idaṃ pana asaṃkiliṭṭhacittena parassa uppajjanakaanatthaṃ pariharaṇavasena pavattaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0103t:459_8: “Ñātisaṅgahaṃ karontenā”ti etena ñātatthacariyāvasena taṃ kammaṃ pavattatīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:460_2: amittatāpanaṃ hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvāti attho.
tika-s0103t:460_3: Na hi cakkavattino puttānaṃ amittā nāma keci honti,
tika-s0103t:460_5: cakkānubhāveneva sabbepi khattiyādayo anuvattakā tesaṃ bhavanti.
tika-s0103t:463_2: Tena tena loke viññātaguṇena samaṃ samānaṃ jānāti,
tika-s0103t:463_4: Sayaṃ jānātīti aparaneyyo hutvā sayameva jānāti.
tika-s0103t:463_7: ayaṃ nihīno”ti taṃ taṃ purisaṃ yāthāvato jānāti.
tika-s0103t:463_8: Purisavisesaṃ jānātīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ purise vijjamānaṃ visesaṃ jānāti,
tika-s0103t:463_9: yato tattha tattha anurūpadānapadānādipaṭipattiyā yuttapattakārī hoti.
tika-s0103t:464_1: Samasaṅgahakammanti samaṃ jānitvā tadanurūpaṃ tassa tassa saṅgaṇhanakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t:465_5: sā pana tesaṃ nipuṇatā saṇhasukhumā paññāti āha “sukhumapaññā”ti.
tika-s0103t:467_2: Kammassakatāñāṇaṃ sattānaṃ vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ sabbasampattividhāyakanti āha “paññāyāti kammassakatāpaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0103t:469_2: Sā eva pasādanīyavatthusmimpi abhippasīdanavasena pavattiyā pasādasaddhā.
tika-s0103t:471_2: Sabbattha pharatīti sabbā rasāharaṇiyo anussarantaṃ sabhāvena sabbasmiṃ kāye pharati.
tika-s0103t:471_3: Samā hutvā vahantīti avisamā ujukā hutvā pavattanti.
tika-s0103t:472_2: sayameva vā taṃ gasanti gilanti anto pavesentīti rasaggasā,
tika-s0103t:472_6: Bhavati hi abhinnepi vatthusmiṃ taggatavisesāvabodhanatthaṃ bhinnaṃ viya katvā vohāro yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-s0103t:473_1: saddo “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”tiādīsu bādhanatthopi hotīti tato visesanatthaṃ “māraṇavadhenā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:473_3: Bādhanattho eva vā vadha- saddo, māraṇena,
tika-s0103t:473_5: Ubbādhanāyāti bandhanāgāre pakkhipitvā uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bādhanena.
tika-s0103t:475_7: Viceyya pekkhitāti ujukaṃ anoloketvā diṭṭhipātaṃ vicāretvā oloketvā.
tika-s0103t:475_10: Na oloketi taṃ sammukhā gacchantaṃ kujjhitvā na oloketi,
tika-s0103t:475_14: Jimhaṃ anoloketvā ujukaṃ olokanaṃ nāma kuṭilabhāvakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ abhājanaujukatacittatasseva hotīti āha “ujumano hutvā ujuṃ pekkhitā”ti.
tika-s0103t:475_15: Yathā ca ujuṃ pekkhitā hotīti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0103t:475_18: Piyaṃ piyāyitabbaṃ dassanaṃ olokanaṃ etassāti piyadassano.
tika-s0103t:476_7: “Pasādoti pana tesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ pasannākāraṃ sandhāya vutta”nti keci.
tika-s0103t:479_1: Yassa hi kāyasucaritādikammassa vasena mahāpuriso bahujanassa pubbaṅgamo ahosi,
tika-s0103t:479_6: pāmojjena ca sampuṇṇapaññāsīso bahulaṃ somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttacittasamaṅgī eva hutvā vicarati.
tika-s0103t:480_7: Tassa tassa veyyāvaccassa paṭiharaṇato pavattanakaraṇato paṭihāro,
tika-s0103t:482_0: 232. Upavattatīti anukūlabhāvaṃ upecca vattati. Tenāha “ajjhāsayaṃ anuvattatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:483_1: Ekekehi lomehīti aññesaṃ sarīre ekekasmimpi lomakūpe anekānipi lomāni uṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0103t:483_3: Tehi puna paccekaṃ lomakūpesu ekekeheva uppannehi kuṇḍalāvattehi padakkhiṇāvattakajātehi nicitaṃ viya sarīraṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “ekekalomūpacitaṅgavā”ti.
tika-s0103t:490_7: tasmā ativiya bāḷhaṃ pharusaṃ giranti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:490_8: Na bhaṇīti cettha “na abhaṇi na bhaṇī”ti saralopena niddeso.
tika-s0103t:490_15: sā cassā upayogaputhuttavisayatā “hadayagāminiyo”ti padena samānādhikaraṇatāya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0103t:490_20: Bahūnaṃ bahunti bahūnaṃ janānaṃ bahuṃ subhaṇitanti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:492_3: kāraṃ katvā ayaṃ niddeso yathā “niyyānikā dhammā”ti guṇatoti attanā adhigataguṇato.
tika-s0103t:494_6: atha kho dvīhi diguṇatādassananti āha “dvīhi dvīhīti catūhī”ti.
tika-s0103t:494_8: Tathāsabhāvoti yathāssa vuttanayena kenaci appadhaṃsiyatā hoti guṇehi,
tika-s0103t:496_1: Visuddhasīlācāratāya parisuddhā samantato sabbathā vā suddhā puggalā parivārā etassāti parisuddhaparivāro.
tika-s0103t:497_3: Tidivaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ puraṃ nagaraṃ etesanti tidivapurā,
tika-s0103t:497_14: Kāmaṃ janānaṃ manussānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānādibhāvena patiṭṭhābhūto desaviseso “janapado”ti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:497_15: idha pana saparivāracatumahādīpasaññito sabbo padeso tathā vuttoti āha “cakkavāḷaparicchinno janapado”ti.
tika-s0103t:497_18: So padeso cakkavāḷaparicchinnopi hotīti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:497_21: tesaṃ te te padesā patiṭṭhāti tepi saṅgaṇhanto “cakkavāḷaparicchinno”ti avoca.
tika-s0103t:497_22: Cakkavāḷaparicchinnoti ca cakkavāḷena paricchinnoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t:497_25: Bahujana sukhanti ettha paccattabahuvacanalopena bahujanaggahaṇanti āha “bahujanā”ti.
tika-s0103t:497_35: Sattānaṃ mahānatthakarattā visesato doso kalīti vuttaṃ “dosakalīnañcā”ti.
tika-s0103t:498_0: Ettha ca yasmā sabbesampi lakkhaṇānaṃ mahāpurisasantānagatapuññasambhārahetukabhāvena sabbaṃyeva taṃ
tika-s0103t:498_1: puññakammaṃ sabbassa lakkhaṇassa kāraṇaṃ visiṭṭharūpattā phalassa.
tika-s0103t:498_2: Na hi abhinnarūpakāraṇaṃ bhinnasabhāvassa phalassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0103t:498_3: tasmā yassa yassa lakkhaṇassa yaṃ yaṃ puññakammaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:498_4: taṃ taṃ vibhāgena dassentī ayaṃ desanā pavattā.
tika-s0103t:498_5: Tattha yathā yādisaṃ kāyasucaritādipuññakammaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:498_6: tādisameva “uṇhīsasīsatāya” kāraṇanti na sakkā vattuṃ daḷhasamādānatāvisiṭṭhassa tassa suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya kāraṇabhāvena vuttattā,
tika-s0103t:498_11: Na hi abhinnarūpakāraṇaṃ bhinnasabhāvassa phalassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0103t:498_12: Tattha yathā ekeneva kammunā cakkhādinānindriyuppattiyaṃ avatthābhedato,
tika-s0103t:498_14: Na hi yadavatthaṃ kammaṃ cakkhussa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:498_15: tadavatthameva sotādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hoti abhinnasāmatthiyaṃ vā,
tika-s0103t:498_16: tasmā pañcāyatanikattabhāvapatthanābhūtā purimanipphannā kāmataṇhā paccayavasena visiṭṭhasabhāvā kammassa
tika-s0103t:498_19: evamidhāpi “ekampi pāṇātipātā veramaṇivasena pavattaṃ kusalakammaṃ āyatapaṇhitādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi lakkhaṇānaṃ
tika-s0103t:498_20: nibbattakaṃ hotī”ti vuccamānepi na koci virodho.
tika-s0103t:498_22: imāni tīṇi mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paṭilabhatī”ti nānākammunā pana tesaṃ nibbattiyaṃ vattabbameva natthi,
tika-s0103t:498_23: pāḷiyaṃ pana “tassa kammassā”ti ekavacananiddeso sāmaññavasenāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t:500_2: Gopuraṭṭālakayuttanti dvārapāsādena ceva tattha tattha pākāramatthake patiṭṭhāpitaaṭṭālakehi ca yuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:501_0: Kāḷakavesenāti kalandakarūpena. Nivāpanti bhojanaṃ. Tanti uyyānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:502_0: “Kho panā”ti vacanālaṅkāramattametanti tena samayenāti atthavacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:502_5: “Putto panassa assaddho”tiādi aṭṭhuppattiko yaṃ suttanikkhepoti taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:503_0: Yāvajīvaṃ anussaraṇīyā hoti hitesitāya vuttā pacchimā vācāti adhippāyena.
tika-s0103t:504_2: Na idānevāti na imāya eva velāya.
tika-s0103t:504_4: Gihivinayanti gihīnaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ vinayatantibhūtaṃ “gihinā evaṃ vattitabba”nti gahaṭṭhācārassa gahaṭṭhavattassa
tika-s0103t:504_5: anavasesato imasmiṃ sutte savisesaṃ katvā vuttattā.
tika-s0103t:506_1: Vacanaṃ sutvāva cintesi buddhānubhāvena attasammāpaṇidhānanimittena puññabalena ca codiyamāno.
tika-s0103t:506_2: Na kira tā etāti tā cha disā etā idāni mayā namassiyamānā puratthimādikā na honti kirāti.
tika-s0103t:507_0: Bhagavā gahapatiputtena namassitabbā cha disā pucchito desanākusalatāya ādito eva tā akathetvā tassa
tika-s0103t:507_1: tāva paṭipattiyā naṃ bhājanabhūtaṃ kātuṃ vajjanīyavajjanatthañceva sevitabbasevanatthañca ovādaṃ dento
tika-s0103t:507_8: tassa pana apāyamukhabhāvena parato vattukāmatāya pāṇātipātādike eva sandhāya “cattāro”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:507_13: āsevitaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ nirayasaṃvattanika’ntiādi vacanato visuṃ kammapathabhāvena āgataṃ.
tika-s0103t:507_14: Tathā hi taṃ duccaritakammaṃ hutvā duggatigāmipiṭṭhivattakabhāvena niyata”nti keci,
tika-s0103t:507_16: Tasmā yathāvuttesveva kammapathesu upakārakattasabhāgattavasena anuppaveso daṭṭhabboti “visuṃ akammapathabhāvato cā”ti suvuttametaṃ.
tika-s0103t:507_22: apāyā eva vā mukhāni dvārānīti apāyamukhāni.
tika-s0103t:508_1: visesato pana paṭhamāya bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitasseva vakkhamānanayo yujjatīti “soti so sotāpanno”ti vuttaṃ. Pāpaka-
tika-s0103t:508_6: Cha disā paṭicchādentoti tena tena bhāgena dissantīti “disā”ti saññite cha bhāge satte yathā tehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0103t:508_12: so ubhayalokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato,
tika-s0103t:508_17: tayidaṃ saṃsādhanaṃ kittisaddena idha sattānaṃ cittatosanena,
tika-s0103t:508_18: verābhāvāpādanena ca hotīti āha “paritosito ceva nipphādito cā”ti.
tika-s0103t:508_19: Puna pañca verānīti pañca veraphalāni uttarapadalopena.
tika-s0103t:509_1: Kilesasampayuttattā kilesoti taṃyogato taṃsadisaṃ vadati yathā “pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:509_5: Evañca katvā pāṇātipātakammassa diṭṭhimānalobhādīhipi kiliṭṭhatā siddhā hoti,
tika-s0103t:509_8: Pubbe vuttaatthavasena pana sammukhenapi nesaṃ kilesapariyāyo labbhateva.
tika-s0103t:509_11: Yadi evaṃ kasmā puna vuttanti āha “gāthābandha”nti,
tika-s0103t:509_12: tassa atthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ bhagavā gāthābandhaṃ avocāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:511_1: “Pāpakammaṃ karotī”ti kasmā ayaṃ uddesaniddeso pavattoti antolīnacodanaṃ sandhāya “idaṃ bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:511_5: Akārako pākaṭo hoti yathā paṭipajjanto pāpaṃ karoti nāma,
tika-s0103t:511_8: Paṭhamataraṃ kārakaṃ dassento āha yathā “vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā”ti tathā hi bhagavā aṭṭhatiṃsa maṅgalāni
tika-s0103t:511_9: dassento “asevanā ca bālāna”nti vatvā “paṇḍitānañca sevanā”ti avoca.
tika-s0103t:511_10: Chandāgatinti ettha sandhivasena saralopoti dassento āha “chandena pemena agati”nti.
tika-s0103t:511_15: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā “dosena kopenā”ti evamādi atthavacanaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0103t:511_22: Yaṃ vā taṃ vā ayuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ vatvā.
tika-s0103t:511_24: visamāni vā kāyaduccaritādīni samādāya vattanena nissito visamanissito.
tika-s0103t:512_0: Chandāgatiādīni na gacchati maggeneva catunnampi agatigamanānaṃ pahīnattā,
tika-s0103t:512_1: agatigamanānīti ca tathāpavattā apāyagamanīyā akusalacittuppādā veditabbā agati gacchati etehīti.
tika-s0103t:513_4: Parihāyatīti pubbe yo ca yāvatake labbhati,
tika-s0103t:515_1: Pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā pūvasurā.
tika-s0103t:515_3: Kiṇṇāti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati,
tika-s0103t:515_18: Uppannā ceva bhogā parihāyanti pānabyasanena byasanakaraṇato.
tika-s0103t:515_19: Anuppannā ca nuppajjanti pamattassa kammantesu ñāyakaraṇābhāvato.
tika-s0103t:516_2: tesaṃ dassanādiatthaṃ tattha abhirativasena caraṇaṃ upagamanaṃ samajjābhicaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:516_5: Ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcaviññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasambhavato “dassanavasena” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:518_11: Paraloke akittiṃ pāpuṇanti akittisaṃvattaniyassa kammassa pasavanato.
tika-s0103t:518_13: Surāmadamattā ca pubbe attanā kataṃ tādisaṃ kammaṃ amattakāle chādentā vicaritvā mattakāle paccatthikānampi vivaranti pākaṭaṃ karonti,
tika-s0103t:518_14: tena tesaṃ sā surā tassa kopīnassa nidaṃsanato “kopīnanidaṃsanī”ti vuccatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t:518_16: “Yaṃ kiñci lokiyaṃ paññaṃ dubbalaṃ karotiyevā”ti hi sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0103t:518_17: Tathā hi byatirekamukhena tamatthaṃ patiṭṭhapetuṃ “maggapaññaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:518_18: “Antomukhameva na pavisatī”ti iminā surāya maggapaññādubbalakaraṇassa durasamussāritabhāvamāha.
tika-s0103t:518_19: Nanu cevaṃ surāya tassā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe sāmatthiyavighāto acodito hoti ariyānaṃ anuppayogasseva coditattāti?
tika-s0103t:518_20: Nayidaṃ evaṃ upayogopi nāma sadā tesaṃ natthi,
tika-s0103t:518_22: Atha pana aṭṭhānaparikappavasenassā kadāci siyā upayogo,
tika-s0103t:518_23: tathāpi so tassā dubbaliyaṃ īsakampi kātuṃ nālameva sammadeva paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:518_24: Tenāha “maggapaññaṃ pana dubbalaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:518_25: Maggasīsena cettha ariyānaṃ sabbassāpi lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya dubbalabhāvāpādāne asamatthatā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:519_1: Attāpissa akālacārissa agutto sarasato arakkhito upakkamatopi parivajjanīyānaṃ aparivajjanato.
tika-s0103t:519_7: Puttadārāti ettha puttaggahaṇena puttīpi gahitāti āha “puttadhītaro”ti.
tika-s0103t:519_8: Bahi patthananti kāmapatthanāvasena antogehassitato nibaddhavatthuto bahiddhā patthanaṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t:519_10: Saṅkitabbo hoti akāle tattha tattha caraṇato.
tika-s0103t:519_14: ettakaṃ domanassa”nti paricchinditvā vattuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0103t:519_15: Taṃ sabbampi vikālacārimhi puggale āharitabbaṃ tassa upari pakkhipitabbaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0103t:519_19: Purakkhato purato attano upari āsaṅkante katvā carati.
tika-s0103t:520_3: “Tattha gantabbaṃ hotī”ti vatvā tatthassa gamanena yathā anuppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ anuppādo,
tika-s0103t:520_9: apadhānagatanti gandhabbasatthavihitaṃ aññampi sabbaṃ gītaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:520_16: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā “kasmiṃ ṭhāne”tiādinā nacce vuttamatthaṃ gītādīsu atidisati.
tika-s0103t:521_2: Veranti jitena kīḷakapurisena jayanimittaṃ attano upari veraṃ virodhaṃ pasavati uppādeti.
tika-s0103t:521_6: Vittaṃ anusocatīti taṃ jinaṃ vittaṃ uddissa anutthunati.
tika-s0103t:521_11: Tvampi nāma kulaputtoti kulaputto nāma tvaṃ,
tika-s0103t:521_12: na mayaṃ tayi kolaputtiyaṃ idāni passāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:522_0: Anicchitoti na icchito. Positabbā bhavissati jūtaparājayena sabbakālaṃ rittatucchabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:525_5: Kammaṃ vā anto niṭṭhānaṃ gacchati etthāti kammanto,
tika-s0103t:526_0: Pannasakhāti suraṃ pātuṃ panne paṭipajjante eva sakhāti pannasakhā.
tika-s0103t:526_5: Otārameva gavesatīti randhameva pariyesati anatthamassa kātukāmo.
tika-s0103t:526_6: Verappasavoti parehi attani verassa pasavanaṃ anupavattanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:526_8: Paresaṃ kariyamāno anattho ettha atthīti anattho,
tika-s0103t:526_18: Taṃ pana dubbisajjanīyabhāve ṭhitaṃ sandhāyāha “suṭṭhu kadariyatā thaddhamacchariyabhā”voti.
tika-s0103t:526_19: Avipaṇṇasabhāvato uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto ca iṇaṃ gaṇhanto saṃsīdantova iṇaṃ vigāhati nāma.
tika-s0103t:526_20: Sūriye anuggate eva kammante anārabhanto rattiṃ anuṭṭhānasīlo.
tika-s0103t:527_5: Iminā kathāmaggenāti iminā “yato kho gahapatiputtā”tiādi nayappavattena kathāsaṅkhātena hitādhigamūpāyena.
tika-s0103t:527_8: cha bhogānaṃ apāyamukhānīti evaṃ vuttaṃ cuddasavidhaṃ pāpakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t:529_8: appannapānatā”ti evaṃ ādiko ca anattho uppajjati.
tika-s0103t:529_9: Yāni kānici bhayānīti attānuvādabhayaparānuvādabhayadaṇḍabhayādīni loke labbhamānāni yāni kānici bhayāni.
tika-s0103t:529_11: Upasaggāti sarīrena saṃsaṭṭhāni viya uparūpari uppajjanakāni byasanāni.
tika-s0103t:529_12: Aññadatthūti ekantenāti etasmiṃ atthe nipāto “aññadatthudaso”tiādīsu viyāti vuttaṃ “ekaṃsenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:529_14: Vācā eva paramā etassa kammanti vacīparamo.
tika-s0103t:529_17: yaṃ vā “rucī”ti vuccati yehi surāpānādīhi bhogā apenti vigacchanti,
tika-s0103t:529_18: tesu tesaṃ apāyesu byasanahetūsu sahāyo hoti.
tika-s0103t:530_4: Yaṃ kiñci appakanti pupphaphalādi yaṃ kiñci parittaṃ vatthuṃ datvā,
tika-s0103t:530_5: bahuṃ pattheti bahuṃ mahagghaṃ vatthayugādiṃ paccāsīsati.
tika-s0103t:530_6: Dāso viya hutvā mittassa taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ karonto kathaṃ amitto nāma jātoti āha “aya”ntiādi.
tika-s0103t:532_1: “Dānādīsu yaṃ kiñci karomā”ti vutte “sādhu samma karomā”ti anujānātīti imamatthaṃ “kalyāṇepi eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
tika-s0103t:532_2: Nanu evaṃ anujānanto ayaṃ mitto eva,
tika-s0103t:532_6: tasmiṃ vā kate uppajjanakavirodhādiṃ asallakkhetvā “karomā”ti vutte yo taṃ jānanto eva “sādhu samma karomā”ti anuppiyaṃ bhaṇati,
tika-s0103t:536_1: Pamattaṃ rakkhatīti ettha pamādavasena kiñci ayutte kate tādise kāle rakkhaṇaṃ “bhītassa saraṇaṃ hotī”ti
tika-s0103t:536_2: imināva taṃ gahitanti tato aññameva pamattassa rakkhaṇavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “majjaṃ pivitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:536_3: Gehe ārakkhaṃ asaṃvihitassa bahigamanampi pamādapakkhikamevāti “sahāyo bahigato vā hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:537_2: nigūhituṃ vā yuttā kathā etassāti nigūhituṃ yuttakathaṃ,
tika-s0103t:537_6: saddena kimaṅgaṃ pana aññaṃ pariggahitavatthunti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:538_1: Passantesu passantesūti āmeḍitavacanena nivāriyamānassa pāpassa punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0103t:538_2: Punappunaṃ karonto hi pāpato visesena nivāretabbo hoti.
tika-s0103t:538_3: Saraṇesūti saraṇesu vattassu abhinnāni katvā paṭipajja,
tika-s0103t:543_4: Anattamano hotīti attamano na hoti anukampakabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:543_5: Aññadatthu taṃ abhavaṃ attani āpatitaṃ viya maññati.
tika-s0103t:543_6: Idāni taṃ bhavaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “tathārūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:544_4: Yasmāssa bhagavatā savisesaṃ virocanaṃ loke pākaṭabhāvañca dassetuṃ “jalaṃ aggīva bhāsatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:544_6: yattha ca ṭhito dūre ṭhitānampi paññāyati,
tika-s0103t:545_0: “Bhamarasseva irīyato”ti etenevassa bhogasaṃharaṇaṃ dhammikaṃ ñāyopetanti dassento “attānampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:545_1: Rāsiṃ karontassāti yathāssa dhanadhaññādibhogajātaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ rāsibhūtaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0103t:547_0: Evaṃ vibhajantoti evaṃ vuttanayena attano dhanaṃ catudhā vibhajanto vibhajanahetu mittāni ganthati soḷasa
tika-s0103t:547_3: Kathaṃ pana vuttanayena catudhā bhogānaṃ vibhajanena mittāni ganthatīti āha “yassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:547_8: nhāpitādīnaṃ vetanavasena ca viniyogopi upayogo eva.
tika-s0103t:547_9: Tathā hi vakkhati “imesu panā”tiādi āyo nāma heṭṭhimantena vayato catugguṇo icchitabbo,
tika-s0103t:547_10: aññathā vayo avicchedavasena na santāneyya, nidheyya,
tika-s0103t:547_11: bhājeyya ca asambhateti vuttaṃ “dvīhi kammaṃ payojaye”ti.
tika-s0103t:549_1: Catūhi kāraṇehīti na chandagamanādīhi catūhi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0103t:549_2: Akusalaṃ pahāyāti “cattāro kammakilesā”ti vuttaṃ akusalañceva agatigamanākusalañca pajahitvā.
tika-s0103t:549_3: Chahi kāraṇehīti surāpānādīsu ādīnavadassanasaṅkhātehi chahi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0103t:549_4: Surāpānānuyogādibhedaṃ chabbidhaṃ bhogānaṃ apāyamukhaṃ vināsamukhaṃ vajjetvā.
tika-s0103t:549_6: pamattarakkhaṇādikiccavisesavasena paccekaṃ cattāro cattāro katvā soḷasavidhe kalyāṇamitte sevanto bhajanto.
tika-s0103t:549_7: Satthavāṇijjādimicchājīvaṃ pahāya ñāyeneva vattanato dhammikena ājīvena jīvati.
tika-s0103t:549_9: guṇavasena ca namassitabbā sabbadā natena hutvā vattitabbā. Disā-
tika-s0103t:549_17: Tathā hi mātāpitaro puttānaṃ puratthimabhāvena tāva upakāribhāvena dissanato,
tika-s0103t:549_20: hitāhitaṃ patikusalabhāvena dakkhiṇārahatāya ca vuttanayena dakkhiṇā disā.
tika-s0103t:549_21: Iminā nayena “pacchimā disā”tiādīsu yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:549_22: Gharāvāsassa dukkhabahulatāya te te ca kiccavisesā yathāuppatitadukkhanittharaṇatthāti vuttaṃ “te te dukkhavisese uttaratī”ti.
tika-s0103t:549_23: Yasmā dāsakammakarā sāmikassa pādānaṃ payirupāsanavasena ceva tadanucchavikakiccasādhanavasena ca yebhuyyena santikāvacarā,
tika-s0103t:549_26: Upari ṭhitabhāvenāti saggamagge mokkhamagge ca patiṭṭhitabhāvena.
tika-s0103t:550_2: taṃ pana bharaṇaṃ jātakālato paṭṭhāya sukhapaccayūpaharaṇena dukkhapaccayāpaharaṇena ca tehi pavattitanti dassetuṃ “thaññaṃ pāyetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:551_0: Mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ khettādiṃ avināsetvā rakkhitaṃ tesaṃ paramparāya ṭhitiyā kāraṇaṃ hotīti “taṃ rakkhanto kulavaṃsaṃ saṇṭhapeti nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:551_1: Adhammikavaṃsatoti “kulappadesādinā attanā sadisaṃ ekaṃ purisaṃ ghaṭetvā vā gīvāyaṃ vā hatthe vā bandhamaṇiyaṃ
tika-s0103t:551_4: Mātāpitaro tato gāhato vivecaneneva hi āyatiṃ tesaṃ paramparāhārikā siyā.
tika-s0103t:551_5: Dhammikavaṃseti hiṃsādiviratiyā dhammike vaṃse dhammikāya paveṇiyaṃ.
tika-s0103t:552_0: Dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjāmīti ettha yasmā dāyapaṭilābhassa yogyabhāvena vattamānoyeva dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjati nāma, na itaro,
tika-s0103t:552_3: Vinicchayaṃ patvāti “puttassa cajavissajjana”nti evaṃ āgataṃ vinicchayaṃ āgamma.
tika-s0103t:552_4: Dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjāmīti vuttanti “dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjāmī” ti idaṃ catutthaṃ vattanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:553_1: Sampattavatthutopi hi nivāraṇaṃ vītikkame anāgate eva siyā,
tika-s0103t:553_3: Nibbattitā pana pāpakiriyā garahaṇamattapaṭikārāti āha “katampi garahantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:553_5: Vuttappakārā mātāpitaro anavajjameva sippaṃ sikkhāpentīti vuttaṃ “muddāgaṇanādisippa”nti.
tika-s0103t:554_4: “Uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāyā”ti imināssa niccameva dāne tesaṃ yuttapayuttataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:555_1: evaṃ pihitā hoti “puratthimā disā”ti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojanā.
tika-s0103t:555_5: Vippaṭipannāti “bhato ne bharissāmī”tiādinā uttasammāpaṭipattiyā akāraṇena ceva tappaṭipakkhamicchāpaṭipattiyā akaraṇena ca vippaṭipannā puttā assu.
tika-s0103t:555_6: Etaṃ bhayanti etaṃ “mātāpitūnaṃ appatirūpāti viññūnaṃ garahitabbatābhayaṃ,
tika-s0103t:555_8: Puttānaṃ nānurūpāti ettha “puttāna”nti padaṃ etaṃ bhayaṃ puttānaṃ āgaccheyyāti evaṃ idhāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:555_9: Tādisānañhi mātāpitūnaṃ puttānaṃ ovādānusāsaniyo dātuṃ samatthakālato paṭṭhāya tā tesaṃ dātabbā evāti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:555_10: Puttānañhi vasenāyaṃ desanā anāgatā sammāpaṭipannesu ubhosu attano,
tika-s0103t:555_11: mātāpitūnañca vasena uppajjanakatāya sabbaṃ bhayaṃ na hoti sammāpaṭipannattā.
tika-s0103t:555_12: Evaṃ paṭipannattā eva paṭicchannā hoti tattha kātabbapaṭisanthārassa sammadeva katattā.
tika-s0103t:555_14: Yathāvuttasammāpaṭipattiyā akaraṇena hi uppajjanakaupaddavā karaṇena na hontīti.
tika-s0103t:556_0: “Na kho te”tiādinā vutto saṅgītianāruḷho bhagavatā tadā tassa vutto paramparāgato attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:557_1: Ācariyaṃ dūratova disvā uṭṭhānavacaneneva tassa paccuggamanādisāmīcikiriyā avuttasiddhāti taṃ dassento “paccuggamanaṃ katvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:557_6: Sippuggahaṇatthaṃ pana upagamanaṃ upaṭṭhānantogadhaṃ payojanavasena gamanabhāvatoti āha “sippuggahaṇa…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t:557_8: sā pana ācariye sikkhitabbasikkhe ca ādaragāravapubbikā icchitabbā “addhā iminā sippena sikkhitena evarūpaṃguṇaṃ paṭilabhissāmī”ti.
tika-s0103t:557_9: Tathābhūtañca taṃ savanaṃ saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ hotīti āha “saddahitvā savanenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:557_14: taṃ vibhajanaṃ anavasesato dassetuṃ “antevāsikena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:557_19: Tassa hi suṭṭhu uggahaṇena tadanusārenassa payogopi sammadeva uggahito hotīti.
tika-s0103t:558_1: Sippasmiṃ pana sikkhāpanavinayo “suggahitaṃ gāhāpentī”ti imināva saṅgahitoti vuttaṃ “evaṃ te nisīditabba”ntiādi.
tika-s0103t:558_2: Ācariyā hi nāma antevāsike na diṭṭhadhammike eva vinenti,
tika-s0103t:558_4: Sippaganthassa uggaṇhanaṃ nāma yāvadeva payogasampādanatthanti āha “payogaṃ dassetvā gaṇhāpentī”ti.
tika-s0103t:558_7: “Ayaṃ amhākaṃ antevāsiko”tiādinā hi attano pariggahitadassanamukhena ceva “bahussuto”tiādinā tassa guṇapariggaṇhanamukhe ca taṃ tesaṃ paṭiyādenti.
tika-s0103t:558_8: Sabbadisāsu rakkhaṃ karonti cātuddisabhāvasampādanenassa sabbattha sukhajīvibhāvasādhanato.
tika-s0103t:559_0: Pubbe “uggahitasippo hī”tiādinā sippasikkhāpaneneva lābhuppattiyā disāsu parittāṇakaraṇaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0103t:559_1: idāni “yaṃ vā so”tiādinā tassa uggahitasippassa nipphattivasena guṇakittanamukhena paggaṇhanenapi lābhuppattiyāti ayametesaṃ vikappānaṃ bhedo.
tika-s0103t:560_2: sā pana atthacariyālakkhaṇā ca dānalakkhaṇā ca catutthapañcamaṭṭhāneheva saṅgahitāti piyavacanalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:560_8: Sāmikena hi vimānitānaṃ itthīnaṃ sabbo parijano vimānetiyeva.
tika-s0103t:560_10: Taṃ aticarati nāma taṃ attano gihiniṃ atimaññitvā agaṇetvā vattanato.
tika-s0103t:560_11: Issariyavossaggenāti ettha yādiso issariyavossaggo gihiniyā anucchaviko,
tika-s0103t:560_13: Gehe eva ṭhatvā vicāretabbampi hi kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ kulitthiyā bhāro na hoti,
tika-s0103t:560_15: tato āgatasāpateyyaṃ pana tāya suguttaṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:560_16: “Sabbaṃ issariyaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotī”ti etā maññantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:560_17: Itthiyo nāma puttalābhena viya mahagghavipulālaṅkāralābhenapi na santussantevāti tāsaṃ tosanaṃ alaṅkāradānanti āha “attano vibhavānurūpenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:561_1: Sammānanādīhi yathārahaṃ piyavacanehi ceva bhojanadānādīhi ca paheṇakapesanādīhi aññato,
tika-s0103t:561_2: tattheva vā uppannassa paṇṇākārassa chaṇadivasādīsu pesetabbapiyabhaṇḍehi ca saṅgahitaparijanā.
tika-s0103t:561_3: Gehasāminiyā antogehajano niccaṃ saṅgahito evāti vuttaṃ “idha parijano nāma…pe…
tika-s0103t:561_6: Gihiniyā nāma paṭhamaṃ āhārasampādane kosallaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t:561_14: Iti bhagavā “pacchimā disā puttadārā”ti uddisitvāpi dāravaseneva pacchimaṃ disaṃ vissajjesi,
tika-s0103t:561_16: Puttā hi dārakakāle attano mātu anuggaṇhaneneva anuggahitā honti anukampitā,
tika-s0103t:561_17: viññutaṃ pattakāle pana yathā tepi tadā anuggahetabbā,
tika-s0103t:561_18: svāyaṃ vidhi “pāpā nivārentī”tiādinā paṭhamadisāvāre dassito evāti kiṃ puna vissajjanenāti.
tika-s0103t:562_1: Cattāripi ṭhānāni laṅghitvā pañcamameva ṭhānaṃ vivarituṃ “avisaṃvādanatāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:562_2: Tattha yassa yassa nāmaṃ gaṇhātīti sahāyo atthikabhāvena yassa yassa vatthuno nāmaṃ katheti.
tika-s0103t:562_4: payogena cāti taṃ duvidhampi dassetuṃ “idampī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:562_5: “Dānenā”ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ itarasaṅgahavatthuvasenapi avisaṃvādetvā saṅgaṇhanassa labbhanato,
tika-s0103t:563_1: Yathābalaṃ kammantasaṃvidhānenāti dāsakammakarānaṃ yathābalaṃ balānurūpaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ kammantānaṃ saṃvidahanena vicāraṇena,
tika-s0103t:563_4: Bhattavetanānuppadānenāti tassa tassa dāsakammakarassa anurūpaṃ bhattassa,
tika-s0103t:563_9: Sātabhāvo eva rasānaṃ acchariyatāti āha “acchariye madhurarase”ti.
tika-s0103t:563_18: pacchānipātitā ca mahāsudassane vuttā evāti idha anāmaṭṭhā.
tika-s0103t:564_0: Dinnādāyinoti pubbapadāvadhāraṇavasena sāvadhāraṇavacananti avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dassetuṃ “corikāya kiñci aggahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:564_2: Na mayaṃ kiñci labhāmāti anujjhāyitvāti paṭisedhadvayena tehi laddhabbassa lābhaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:564_3: “Kiṃ etassa kammena katenāti anujjhāyitvā”ti idaṃ tuṭṭhahadayatāya kāraṇadassanaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato.
tika-s0103t:564_8: Tathā tathā kittetabbato hi kitti, guṇo,
tika-s0103t:565_3: Yāni pana tāni yathā yathā ca sambhavanti,
tika-s0103t:565_6: Anāvaṭadvāratāyāti ettha dvāraṃ nāma alobhajjhāsayatā dānassa mukhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:565_7: Tassa sato deyyadhammassa dātukāmatā anāvaṭatā evañhi gharamāvasanto kulaputto gehadvāre pihitepi anāvaṭadvāro eva,
tika-s0103t:565_14: “Santaññevā”ti iminā asantaṃ natthivacanaṃ pucchitapaṭivacanaṃ viya icchitabbaṃ evāti dasseti viññūnaṃ atthikānaṃ cittamaddavakaraṇato.
tika-s0103t:565_15: “Purebhattaṃ paribhuñjitabbaka”nti idaṃ yāvakālike eva āmisabhāvassa niruḷhatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:566_0: “Sabbe sattā”ti idaṃ tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ajjhāsayasampattidassanaṃ pakkhapātābhāvadīpanato,
tika-s0103t:566_4: taṃ sandhāyāha “pavisantāpi kalyāṇena cetasā anukampanti nāmā”ti.
tika-s0103t:566_5: Sutassa pariyodāpanaṃ nāma tassa yāthāvato atthaṃ vibhāvetvā vicikicchātamavidhamanena visodhananti āha “atthaṃ kathetvā kaṅkhaṃ vinodentī”ti.
tika-s0103t:566_6: Savanaṃ nāma dhammassa yāvadeva sammāpaṭipajjanāya asati tasmiṃ tassa niratthakabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:566_7: tasmā sutassa pariyodāpanaṃ nāma sammāpaṭipajjāpananti āha “tathattāya vā paṭipajjāpentī”ti.
tika-s0103t:567_2: so ca atthato samattho evāti “agāraṃ ajjhāvasanasamattho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:567_4: Paṇḍito hutvā kusalo cheko labhate yasanti yojanā.
tika-s0103t:567_9: Disānamassanaṭṭhānenāti yena ñāṇena yathāvuttā cha disā vuttanayena paṭipajjanto namassati nāma,
tika-s0103t:567_12: Tena hi taṃtaṃkiccayuttapattavasena paṭipajjanto idha “paṭibhānavā”ti vutto.
tika-s0103t:567_14: Atthaddhoti na thaddho thambharahitoti cittassa uddhumātalakkhaṇena thambhitabhāvena virahito.
tika-s0103t:567_17: Ṭhānuppattiyā paññāyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthakicce upaṭṭhite ṭhānaso taṅkhaṇe eva uppajjanakapaññāya.
tika-s0103t:568_2: so pana atthato mitte pariyesanako nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “mittagavesano”ti.
tika-s0103t:568_3: Yathāvuttaṃ vadaṃ vacanaṃ jānātīti vadaññūti āha “pubbakārinā vuttavacanaṃ jānātī”ti.
tika-s0103t:568_4: Idāni tamevatthaṃ saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vitthāravasena dassetuṃ “sahāyakassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:568_5: Pubbe yathāpavattāya vācāya jānane vadaññutaṃ dassetvā idāni ākārasallakkhaṇena appavattāya vācāya jānanepi vadaññutaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:569_0: Tasmiṃ tasminti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dānādīhi saṅgahehi saṅgahetabbe puggale.
tika-s0103t:569_4: Puttahetukañhi puttena kattabbaṃ mānaṃ vā pūjaṃ vā.
tika-s0103t:570_6: Bhavanti ete saṅgahetabbe tattha puggale yathārahaṃ pavattentāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:571_3: Namassāti namasseyyāsīti attho “yathā kathaṃ panā”tiādikāya gahapatiputtassa pucchāya vasena desanāya āraddhattā “pucchāya ṭhatvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:571_4: Akathitaṃ natthi gihīhi kattabbakamme appamādapaṭipattiyā anavasesato kathitattā.
tika-s0103t:571_5: Mātāpituādīsu hi tehi ca paṭipajjitabbapaṭipattiyā niravasesato kathaneneva rājādīsupi paṭipajjitabbavidhi atthato kathito eva hotīti.
tika-s0103t:571_8: Yathānusiṭṭhanti yathā idha satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ gihicārittaṃ,
tika-s0103t:571_10: Paṭipajjamānassa vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi vuddhiyeva icchitabbā avassambhāvinīti.
tika-s0103t:573_1: “Catuddisaṃ rakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti idaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu catūsu disāsu ṭhapitaṃ rakkhaṃ sandhāya vuttanti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “asurasenāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:573_3: attano rakkhāya ca appamajjanena tesaṃ idaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu catūsu disāsu ārakkhaṭṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:573_4: Yañhi taṃ asurasenāya paṭisedhanatthaṃ devapure catūsu disāsu sakkassa devānamindassa ārakkhaṭṭhapanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:573_6: Yaṃ pana nesaṃ bhagavato santikaṃ upasaṅkamane catūsu disāsu ārakkhaṭṭhapanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:573_9: Pāḷiyaṃ catuddisanti bhummatthe upayogavacananti bhummavasena tadatthaṃ dassento “catūsu disāsū”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:573_10: Ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvāti vessavaṇādayo cattāro mahārājāno attanā attanā rakkhitabbadisāsu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā guttiṃ sammadeva vidahitvā.
tika-s0103t:573_13: Iti tīhi padehi yathākkamaṃ paccekaṃ devanagaradvārassa anto,
tika-s0103t:573_16: disārakkhāvasanoti tividhāya rakkhāya ṭhapitabhāvo vā dīpito.
tika-s0103t:573_18: Satta buddhe ārabbhāti ettha satteva buddhe ārabbha paribandhanakāraṇaṃ mahāpadānaṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:573_23: Sāvananti catunnampi parisānaṃ tikkhattuṃ parivārena anusāvanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:573_24: yathā sakko devānamindo asurasenāya nivāraṇatthaṃ catūsu disāsu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapāpeti,
tika-s0103t:573_25: evaṃ mahārājānopi tādise kiccavisese attano ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti.
tika-s0103t:574_2: Teneva hi “nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo”ti anantaraṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:574_4: Tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:575_9: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti dasapi disā pabhāsento cando viya,
tika-s0103t:575_10: sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho.
tika-s0103t:576_19: rūpāyatananti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe vaṇṇa-
tika-s0103t:576_22: Chaviyaṃ daṭṭhabbo rūpāyatane gayhamānassa chavimukheneva gahetabbato.
tika-s0103t:576_23: “Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva suvaṇṇavaṇṇoti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitā”ti apare.
tika-s0103t:577_0: Kevalaparipuṇṇanti ekadesampi asesetvā niravasesatova paripuṇṇanti ayamettha atthoti āha “anavasesatā attho”ti.
tika-s0103t:578_2: anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ kappaniyasaddamattaṃ nidasseti,
tika-s0103t:578_12: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassa obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-s0103t:578_13: ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-
tika-s0103t:579_4: sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekaṃ pajjotaṃ karitvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:579_5: Kasmā ete mahārājāno bhagavato santike nisīdiṃsu?
tika-s0103t:579_6: Nanu yebhuyyena devatā bhagavato santikaṃ upagatā ṭhatvāva kathetabbaṃ kathentā gacchantīti?
tika-s0103t:579_11: tasmā na amhehi ṭhatvā gahetabba”nti cintetvā parittagāravavasena nisīdiṃsu.
tika-s0103t:580_7: Manussesu viya hi devesupi kocideva purimajātiparicayena susikkhito hoti,
tika-s0103t:580_8: tatrāpi kocideva yathādhippetamatthaṃ vattuṃ samattho paripuṇṇapadabyañjanāya poriyā vācāya samannāgato.
tika-s0103t:580_11: Pāṇātipāte ādīnavadassaneneva taṃ vipariyāyato tato veramaṇiyaṃ ānisaṃso pākaṭo hotīti “ādīnavaṃ dassetvā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:580_12: Tesu senāsanesūti yāni “araññavanappatthānī”tiādinā vuttāni bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānabhūtāni araññāyatanāni,
tika-s0103t:581_0: “Uggaṇhātu bhante bhagavā”ti attanā vuccamānaṃ parittaṃ bhagavantaṃ uggaṇhāpetukāmo vessavaṇo avocāti
tika-s0103t:581_1: adhippāyena codako “kiṃ pana bhagavato appaccakkhadhammo nāma atthī”ti codesi.
tika-s0103t:581_2: Ācariyo sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacārassa bhagavato na kiñci appaccakkhanti dassento “natthī”ti vatvā “uggaṇhātu
tika-s0103t:581_3: bhante bhagavā”ti vadato vessavaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vivaranto “okāsakaraṇattha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:581_4: Yathā hi pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:581_5: brahmuno ca sanaṅkumārassa sammukhā attano yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā pavedeti,
tika-s0103t:581_6: evamayampi mahārājā itarehi saddhiṃ āṭānāṭanagare gāthāvasena bandhitaṃ parittaṃ bhagavato pavedetuṃ okāsaṃ kārento “uggaṇhātu bhante bhagavā”ti āha,
tika-s0103t:581_8: Tasmā uggaṇhātūti yathidaṃ parittaṃ mayā paveditamattameva hutvā catunnaṃ parisānaṃ cirakālaṃ hitāvahaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:581_12: catunnaṃ parisānaṃ satthu kathane vāti attho.
tika-s0103t:582_1: Sattapi buddhā cakkhumanto pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumabhāve visesābhāvato.
tika-s0103t:582_2: Tasmāti yasmā cakkhumabhāvo viya sabbabhūtānukampitādayo sabbepi visesā sattannampi buddhānaṃ sādhāraṇā, tasmā,
tika-s0103t:582_3: guṇanemittakāneva vā yasmā buddhānaṃ nāmāni nāma,
tika-s0103t:582_5: tasmā buddhānaṃ guṇavisesadīpanāni “cakkhumantassā”tiādinā vuttāni etāni ekekassa satta satta nāmāni honti.
tika-s0103t:582_6: Tesaṃ nāmānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ atthavasena yojetabbāti dassetuṃ “sabbepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:582_8: Nhātakilesattāti aṭṭhaṅgikena ariyamaggajalena saparasantānesu niravasesato dhotakilesamalattā.
tika-s0103t:582_12: Vusitavantatāya eva bāhitapāpatā vuttā hotīti “brāhmaṇassā”ti padaṃ anāmaṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:582_13: Vimuttāti anaññasādhāraṇānaṃ pañcannampi vimuttīnaṃ vasena niravasesato muttā.
tika-s0103t:582_22: atha kho aññānipi bahūni aparimitāni nāmāni.
tika-s0103t:582_23: Kathanti āha “asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni saguṇena mahesinoti vutta”nti.
tika-s0103t:583_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vessavaṇo etāneva gaṇhīti āha “attano pākaṭanāmavasenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:583_2: Te hi kammakilesehi jātāpi evaṃ na puna jāyissantīti iminā atthena janā.
tika-s0103t:583_3: Yathāha “yo ca kālaghaso bhūto”ti desanāsīsamattanti nidassanamattanti attho,
tika-s0103t:583_5: Sati ca pisuṇavācappahāne pharusavācā pahīnāva hoti,
tika-s0103t:583_7: Mahattāti mahā attā sabhāvo etesanti mahattā.
tika-s0103t:583_13: Itaresaṃ pana matena buddhādīhi ariyehi mahanīyato pūjanīyato mahaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:584_2: Yathābhūtaṃ vipassisunti pañcupādānakkhandhesu samudayādito yāthāvato vividhenākārena passiṃsu.
tika-s0103t:584_3: “Ye cāpī”ti pubbe paccattabahuvacanena aniyamato vutte tesampīti atthaṃ sampadānabahuvacanavasena niyametvā
tika-s0103t:584_4: “namatthū”ti ca padaṃ ānetvā yojeti yaṃ taṃ-
tika-s0103t:584_7: Paṭhamagāthāyāti “ye cāpi nibbutā loke”ti evaṃ vuttagāthāya.
tika-s0103t:584_9: Tattha desanāmukhamattanti itaresampi buddhānaṃ nāmaggahaṇe patte imasseva bhagavato nāmaggahaṇaṃ tathā desanāya mukhamattaṃ,
tika-s0103t:584_10: tasmā tepi atthato gahitā evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:584_13: Purimayojanāyaṃ tassāti visesitabbatāya abhāvato “yanti nipātamatta”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t:584_14: idha pana “tassa namatthū”ti evaṃ sambandhassa ca icchitattā “ya”nti nāmapadaṃ upayogekavacananti dassento “yaṃ namassanti gotama”nti āha.
tika-s0103t:585_4: tesaṃ “idañcidañca niggahaṃ karissāmā”ti sāvanaṃ kātukāmā tattha tattha dvisahassaparittadīpaparivāresu
tika-s0103t:585_5: catūsu mahādīpesu attano āṇāya vattānaṃ attano puttānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:585_6: aṭṭhavīsatiyā yakkhasenāpatiādīnañca satthari pasādagāravabahumānañca pavedetvā niggahārahānaṃ santajjanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:585_9: Pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ tāva majjhanhikaṭṭhāne ṭhito jambudīpavāsīnaṃ udetīti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:585_10: uttarakurukānaṃ pana oggacchatīti iminā nayena sesadīpesupi sūriyassa uggacchanoggacchanapariyāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:585_11: Ayañca attho heṭṭhā aggaññasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ pakāsito eva.
tika-s0103t:585_16: ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu ālokavidaṃsanena samujjalanatoti attho.
tika-s0103t:585_18: kāro bhusatthoti āha “mahantaṃ maṇḍalaṃ assāti maṇḍalī”ti.
tika-s0103t:585_20: “Saṃvarīpi nirujjhatī”ti imināva divasopi jāyatīti ayampi attho vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:586_1: “Tasmiṃ ṭhāne”ti idaṃ puratthimasamuddassa uparibhāgena sūriyassa gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:586_2: Tathā hi jambudīpe ṭhitānaṃ puratthimasamuddato sūriyo uggacchanto viya upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0103t:586_8: saritā nadiyo udake etassāti vā saritodako.
tika-s0103t:587_1: taṃ padhānaṃ katvā vattabbanti adhippāyena “itoti sineruto”ti vatvā tathā pana disāvavatthānaṃ anavaṭṭhitanti “tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānato vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:587_4: Tattha hi nisinnā te imaṃ parittaṃ bandhiṃsu.
tika-s0103t:587_5: Tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānatoti vā satthu santike tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0103t:587_6: Ubhayathāpi sūriyassa udayaṭṭhānā puratthimā disā nāma hoti.
tika-s0103t:587_8: Tena vuttaṃ “ito sā purimā disā”ti. Sūriyo,
tika-s0103t:587_16: vāmapasse dakkhiṇā disāti catumahādīpavāsīnaṃ paccekaṃ sineru uttarādisāyameva,
tika-s0103t:587_17: tasmā anavaṭṭhitā disāvavatthāti āha “iti naṃ ācikkhati jano”ti.
tika-s0103t:587_18: Yaṃ disanti yaṃ puratthimadisaṃ yasassīti mahāparivāro.
tika-s0103t:587_21: tehi dittabhāvūpagamanato “gandhabbā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ cātumahārājikadevānaṃ adhipati bhāvato.
tika-s0103t:587_25: tassa dhataraṭṭhamahārājassa puttāpi bahavo. Kittakā? Asīti,
tika-s0103t:587_26: dasa eko ca. Ekanāmā. Kathaṃ? Indanāmā.
tika-s0103t:588_2: ādiccena samānagottatāya ādicco bandhu etassātipi ādiccabandhu,
tika-s0103t:588_9: Sutaṃ netanti sutaṃ nanūti etasmiṃ atthe nu- saddo.
tika-s0103t:588_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nokāroyanti adhippāyena amhehīti attho vutto.
tika-s0103t:588_11: Etanti etaṃ tathā parikittetvā amanussānaṃ devatānaṃ vandanaṃ.
